analyzed: dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
adhikaraṇam
a pā
evam śruti upayogi vicāre vṛtte dhunā liṅga upayogi vicāraḥ prastūyate
tatra liṅgam nāma aṅgatva ghaṭakībhūta para uddeśya tā ākṛti kāraka tva vācaka pada kalpanā anukūlā kḷpta pada padārtha niṣṭhā yogyatā
yathā struveṇa avadyati iti atra struva niṣṭhā drava pada kalpanā anukūlā
evam mantreṣu svārtha vṛtti uddeśya tā vāci pada kalpanā anukūlā sva vṛtti kāraka tva vāci pada kalpanā anukūlā ca yogyatā liṅgam
sā ca pada rūpa śruti kalpaka tvāt tad dvārā tad artha viniyoge pramāṇam
tatra vastu sāmarthya rūpasya liṅgasya viśeṣa vicāra asaṃbhavāt mantra sāmarthyasya kim

original: śakya evārthe viniyojakatvamuta jaghanyavṛttipratipādye 'pīti saṃdehe ------ kratuprakaraṇāmnātamantrasya
analyzed: śakye eva arthe viniyojaka tvam uta jaghanya vṛtti pratipādye pi iti saṃdehe kratu prakaraṇa āmnāta mantrasya
barhiḥ deva sadanam dāmī tyādeḥ mukhye iva jaghanye pyulapa rājya ādau smāraka ākāṅkṣā ādi rūpa sāmagṣa viśeṣāt
tad sādhāraṇyena eva viniyogaḥ
yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya ityādi vat ākāṅkṣā ādi rūpa tātparya grāhaka sattve mukhya artha bādhasya akiñcitkara tvāt iti prāpte
śakya saṃbandha graha sāpekṣa tvena jaghanya artha pratīteḥ vilambita tvāt prathama pratīta mukhya viniyogena
ataeva nivṛttiḥ

original: ataeva yatra prakaraṇe mukhyarthopayogo na kḷptastatra mantrāmnānabalādeva tatkalpanā //
analyzed: ataeva yatra prakaraṇe mukhī artha upayogaḥ na kṷptaḥ tatra mantra āmnāna balāt eva tad kalpanā
yatra tu virodhi guṇa antara avarodhaḥ prakaraṇe
tatra sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa sattve utkarṣaḥ
yathā darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa āmnāta pūṣa anumantraṇa mantra ādeḥ yāga anumantraṇa samākhyāyām eva sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka tvāt

original: utkarṣasyāpyasaṃbhave prakaraṇa eva jaghanyārthe viniyogaḥ yathā manotādau /
analyzed: utkarṣasya api asaṃbhave prakaraṇe eva jaghanya arthe viniyogaḥ yathā manotā ādau
a prayukta lakṣaṇa ādinā tasya api asaṃbhave tad artha abhidhānasya eva adṛṣṭārtha tvam
yathā japa ādau
iti prathamam mukhya arthe eva mantra viniyoga adhikaraṇam
yadi api śabda tva sāmānyāt śruti viniyoga nirūpaṇa anantaram vākya ādi viniyoga nirūpaṇam kartum yuktam

original: tathāpi pūrvapūrvapramāṇakalpanena viniyojakatayā tatsāpekṣatvena liṅgaviniyogopayoginirūpaṇaṃ pūrvamāvaśyakam /
analyzed: tathā api pūrva pūrva pramāṇa kalpanena viniyojaka tayā tad sāpekṣa tvena liṅga viniyoga upayogi nirūpaṇam pūrvam āvaśyakam
ataeva śruti sāpekṣa tvāt tad nirūpaṇa uttaram avasaraḥ krama prāptatvāt iti avasara saṅgatim
pāda antara tvāt anantara saṅgati abhāve pi akṣatim ca abhisaṃdhāya nirūpaṇīya tvena pāda artham
pratijānīte evam iti
yadi api śruteḥ api asamartha viniyojaka tva asaṃbhavāt sāmarthya kalpaka tvam āvaśyakam
tathā api liṅga jñānam purodhāya na śruteḥ viniyoktṛ tā
śruti jñānam purodhāya liṅgam tu viniyojakam

original: iti nyāyena śrutyā kalpitayāsamarthasyāpi viniyogānna sāmarthyāpekṣā atastaduttaramevāsyāvasaro na pūrvamityadhunāpadena sūcitam /
analyzed: iti nyāyena śrutyā kalpitayā asamarthasya api viniyogāt na sāmarthya apekṣā atas tad uttaram eva asya avasaraḥ na pūrvam iti adhunāpadena sūcitam
liṅga upayogī iti
tena vakṣyamāṇa svarūpa liṅgasya vastu sāmarthya mantra sāmarthya ubhayavidhasya madhye

original: prathamāntye vastusāmarthyasya pramāṇatvena nirūpitasyaiva prakāraviśeṣacintāyā asaṃbhave

analyzed: mantra adhikaraṇe mantra sāmarthyasya artha prakāśana artha tvena viniyojaka tayā nirūpitasya
prasaṅgāt tu vastu sāmarthyasya nirūpaṇam
ataeva aindī adhikaraṇe śruti viniyoga vicāre pi pūrva adhikaraṇa vyutpādita mukhya artha viniyoga apavāda karaṇāt tasya āpavādika saṅgatyā saṅgata tvāt na
kṣatiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tasya lakṣaṇam āha tatra liṅgam iti
atra ca kvacid uddeśya tā ākṛti kāraka tā vāci padayoḥ anyatara vāci pada kalpana kvacid ca ubhaya vāci pada kalpanā iti draṣṭavyam
tatra ādya sthalam udāharati yathā iti
ataeva saṃskāra vidhi anyathā anupapatti kalpita viniyoga sthale saṃskāra niṣṭha ubhaya vāci pada kalpanā anukūlā yogyatā jñeyā iti bhāvaḥ
evam mantra gata liṅga sthale pi ubhaya vāci pada kalpanā anukūla tvam darśayati evam iti
atra ca viśvajit vidheḥ svarga bhāvya tva vāci pada kalpanā anukūla yogyatāvat tve pi viniyojaka tva abhāva pradarśanāya aṅgatva pramāṇa tva sūcanāya ca aṅgatva ghaṭakībhūtā iti uktam
sācā iti
tasyāḥ ca anyathā anupapatti rūpa tvāt vyatirekavyāpti vidhayā dvitīya anta ādi pada rūpa śruti kalpana dvārā tad artha viniyoge pramāṇa tvam iti arthaḥ

original: tatra darśapūrṇamāsādiprakaraṇe samāmnātānāṃ śrutyaviniyuktānāṃ mantrāṇāmadhikārākhyaprakaraṇātkratusaṃbandhe 'vagate dvāramātraviśeṣe liṅgena  #
analyzed: tatra darśa pūrṇamāsa ādi prakaraṇe samāmnātānām śruti a viniyuktānām mantrāṇām adhikāra ākhya prakaraṇāt kratu saṃbandhe vagate dvāra mātra viśeṣe liṅgena
viniyogaḥ kriyate

original: tatrāpi yogyatārūpasya liṅgasya satyapi devadattasya pākayogyatve ākāṅkṣābhāve pāke viniyogādarśanādākāṅkṣāpi sahakāriṇī /
analyzed: tatra api yogyatā rūpasya liṅgasya sati api devadattasya pāka yogya tve ākāṅkṣā abhāve pāke viniyoga adarśanāt ākāṅkṣā api sahakāriṇī
sā ca yathā eva mantra prakaraṇinoḥ tathā dvārasya api
tad abhāve pi saṃbandha anupapatteḥ

original: evañca yathaiva mukhyasya kuśacchedanasya smārakākāṅkṣayā tadaṅgatvena “barhirdevasadanami“ti mantro viniyujyata evetyabhipretya pūrvapakṣamāha  #
analyzed: evam ca yathā eva mukhyasya kuśa chedanasya smāraka ākāṅkṣayā tad aṅga tvena barhiḥ deva sadanam iti mantraḥ viniyujyate eva iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣam āha
kratu prakaraṇa iti

original: nanu mukhyārthānupapattyabhāvātkathaṃ gauṇārthābhidhānena tatra viniyoga ityata āha ------ yaṣṭīriti //
analyzed: nanu mukhya artha anupapatti abhāvāt katham gauṇa artha abhidhānena tatra viniyogaḥ iti atas āha yaṣṭīḥ iti
yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya iti atra mukhya artha ābādhe tātparya mātreṇa lakṣaṇa adarśanāt iha api ākāṅkṣā ādi rūpa tātparya grāhaka sattve tad upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: mukhya evārthe mantraprakaraṇadvārā ākāṅkṣāmātrasahakṛtena liṅgena śīghraṃ śrutikalpane
analyzed: mukhye eva arthe mantra prakaraṇa dvārā ākāṅkṣā mātra sahakṛtena liṅgena śīghram śruti kalpane
vilambita tvāt gauṇa artha niṣṭha ākāṅkṣāyāḥ ca mantra vat smṛti kāraṇatayā kḷpta tvena viśiṣṭaiḥ dhyāna ādi upāya antaraiḥ api
nivṛtti siddheḥ viniyogaḥ na gauṇe
naca gauṇa mukhya artha niṣṭhā ākāṅkṣayoḥ mantra niyāmaka tve vinigamana avirahaḥ

original: gauṇārthaśābdabodhaṃ iti śakyasaṃbandhagrahasya hetutvena śakyopasthityāṃ prāthamikatvāttanniṣṭhākāṅkṣyā
analyzed: gauṇa artha śābda bodham iti śakya saṃbandha grahasya hetu tvena śakya upasthityām prāthamika tvāt tad niṣṭha ākāṅkṣyā
viniyuktasya mantrasya nairākāṅkṣye sati anyatara ākāṅkṣayā paścāt pratīyamāna gauṇa artha saṃbandha anupapatteḥ iti abhipretya
siddhāntam āha śakya saṃbandha iti
etena mukhya artha pratyāyana dvārā gauṇe pi śakti upapatteḥ gauṇa sādhāraṇa eka viniyojaka śruti kalpanena aviśeṣāt ubhayatra viniyogaḥ iti api
anuṣṭheya tvena avagate padārthe smāraka apekṣiṇi liṅgena mantra viniyogāt anyonya anapekṣāṇām eva

original: mantraviniyojakaśrutikalpanāyā āvaśyakatve mukhyer'the punaḥ śrutikalpanāyāḥ prāthamikatvāt
analyzed: mantra viniyojaka śruti kalpanāyāḥ āvaśyaka tve mukhya ṛthe punar śruti kalpanāyāḥ prāthamika tvāt
tayā eva nairākāṅkṣyāt punar śruti kalpanāyāḥ asaṃbhavāt

original: yato mukhyārthasya prāthamikatvena tatraiva śrutikalpanayā nairākāṅkṣyam,
analyzed: yatas mukhya arthasya prāthamika tvena tatra eva śruti kalpanayā nairākāṅkṣyam

original: ataeva tadanurodhenārthikavidhiṃ prakalpyāpi tatraiva viniyogakalpanā, natu gauṇe /
analyzed: ataeva tad anurodhena ārthika vidhim prakalpya api tatra eva viniyoga kalpanā na tu gauṇe

original: yathā ------- “aśvinostvā bāhubhyāṃ rādhyāsaṃ” ityatra pratyakṣagrahaṇavidhyabhāve 'pi tadvidhikalpanayā tatraiva mukhyer'the viniyogo vakṣyata  #
analyzed: yathā aśvinoḥ tvā bāhubhyām rādhyāsam iti atra pratyakṣa grahaṇa vidhi abhāve tad vidhi kalpanayā tatra eva mukhya ṛthe viniyogaḥ vakṣyata
iti āha atas eva iti

original: nanu --------- kathaṃ prakaraṇe pūṣadevatāyā abhāve mukhyārthabādhe sati pūṣānumantraṇamantrādīnāṃ
analyzed: nanu katham prakaraṇe pūṣa devatāyāḥ abhāve mukhya artha bādhe sati pūṣa anumantraṇa mantra ādīnām

original: gauṇyā vṛttyāgnirūpārthaparatayā gauṇer'the na viniyoga ityāśaṅkāṃ tatrāviniyogapratipādanena
analyzed: gauṇyā vṛttyā agni rūpa artha para tayā gauṇa īrthe na viniyogaḥ iti āśaṅkām tatra aviniyoga pratipādanena
nirasyati yatra tu iti

original: prakaraṇena durbalena liṅgabādhāyogānna tatra prakaraṇa eva gauṇārthe viniyogaḥ;
analyzed: prakaraṇena durbalena liṅga bādhā yogāt na tatra prakaraṇe eva gauṇa arthe viniyogaḥ

original: apitu yatra pūṣā devatā cāturmāsye tatraivotkarṣaḥ;
analyzed: apitu yatra pūṣā devatā cāturmāsye tatra eva utkarṣaḥ

original: upāṃśuyājīyayājyānāṃ viṣṇvādidevatāyāḥ prakaraṇe abhāve utkarṣāpattiṃ vārayituṃ --- virodhītyuktam /
analyzed: upāṃśuyājīya yājyānām viṣṇu ādi devatāyāḥ prakaraṇe abhāve utkarṣa āpattim vārayitum virodhi iti uktam
tatra āgneya ādi yāge niveśa asaṃbhave pi aśruta devatā upāṃśuyāje devatā vidhi kalpanena niveśa upapatteḥ
ataeva vasanta ādi anumantraṇa mantra vat upāṃśuyāje pūṣa devatā vidhi kalpanā anupapatteḥ āgneya ādiṣu guṇa antara sattvāt utkarṣaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
atra ca vastu sāmarthya rūpasya liṅgasya sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa nirapekṣasya eva viniyojaka tvam
yathā artha jñānasya kratu aṅga tve
mantra gata liṅgasya tu tad sāpekṣa tayā tat
anyathā kratu aṅga bhūta irthe mantra viniyoga abhāve karma apūrva sādhanatva anapekṣāyām devatāyāḥ
viniyoga āpatteḥ naiṣphalya prasaṅgeṇa liṅga mātrāt aṅga tva anupapatteḥ iti sūcayitum liṅga krama sāmākhyānāt iti adhikaraṇa vakṣyamāṇam upajīvya sāmānya
saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa sattve iti uktam

original: ata evoktaṃ sāṃpradāyikaiḥ ---- yadantareṇa yanna saṃbhavatyeva tasya tadaṅgatvaṃ tadanapekṣam /
analyzed: atas eva uktam sāṃpradāyikaiḥ yat antareṇa yat na saṃbhavati eva tasya tad aṅga tvam tad anapekṣam
yad antareṇa yat saṃbhavati tasya tad artha tvam sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa sāpekṣa tvam iti

original: tataścāsya yadyapi na prakaraṇaṃ sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakaṃ pramāṇam;
analyzed: tatas ca asya yadi api na prakaraṇam sāmānya saṃbandha bodhakam pramāṇam
tathā api yāga anumantraṇam iti samākhyāyāḥ tad bodhaka pramāṇasya sattvāt tayā kratu saṃbandhe

original: sāmānyato 'vagate liṅgena dvāraviśeṣaviniyogaḥ kriyata iti nātrāpi śrutimantareṇa
analyzed: sāmānyatas vagate liṅgena dvāra viśeṣa viniyogaḥ kriyate iti na atra api śrutim antareṇa
gauṇa artha viniyoga prasaktiḥ
yadi api prakaraṇāt durbalā iyam samākhyā

original: tathāpi prabalena liṅgena tasya bādhitatvālliṅgena pūṣadevatāprakāśanārthatve 'vagate
analyzed: tathā api prabalena liṅgena tasya bādhita tvāt liṅgena pūṣa devatā prakāśana artha tve vagate
tatra ānarthakya prasaktau apūrva sādhanatva lakṣaṇa a tātparya grāhaka tayā upayujyate iti
prabala liṅga upaṣṭabdha tvāt prabalā iti bhāvaḥ
tat uktam yāga anumantraṇāni iti samākhyā kratu yāyinī
tasmāt śakti anusāreṇa prāptiḥ tad devate kratau
iti
utkarṣasya api iti
kevala agni prakāśakasya manotā mantrasya kevala agni devatya yāga saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa antarasya abhāvāt liṅga mātreṇa
tatra utkarṣasya asaṃbhave prakaraṇa avagata kratu saṃbandha nirvāhāya tatra eva agni padena agnīṣoma lakṣaṇayā
jaghanya arthe viniyogaḥ iti arthaḥ
yadā tu ānarthakya tad aṅga nyāya sahakṛta jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇam eva jyotiṣṭomīya paśu aṅgam eṣaḥ iti sāmānya saṃbandha bodhakam iti liṅgāt āgneya savanīya paśau utkarṣaḥ

original: tadātu “yadyapyanyadevatyaḥ paśurāgneyyeva manotā kārye“ti vākye tṛtīyādyaśravaṇena
analyzed: tadā tu yadi api anya devatyaḥ paśuḥ āgneyyā eva manotā kāryā iti vākye tṛtīya ādi a śravaṇena
śruti tva asaṃbhavāt vākyasya ca liṅga bādhya tvena utkarṣa niṣedha prāptau api eva kārasya kāryā eva iti evam
vyavahita anvayena evakāra śrutyā

original: athavā vakṣyamāṇarītyā brāhmaṇavākyatvena prābalyālliṅgabādhopapattyā utkarṣaniṣedhādutkarṣasyāpyasaṃbhava iti vyākhyeyam /
analyzed: athavā vakṣyamāṇa rītyā brāhmaṇa vākya tvena prābalyāt liṅga bādha upapattyā utkarṣa niṣedhāt utkarṣasya api asaṃbhavaḥ iti vyākhyeyam

original: yadyapyasya vākyasya āgneyīpadasamabhivyāhṛtaivakāreṇa vāyavye paśau codakaprāptāgneyamantrasya
analyzed: yadi api asya vākyasya āgneyī pada samabhivyāhṛta evakāreṇa vāyavye paśau ca udaka prāpta āgneya mantrasya
sthāne āgneya mantra prasakti rūpa ūha niṣedhaka tva upapattyā na utkarṣa niṣedhaka tvam iti abhipretya eva
manotāyām tu vacanāt avikāraḥ iti dāśamika adhikaraṇa pravṛttiḥ
tathā api asya vākyasya utkarṣa niṣedhaka tvena prākaraṇika phala artha tva saṃbhave prākaraṇika phala artha tva kalpanā yogāt utkarṣa niṣedhaka tvam eva yuktam

original: dāśamikādhikaraṇaṃ jyotiṣṭome āgneyaḥ paśurneti kṛtvācintayā draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: dāśamika adhikaraṇam jyotiṣṭome āgneyaḥ paśuḥ na iti kṛtvā a cintayā draṣṭavyam
ataeva uktam tantraratne tathā asatya prasakta utkarṣa niṣedha ayogāt ukta vacanasya anūha paratvam iti
atas yuktam uktam yathā manotā ādau iti
prayojana mulapa tṛṇa chedane barhiḥ deva sadanam iti mantraḥ pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte na iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti prathamam mukhya arthe eva liṅga viniyoga adhikaraṇam
a pā vacanāt

original: yatra tu gauṇārthe tātparyagrāhakaṃ vacanaṃ vidyate ------ yathā agnau,
analyzed: yatra tu gauṇa arthe tātparya grāhakam vacanam vidyate yathā agnau
kadācana starīḥ asi iti aindyā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate ityādau
tatra gauṇaḥ eva gārhapatye viniyogaḥ

original: athaindyetyupakramastha taddhitaśrutyā mukhyasāmarthyojjīvanājjaghanyadvitīyāyā eva tadanurodhena pratiyogitve lakṣaṇā gārhapatyasamīpe sthitveti,
analyzed: atha aindyā iti upakrama stha taddhita śrutyāḥ mukhya sāmarthya ujjīvanāt jaghanya dvitīyāyāḥ eva tad anurodhena pratiyogi tve lakṣaṇā gārhapatya samīpe sthitvā iti

original: guṇabhūtaprātipadika eva vā yajñasādhanatvasādṛśyādgauṇyā gṛhapatimattvayogena vendraprakāśakatvam /
analyzed: guṇa bhūta prātipadike eva vā yajña sādhanatva sādṛśyāt gauṇyā gṛhapatimattva yogena vā indra prakāśaka tvam

original: astu vā rūḍhatvādagnereva dhātuvācyasamīpasthitiṃ prati karmatvam,
analyzed: astu vā rūḍha tvāt agneḥ eva dhātu vācya samīpa sthitim prati karma tvam
na tu mantra sādhya abhidhānam prati
tasya a śābda tvāt
na ca upāt mantra karaṇe iti smṛtyā ātmanepada vidhānena dhātoḥ mantra karaṇa arthaka tva avagateḥ tasya abhidhāna lakṣaka tva avagatiḥ
ātmanepada balena samīpa sthiteḥ abhidhāna prayojana ka tva avagateḥ mantrasya sva sādhya abhidhāna aṅgatva saṃbandhena samīpa sthiti viśeṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ abhidhāna lakṣaṇāyām
pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: ataśca śakyārtha eva samīpasthitau gārhapatyasya karmatvam,
analyzed: atas ca śakya arthe eva samīpa sthitau gārhapatyasya karma tvam
indrasya tu ārthike bhidhāne iti na virodhaḥ

original: yathā cāsya dhātoḥ sakarmakatvaṃ tathā kaustubha eva prapañcitam /
analyzed: yathā ca asya dhātoḥ sakarmaka tvam tathā kaustubhe eva prapañcitam

original: ataḥ kathaṃ mantrasya gauṇer'the viniyoga iti cenna;
analyzed: atas katham mantrasya gauṇa ṛthe viniyogaḥ iti ced na
aindyā iti taddhitena eka pade viśeṣya tayā pratipādyamānasya mantrasya cayana anupayogi indra aṅgatva bodhaka tva anupapatteḥ

original: atastasya śakyabodhakālīnendraprakāśakatvānuvādatvenāpyupapatterna dvitīyādau tadbalena lakṣaṇāśrayaṇaṃ rūḍhityāgo vā /
analyzed: atas tasya śakya bodha kālīna indra prakāśaka tva anuvāda tvena api upapatteḥ na dvitīya ādau tad balena lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇam rūḍhi tyāgaḥ vā
na ca samīpa sthitim prati agneḥ karma tvam
tathātve tasya abhidhānam prati api aṅgatve uddeśya aneka tva kṛta vākya bheda āpatteḥ ātmanepada virodhena
ca dhātunā eva sva śakya artha viśiṣṭa abhidhāna lakṣaṇa avaśyambhāvāt viśeṣya bhūte bhidhāna

original: eva mantrasya karaṇatvapratītergārhapatyasya ca cayanasaṃskāryasya karmatvapratīterarthācca
analyzed: eva mantrasya karaṇa tva pratīteḥ gārhapatyasya ca cayana saṃskāryasya karma tva pratīteḥ arthāt ca
sāmīpya pratiyogi tvena tasya eva grahaṇa upapatteḥ tātparya grāhaka brāhmaṇa anurodhena mantrasya eva

original: gauṇyā vṛttyā gārhapatye viniyoga iti siddham // 2 // 17 //
analyzed: gauṇyā vṛttyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ iti siddham
iti dvitīyam śruti vaśāt gauṇe pi arthe mantra viniyoga adhikaraṇam

original: liṅgasya mukhyārtha eva viniyojakatve ukte aindyāṃ liṅgasya gauṇer'the viniyojakaśrutisahāyatayāpi
analyzed: liṅgasya mukhya arthe eva viniyojaka tve ukte aindyām liṅgasya gauṇa ṛthe viniyojaka śruti sahāya tayā api
prasaktasya viniyojaka tva abhāvasya iha apavāda karaṇāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim tathā
saṃśayam pūrva adhikaraṇa siddhāntena eva pūrvapakṣa utthānāt pārthakyena pūrvapakṣam ca
spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā vacanāt tu iti yathāsūtram siddhāntam eva pratijānīte yatra tu iti

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa “niveśanaḥ saṅgamano vasūnāṃ viśvārūpābhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa niveśanaḥ saṅgamanaḥ vasūnām viśvārūpā abhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ

original: deva iva savitā satyadharmendrasya samare vasūnāmityaindyā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate” ityudāhṛtam /
analyzed: devaḥ iva savitā satya dharmā indrasya samare vasūnām iti aindyā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate iti udāhṛtam

original: tadupamānārthīyena nakāreṇaindrasyopamānatayā nirdeśādindrasyāprādhānyāvagateḥ “dhruvodhvarastathā soma āpaścaivānilo nalaḥ /
analyzed: tad upamāna arthīyena nakāreṇa aindrasya upamāna tayā nirdeśāt indrasya a prādhānya avagateḥ dhruvaḥ udhvaraḥ tathā somaḥ āpaḥ ca eva anilaḥ nalaḥ
pratyūṣaḥ ca prabhāsaḥ ca vasavaḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
iti anala śabda vācyasya agneḥ vasu tva smaraṇāt uktānām madhye gniḥ nāma vasuḥ indraḥ iva

original: saṃgrāme sthitavānityagnistutipratīteḥ “vasūnāṃ pāvakaścāsmī” ti cāgnereva vasuśreṣṭhatvasmaraṇāt
analyzed: saṃgrāme sthitavān iti agni stuti pratīteḥ vasūnām pāvakaḥ ca asmi iti ca agneḥ eva vasu śreṣṭha tva smaraṇāt
tad samīpe nyeṣām vasūnām saṅgamanāt vasu saṃgamana tvena api agneḥ eva stuti pratīteḥ aindrī tvena udāhārya tva anupapatteḥ ayukta
miti upekṣya bala abala adhikaraṇa bhāṣya likhita śākhā antara patitam aindra mantram udāharati
yathā agnau kadācana iti

original: tataśca tasya mantraliṅgasya svarasato gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśrutyupaṣṭambhakatayā siddhāntaviparītatvānnodāharaṇatvam //
analyzed: tatas ca tasya mantra liṅgasya svarasataḥ gārhapatyam iti dvitīyā śruti upaṣṭambhaka tayā siddhānta viparīta tvāt na udāharaṇa tvam

original: yattu -------- nyāyasudhākṛtā balābalādhikaraṇe śrutyā liṅgabādhasya vakṣyamāṇatvānmantrasya
analyzed: yat tu nyāyasudhākṛtā balābalādhikaraṇe śrutyāḥ liṅga bādhasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt mantrasya
sva rasa sāmarthya an ālocanena eva devatā artha taddhita śrutyā prādhānya avagamāt rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham iti
vat ca ananya carita tvena indrasya api indra upamāna rūpa stuti saṃbhavāt tad udāharaṇa upapattiḥ iti uktam
tad mantrasya sva rasa sāmarthya tyāgena svasya eva sva upamānaka tva kalpanayā gauṇa sāmarthyam ādāya
aindrī tva upapādane tasya taddhita śruti upaṣṭambhaka tvena taddhita śruti apaṣṭabdha liṅgena
kāraka śruti saṃkoca anupapatteḥ pūrvapakṣa ayogāt mantra svarasa sāmarthya ālocanena agni prakāśaka tvasya eva āpattyā
gauṇa artha viniyoga rūpa siddhānta viparīta tvāt ayuktam
na ca kadācana iti pṛthak udāharaṇe bala abala adhikaraṇena paunaruktyam

original: iha śrutisahāyena gauṇārtheviniyoge upapādite tatra kevalaliṅgamātreṇa aindyaṅgatvamapyastu iti śaṅkāyā nirasanīyatvena tatparihāropapatteḥ,
analyzed: iha śruti sahāyena gauṇa arthe viniyoge upapādite tatra kevala liṅga mātreṇa aindī aṅgatvam api astu iti śaṅkāyāḥ nirasanīya tvena tad parihāra upapatteḥ
atas idam eva udāhṛtam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
gārhapatye iti
agnau iti śeṣaḥ

original: gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśrutyā virodhaṃ darśayituṃ pūrvapakṣī pratyavatiṣṭhate -------- atheti //
analyzed: gārhapatyam iti dvitīyā śrutyā virodham darśayitum pūrvapakṣī pratyavatiṣṭhate atha iti
sthitvā iti iti
iti śabdena aindram prakāśayet iti śeṣa pūraṇam sūcitam

original: gṛhapaterayamiti vyutpattyā gārhapatyaśabda indramapyabhivadituṃ samartha ityāha -------- gṛhapatimattvayogeneti //
analyzed: gṛhapateḥ ayam iti vyutpattyā gārhapatya śabdaḥ indram api abhivaditum samarthaḥ iti āha gṛhapatimattva yogena iti
gṛhapati saṃbandhi tva yogena iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ------- vācyasya tiṣṭhatidhātvarthasyākarmakatvātkathaṃ tatra karmatvenāgneranvaya ityata āha -------- yathācāsyeti //
analyzed: nanu vācyasya tiṣṭhati dhātvarthasya akarmaka tvāt katham tatra karmatvena agneḥ anvayaḥ iti atas āha yathā ca asya iti
akarmakāt ca iti etad uttara sūtreṇa akarmakāt tiṣṭhateḥ ātmanepada vidhānena asmin sūtre tiṣṭhati vācyasya api arthasya
sāmīpya rūpa phala avacchinna tvena sakarmaka tva vivakṣaṇena sāmīpyasya pratiyogitā saṃbandhena agni āśraya tvena agneḥ
karmatvena anvaya upapattiḥ iti kaustubhe prapañcitam iti arthaḥ
dvitīyā śrutyā gārhapatya artha tva avagamena na mukhya artha viniyoga saṃbhavaḥ
yogyatā jñāna abhāve pi pratibandhakībhūta ayogyatā niścaya abhāva mātreṇa śabda bodhasya
saṃbhavena śrauta viniyoga upapatteḥ tasya eva balavataḥ tātparya grāhakasya sattvena mantra gata aindra śabde
yajña sādhanatva sādṛśya ādi dhātvartha ayogāt vā jaghanya vṛtti āśrayaṇe bādhaka abhāvāt

original: nahi dvitīyāśrutyā gārhapatyāṅgatvabodhasyeva taddhitaśrutyā mantrasyendrāṅgatvabodhaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: nahi dvitīyā śrutyā gārhapatya aṅgatva bodhasya iva taddhita śrutyā mantrasya indra aṅgatva bodhaḥ saṃbhavati
taddhita uktasya prādhānyena pratipādya tva rūpa devatā tvasya viśeṣya tayā pratipādya mantram

original: prati viśeṣaṇatayā pratīyamānatvena viparītaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvakalpanāṃ vinā indrāṅgatvasya
analyzed: prati viśeṣaṇatayā pratīyamāna tvena viparīta viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva kalpanām vinā indra aṅga tvasya
śīghram apratīteḥ indra uddeśena mantra vidhau eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpatteḥ ca
indrasya cayane n upayogena uddeśya tva anupapatteḥ ca
atas taddhita śrutyā dvitīyā śruti bādhā yogāt gārhapatya abhidhāna arthatvam eva yuktam iti abhipretya dūṣayati na iti
atas tasya iti
taddhitasya iti arthaḥ
rūḍhi tyāge iti

original: gārhapatyaśabdasya “saṃjñāyāṃ dhenuṣyā” ityataḥ saṃjñāyāmityanuvṛttau “gṛhapatinā saṃyukteñyaḥ” ityanuśāsanena ñyapratyayāntatvenāgnau rūḍhatvapratīterna  #
analyzed: gārhapatya śabdasya saṃjñāyām dhenuṣyāḥ iti atas saṃjñāyām iti anuvṛttau gṛhapatinā iti anuśāsanena ñya pratyaya anta tvena agnau rūḍha tva pratīteḥ na
tyāgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yattu samīpasthitiṃ prati gārhapatyasya karmatvamabhidhānaṃ prati indrasyetyuktaṃ tadanūdya dūṣayati --------- naceti //
analyzed: yat tu samīpa sthitim prati gārhapatyasya karma tvam abhidhānam prati indrasya iti uktam tat anūdya dūṣayati na ca iti
tathātve iti
asmin ca pakṣe mantrasya aupacārika karaṇa tva āpatteḥ samīpa sthiteḥ ca gārhapatya saṃskāra artha tve
indra abhidhāna artha tva ayogāt mantrasya tad dvārā aupacārika karaṇa tvasya api anupapatteḥ ātmanepada anurodhena
vā indra abhidhāna arthatva aṅgīkāre gārhapatyasya agre upayogena īpsita tvāt saktu vat anīpsita karmatva aṅgīkāre
ca uddeśya aneka tva nimitta vākya bheda āpatteḥ tṛtīyā antam dvitīyā antam ca padam yathāśrutam aṅgīkṛtya
ātmanepada tātparya grāhaka anurodhena dhātunā eva sva śakya artha viśiṣṭa abhidhāna lakṣaṇayā

original: tatraiva gārhapatyasya karmatvena mantrasyaca karaṇatvenānvayāṅgīkāro yuktaḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva gārhapatyasya karma tvena mantrasya ca karaṇa tvena anvaya aṅgīkāraḥ yuktaḥ
gārhapatyasya ca sādhana tvena upayoga abhāve pi saṃskārya tvena tad sattvāt abhidhāna karma tva upapattyā

original: tadanurodhena mantragatendrapadasya gārhapatyaparatvaṃ kathañcidāśritya siddhaḥ śrutibalādgauṇārthaviniyoga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad anurodhena mantra gata indra padasya gārhapatya paratvam kathañcid āśritya siddhaḥ śruti balāt gauṇa artha viniyogaḥ iti arthaḥ
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti dvitīyam liṅgasya śruti balāt gauṇa arthe viniyojaka tva adhikaraṇam
aindī adhikaraṇam
a pā tathā
darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ haviṣkṛt ehi iti tris avaghnan āhvayati iti śrutam
tatra na ayam mantraḥ āhvāna aṅgam
tasya patnī eva haviṣkṛt upottiṣṭhati sā devān abhidrutya āvahanti iti vacana anusāreṇa abhāva pratīteḥ
atas iti karaṇena avaghāta aṅgam eva
atas ca asmin vākye tris abhyāsa puṃstva mantra viśiṣṭa avaghāta vidhiḥ eva
patnī vākye ca guṇāt eva karma antara vidhiḥ
tayoḥ ca avaghātayoḥ vrīhīn avahanti iti anena saṃskārya saṃbandhe dṛṣṭārtha tvāt vikalpaḥ
patnī kartṛke vaghāte ca avarakṣodivas iti mantraḥ

original: ataścānena vākyenāvaghāte gauṇa evāyaṃ mantro viniyujyate /
analyzed: atas ca anena vākyena avaghāte gauṇaḥ eva ayam mantraḥ viniyujyate

original: āhvayatiśca tadācaṣṭe ityevaṃ śakyārthabodhakālīnāhvānaprakāśanānuvāda iti prāpte
analyzed: āhvayatiḥ ca tat ācaṣṭe iti evam śakya artha bodha kālīna āhvāna prakāśana anuvādaḥ iti prāpte

original: -------- mukhya evāhvāne viniyogasaṃbhave mantrasyāhvayatipadasya ca gauṇatvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: mukhye eva āhvāne viniyoga saṃbhave mantrasya āhvayati padasya ca gauṇa tva kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt
māntravarṇika viniyoga vidhi kalpanayā sadhyāsam ityādinā grahaṇa ādeḥ iva āhvānasya api niyamena prāpta tvāt

original: patnyevetyasya tu nāyamartho yatsvayamevottiṣṭhati na tvāhūteti,
analyzed: patnī eva iti asya tu na ayam arthaḥ yat svayam eva uttiṣṭhati na tu āhūtā iti
apitu patnī eva na anyā iti
atas na idam api tad abhāva bodhakam

original: ataścāhvāne mantrasya liṅgādeva prāptatvādāhvānasya ca sahāyārthatvenāvaghātakāla eva prāpteravaghnannityasyāpyanuvādakatvāt kevalaṃ trirabhyāsamātraṃ
analyzed: atas ca āhvāne mantrasya liṅgāt eva prāptatvāt āhvānasya ca sahāya artha tvena avaghāta kāle eva prāpteḥ avaghnan ityasya api anuvādaka tvāt kevalam tris abhyāsa mātram

original: trirabhyāsapuṃstvaviśiṣṭāvaghātasamānakālataiva vāhvānoddeśena vidhīyata iti na gauṇe 'vaghāte viniyogaḥ // 3 // 18 //
analyzed: tris abhyāsa puṃstva viśiṣṭa avaghāta samāna kālatā eva vā āhvāna uddeśena vidhīyate iti na gauṇe vaghāte viniyogaḥ
iti tṛtīyam haviṣkṛt adhikaraṇam
darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti
siddhānte mantrasya liṅgāt āhvāna aṅga tve sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa pradarśanāya darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti uktam
haviṣkṛt ehi iti

original: devānāmarthe yā haviḥ saṃpādayati sā patnī haviṣkṛttāmenāṃ saṃbodhya adhvaryurehīti brūte /
analyzed: devānām arthe yā haviḥ saṃpādayati sā patnī haviṣkṛt tām enām saṃbodhya adhvaryuḥ ehi iti brūte
tam imam mantram adhvaryuḥ tris uccārya avaghātam kurvan āhvayati iti arthaḥ

original: atraca yathā śrutyā pūrvādhikaraṇe gauṇārthaviniyogo mantrasyoktaḥ,
analyzed: atra ca yathā śrutyā pūrva adhikaraṇe gauṇa artha viniyogaḥ mantrasya uktaḥ
tadvat eva vākyena api tatra prasaktasya viniyogasya ūha apavāda karaṇāt āpavādakīm anantara saṅgatim ca

original: spaṣṭatvādanuktvā pūrvasiddhāntahetuparasūtragataṃ tathāśabdaṃ vyākhyāsyan pūrvapakṣamāha ------- tatreti //
analyzed: spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrva siddhānta hetu para sūtra gatam tathāśabdam vyākhyāsyan pūrvapakṣam āha tatra iti

original: “patnyeva haviṣkṛdupottiṣṭhati devān ṛṣīn pitṝn sābhidrutyā'vahantī''ti vākyāntare
analyzed: patnī eva haviṣkṛt upottiṣṭhati devān ṛṣīn pitṝn sā abhidrutya āvahanti iti vākya antare
patnī svayam evā uttiṣṭhati na āhūtā iti arthaka evakāreṇa pakṣa prāpta āhvāna niyama abhāva pratīteḥ āhvāna vidhi antarasya anyathā siddhasya adarśanāt avihita āhvāna smāraka tayā
mantrasya aṅga tvena vidhāna anupapattim tāvat darśayati tasya patnī eva iti

original: etena ------- mantre trirabhyāsavidheḥ sahāyārthatvāt tasya prāptāvaghātakālānuvāda ityapi --------- apāstam;
analyzed: etena mantre tris abhyāsa vidheḥ sahāya artha tvāt tasya prāpta avaghāta kāla anuvādaḥ iti api apāstam
āhvāna aṅga tayā mantrasya aprāpteḥ tatra tris abhyāsa vṛtti anupapatteḥ kāla lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ ca

original: ataḥ pariśeṣāt “lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyā” iti sūtreṇa prayojakatvāparaparyāyahetāvapi śatṛpratyayasmṛterabhicaranyajatītivanmantrasyāvaghātabhāvanāṅgatvameva;
analyzed: atas pariśeṣāt lakṣaṇa hetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti sūtreṇa prayojaka tva apara paryāya hetau api śatṛ pratyaya smṛteḥ abhicaran yajati iti vat mantrasya avaghāta bhāvanā aṅga tvam eva

original: kṛdupāttabhāvanāyāmapi kārakānvayasya vyutpannatve sutarāmitikaraṇaparāmṛṣṭamantrasya karaṇatayānvayopapatterityabhipretyāha -------- ata iti
analyzed: kṛt upātta bhāvanāyām api kāraka anvayasya vyutpanna tve sutarām iti karaṇa parāmṛṣṭa mantrasya karaṇatayā anvaya upapatteḥ iti abhipretya āha atas iti
prāpta avaghāta uddeśena tris abhyāsa mantrayoḥ vidhāne vākya bheda āpattim pariharati atas ca iti
avaghātasya vituṣībhāva paryantam anuṣṭhāna āvaśyaka tvena tatra tris abhyāsa vidhi anupapattau api

original: tatra mantradvārā puṃstvasyeva kriyānvayopapatteḥ śākhābhedena kvacintrirabhyāsayuktamantrapāṭhena
analyzed: tatra mantra dvārā puṃstvasya iva kriyā anvaya upapatteḥ śākhā bhedena kvacid tris abhyāsa yukta mantra pāṭhena
tris abhyāsa prāptau api śākhā antare sakṛt pāṭhena api āmnānāt niyama vidhayā tris abhyāsa ādi viśiṣṭa avaghāta vidhiḥ eva
na hi atra patnī vākyena avaghātaḥ prāpyate
tatra samākhyā prāpta adhvaryu kartṛka tvasya patnī kartṛka tvena bādhena avaghnan iti puṃstva anuvāda anupapatteḥ
atas viśiṣṭa vidhānāt na vākya bhedaḥ iti arthaḥ
ataeva guṇāt patnī vākye vaghāta antara vidhiḥ iti āha patnī vākye ca iti

original: atraca “vidhikopaścopadeśe syā” diti siddhāntaguṇasūtreṇa mantrasyāvaghātāṅgatve “ava rakṣo divaḥ sapatna” miti mantrāntarasyāpi pariharati  #
analyzed: atra ca vidhi kopaḥ ca upadeśe syāt iti siddhānta guṇa sūtreṇa mantrasya avaghāta aṅga tve ava rakṣaḥ divaḥ sapatnam iti mantra antarasya api pariharati
patnī kartṛkā iti
evam ca āhvayati para liṅga viśiṣṭa avaghāta vidhiḥ
dhātuḥ ākhyāta aṃśaḥ ca anuvādaḥ iti abhipretya upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: nanu avaghātasyācetanasya haviṣkṛttvānupapatteḥ sutarāñceti śabdārthānvayānupapatteravaghāte mantrasyāsāmarthyātkathaṃ viniyoga ityata āha  #
analyzed: nanu avaghātasya acetanasya haviṣkṛt tva anupapatteḥ sutarān ca iti śabda artha anvaya anupapatteḥ avaghāte mantrasya asāmarthyāt katham viniyogaḥ iti atas āha
gauṇaḥ eva ayam iti
gauṇa tva upapādanam iti
acetane svātantrya lakṣaṇa kartṛ tva asaṃbhave pi sthālī pacati iti vat vaivakṣikeṇa svātantryeṇa

original: kartṛtvopapattyā haviṣkṛttvasaṃbhavāttatraiva cetanatvamāropya avaghāta tvamehi saṃpanno
analyzed: kartṛ tva upapattyā haviṣkṛt tva saṃbhavāt tatra eva cetana tvam āropya avaghāta tvam ehi saṃpannaḥ
bhava iti arthena haviṣkṛt sthālī saṃbandhi haviḥ saṃpatti hetu lakṣaṇa yogena haviṣkṛt ehi iti anena avaghāta prakāśana upapattiḥ iti
kaustubhe draṣṭavyam iti arthaḥ
mantrasya āhvāna anaṅga tve āhvayati anvaya ayoga śaṅkā parihārāya āha āhvayatiḥ ca iti
haviṣkṛt ehi iti mantreṇa ehi iti śabda uccāraṇāt adhvaryuḥ āhvānam ācaṣṭe iti arthe tat karoti
tat ācaṣṭe iti smṛtyā vyutpādya āhvayati prayoga upapatteḥ śakya artha bodha kālīna āhvāna prakāśana anuvādāt āhvayati anvaya upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
vacanasya mukhya āhvāna saṃbandhena api upapatteḥ mukhya viśeṣya bhūta āhvāna bhāvanā saṃbandhasya abhyarhita tvāt
tris iti asya avaghāte nvaya anupapattyā aśruta mantra pāṭha kriyā viṣaya tva āpatteḥ dhātoḥ
sādhu tva pārārthya viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava ādi āpatteḥ vinā kāraṇam ākhyātasya ācaṣṭe iti artha lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ na avaghāte gauṇe viniyoga

original: kintu āhvāna evetyabhipretya siddhāntamāha ------- mukhya eveti //
analyzed: kintu āhvāne eva iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha mukhyaḥ eva iti
āhvānasya avihita tvāt na tad aṅga tvena mantra vidhiḥ saṃbhavati iti āśaṅkām apākaroti māntravarṇikā iti

original: yathā somapātramagṛhītvāpi somabhakṣaṇaprāpte “raśvinostvā bāhubhyāṃ sadhyāsa” miti mantravarṇaprakāśyatvānupapattyā grahaṇaniyamavidhiṃ prakalpya  #
analyzed: yathā soma pātram a gṛhītvā api soma bhakṣaṇa prāpte raśvinoḥ tvā bāhubhyām sadhyāsam miti mantra varṇa prakāśya tva anupapattyā grahaṇa niyama vidhim prakalpya
tatra mantra viniyogaḥ kalpyate

original: evamihāpi tatprakāśyatvānupapattyā āhvānaniyamavidhikalpanayā āhvānasya vidheyatvāvagamāttadaṅgatvena mantravidhānopapattirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam iha api tad prakāśya tva anupapattyā āhvāna niyama vidhi kalpanayā āhvānasya vidheya tva avagamāt tad aṅga tvena mantra vidhāna upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
etena nitya prāptatve pi prathana ādi vat adhvaryu kartṛkatva siddhi artham āhvānasya api atra vidhiḥ iti nyāyasudhākāra uktam apāstam
vidheya antara sattve saṃbhavat prāptikāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ vidhau gauravāt
mantra pāṭhasya adhvaryu kartṛka tve pṛthak prayatna an āpādye āhvāne dhvaryu kartṛka tvasya api arthataḥ prāpteḥ ca
prathanasya tu tyanta bhinna tvāt kriyā antara rūpa tvena mantrasya ādhvaryava samākhyayā adhvaryu kartṛ tva niyame pi na tad karaṇa tvena ādhvaryava niyamaḥ
sidhyati
āhvānasya tu parāgamana anukūla sva abhiprāya prakāśana rūpa tvāt tasya ca iha mantra vyāpāra rūpa tvena
mantra uccārayitṛ vyatiriktena anuṣṭhātum eva aśakya tvāt mantrasya adhvaryu kartṛka tvena eva

original: āhvānasya tatkartṛkatvasiddhiriti vaiṣamyānna tatsidhdyarthamapi vidhirāvaśyaka ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: āhvānasya tad kartṛka tva siddhiḥ iti vaiṣamyāt na tad sidhdi artham api vidhiḥ āvaśyakaḥ iti arthaḥ
patnī eva iti evakāreṇa āhvāna niyama nivṛtti pratīti āśaṅkām nirasyati patnī eva iti
na anyā iti
etena patnyāḥ vākya antareṇa kartṛ tvena vidhānāt samākhyā prāpta adhvaryu kartṛka tvasya
bādhā avagateḥ adhvaryoḥ ulūkhala kṛṣṇājina an utsarga vidhānāt tad dvāra anvārambha katrṛ tve pi
sahāya artha tvena iti
patnyāḥ bahu padārtha anuṣṭhānena śrāntasya adhvaryoḥ avasara dānena sahāya tvāt anya padārtha kāle tat prāpnoti

original: tathāpi haviṣkṛttvena tadāhvānasya haviṣkaraṇārthatvapratītestasya cāvaghātamārabhya pravṛtteravaghātakāla eva prāptatvādanuvāda ityarthaḥ
analyzed: tathā api haviṣkṛt tvena tad āhvānasya haviṣkaraṇa arthatva pratīteḥ tasya ca avaghātam ārabhya pravṛtteḥ avaghāta kāle eva prāpta tvāt anuvādaḥ iti arthaḥ
yadi api avaghnan iti atra kāla lakṣaṇā āpatati

original: tathāpi “lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ” iti sūtreṇa śatuḥ 'śayānā bhuñjate yavanāḥ' ityatreva
analyzed: tathā api lakṣaṇa hetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti sūtreṇa śatuḥ śayānāḥ bhuñjate yavanāḥ iti atra eva
lakṣaṇa artha tva pratīteḥ avaghāta kartṛ tva avasthā āpannasya āhvāna kartṛ tva avagateḥ anvārambha dvārā
adhvaryu kartṛka vartamāna avaghātasya kālika saṃbandhena āhvāna cihna tva pratīteḥ avaghāta kāle
āhvayati iti arthāt kāla lakṣaṇā
vastutas tu anutsarga mātreṇa avaghāta kartṛ tva asaṃbhavāt anvārambha dvārā tad āśrayaṇe vahantau lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ na ayam lakṣaṇe śatṛ pratyayaḥ
kintu hetau eva
tatas ca avaghāta artham āhvayati iti arthāt āhvāna kartṛ tva samāna adhikaraṇa avaghāta kartṛ tvam
prayojaka tva rūpam eva āśrayitum yuktam iti avaghāta phala āhvānasya avaghāta kāle eva prāpteḥ vinā eva

original: lakṣaṇāmavaghātaṃ kārayannāhvayatītyarthe na kaściddoṣa iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣaṇām avaghātam kārayan āhvayati iti arthe na kaścid doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
yat tu prakāśakārāṇām anvārambha vidhānena avaghāte dhvaryu kartṛ tva upapādanam tat
kasmiṃścid api sūtre patnyā anvārambha vidhi adarśanāt ayuktam iti upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ

original: mama tu pratibhāti ---------- triravaghnanniti siddhānuvādenāvaghāte adhvaryoḥ kartṛtvābhyanujñānādavaghātaṃ
analyzed: mama tu pratibhāti tris avaghnan iti siddha anuvādena avaghāte adhvaryoḥ kartṛ tva abhyanujñānāt avaghātam
kurvatā eva āhūtayā patnyā dvitīya avaghāta anuṣṭhāna upapatteḥ eva kārasya sahāya mātra niṣedhaka tvena ubhaya kartṛ tva avirodha
eva kātyāyana sūtra saṃvādī yuktaḥ
tāvatā api gauṇe vaghāte na mantra viniyogaḥ iti mīmāṃsaka siddhāntasya akṣatiḥ

original: ataeva kātīyānāṃ pūrvamadhvaryukartṛkamavahananamaparaṃ cāhvānottaraṃ patnīkartṛkaṃ cetyanuṣṭhānaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: atas eva kātīyānām pūrvam adhvaryu kartṛkam avahananam aparam ca āhvāna uttaram patnī kartṛkam ca iti anuṣṭhānam dṛśyate
evam ca śatṛ pratyayasya lakṣaṇa tva artha ādi kalpanam api na āśritam bhavati iti
āvituṣībhāvam avaghāta anuṣṭhāne madhye sahāya artham āhvānam dṛṣṭa artham api bhavati iti
tris abhyāsa mātram iti
kriyā abhyāvṛtti gaṇanā arthaka kṛtvā suc pratyaya anta tri śabda balāt āhvāna kriyāyām eva vidhīyate

original: tatraca mantrasya vediprokṣaṇamantranyāyena sahakṛtpāṭhe prāpte 'pi prokṣaṇavadāhvānasya mantrapāṭhātiriktaprayatnānāpādyatvenārthānmantrasyaiva  #
analyzed: tatra ca mantrasya vedi prokṣaṇa mantra nyāyena sahakṛt pāṭhe prāpte pi prokṣaṇa vat āhvānasya mantra pāṭha atirikta prayatna an āpādya tvena arthāt mantrasya eva
tris āvṛttiḥ phalati

original: etena ------- yat nyāyasudhākṛtā vyavahitasaṃbandhamādāya mantrasyaiva trirāvṛttividhānamuktaṃ tat -------- apāstam;
analyzed: etena yat nyāyasudhākṛtā vyavahita saṃbandham ādāya mantrasya eva tris āvṛtti vidhānam uktam tat apāstam

original: trirabhyāsasya śabdato vyavahitasyāpi sucpratyayaśrutyaiva kārakavibhaktiśrutyevāhvānakriyāsaṃbandhalābhādavyavahitenāpi mantreṇa saṃbandhānupapatteḥ
analyzed: tris abhyāsasya śabdataḥ vyavahitasya api suc pratyaya śrutyā eva kāraka vibhakti śrutyā iva āhvāna kriyā saṃbandha lābhāt avyavahitena api mantreṇa saṃbandha anupapatteḥ

original: ata āhvānasya dṛṣṭārthatvāllokavadeva dviḥ triścaturvāpi prāptau trirabhyāsāṃśe 'pi niyamavidhitvalābhāntrirabhyāsa āhvāne vidhīyata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: atas āhvānasya dṛṣṭārtha tvāt loka vat eva dvis tris catuḥ vā api prāptau tris abhyāsa aṃśe pi niyama vidhi tva lābhāt tris abhyāsaḥ āhvāne vidhīyate iti arthaḥ
siddhāntam upasaṃharati iti iti

original: evañca gauṇārthaviniyogasya vākyakṛtasya liṅgena bādhānmukhya evārthe viniyogaḥ /
analyzed: evañca gauṇa artha viniyogasya vākya kṛtasya liṅgena bādhāt mukhyaḥ eva arthe viniyogaḥ

original: aindyāṃ tu śrutyā liṅgabādhādgauṇārthe viniyoga iti siddhamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aindyām tu śrutyāḥ liṅga bādhāt gauṇa arthe viniyogaḥ iti siddham iti arthaḥ

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe patnīkartṛkasyādhvaryukartṛkāvaghātasyaca vikalpe sati haviṣkṛnmantro 'dhvaryukartṛkāvaghāte “ava rakṣo diva” iti patnīkartṛka  #
analyzed: prayojanam pūrvapakṣe patnī kartṛkasya adhvaryu kartṛka avaghātasya ca vikalpe sati haviṣkṛt mantraḥ dhvaryu kartṛka avaghāte ava rakṣaḥ divaḥ iti patnī kartṛka
iti vyavasthā

original: siddhānte tvekasminneva patnīkartṛkāvaghāte “ava rakṣo diva” iti mantraḥ,
analyzed: siddhānte tu ekasmin eva patnī kartṛka avaghāte ava rakṣaḥ divaḥ iti mantraḥ
haviṣkṛt mantraḥ tu āhvāne iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti tṛtīyam haviṣkṛt adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
tathā utthāna
some uttiṣṭhan anvāha agnīdh agnīn vihara iti
tathā vratam kṛṇuta iti vācam visṛjati
darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ

original: “praṇītāḥ praṇeṣyanvācaṃ yacchati tāṃ sa ------ haviṣkṛtāvisṛjatī“ti śrutam /
analyzed: praṇītāḥ praṇeṣyan vācam yacchati tām sa haviṣkṛtā visṛjati iti śrutam

original: tatrāpi pūrvavadeva mantrāṇāṃ mukhyer'the viniyogo natu gauṇayorutthānavāgvisargayoḥ /
analyzed: tatra api pūrvavat eva mantrāṇām mukhya ṛthe viniyogaḥ na tu gauṇayoḥ utthāna vāc visargayoḥ
prabalasya api brāhmaṇa vākyasya kāla vidhāyi tvena api upapattau gauṇa tva tātparya grāhaka tva abhāvāt
na ca lakṣaṇā
śatṛ pratyayasya kālika saṃbandhena lakṣaṇa artha tvam aṅgīkṛtya śrutyā eva anvaya upapatteḥ
atas ca utthāna kāle viharaṇa mantraḥ paṭhanīyaḥ iti kāla vidhiḥ eva ayam
vratam vṛṇuta iti atra itikaraṇasya api mantra svarūpa mātra paratvāt kālika saṃbandhasya eva saṃsarga vidhayā bhāna upapatteḥ na lakṣaṇā
haviṣkṛt vākye tṛtīyāyāḥ tu vāgyama apekṣita avadhi samarpaka tvena tad ekavākyatā upapattau vākya bhede pramāṇa abhāvāt itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇa arthatau ā aṅgīkṛtya

original: ataśca tadvākyayoḥ pāṭhakramāvagatatattanmantrapāṭhakāle vāgvisargaḥ kartavya iti so 'pi tatra kālavidhireva // 4 // 19 //
analyzed: atas ca tad vākyayoḥ pāṭha krama avagata tad tad mantra pāṭha kāle vāgvisargaḥ kartavyaḥ iti saḥ u pi tatra kāla vidhiḥ eva  /
iti caturtham utthāna adhikaraṇam
uttiṣṭhan iti

vihara iti
iti karaṇena prabhṛti arthakena barhiḥ stṛṇāhi
puroḍāśān alaṅkuru
paśum naḥ dehi iti antasya saṃgrahaḥ
