sautra visarga śabdena vācam visṛjati iti vat anyasya api visargasya upādāna saṃbhavāt ekādaśe

original: bhāṣye “vāgvisargo haviṣkṛtā bījabhede tathā syā” dityadhikaraṇe haviṣkṛdgrahaṇaṃ
analyzed: bhāṣye vāgvisargaḥ haviṣkṛtā bīja bhede tathā syāt iti adhikaraṇe haviṣkṛt grahaṇam
ca kāla lakṣaṇa artham iti uktam

original: tathā “āhvānamapīti cet na kālavidhiścoditatvādi” tyuktvā sūcitatvāccātrabhāṣye 'nudāhṛtamapyanyadudāharati ------- darśapūrṇamāsayoriti //
analyzed: tathā āhvānam api iti ced na kāla vidhiḥ codita tva ādi ti uktvā sūcita tvāt ca atra bhāṣye nu udāhṛtam api anyat udāharati darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti

original: tāṃ niyamitāṃ vācaṃ haviṣkṛdehīti mantrapāṭhakāle visṛjatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tām niyamitām vācam haviṣkṛt ehi iti mantra pāṭha kāle visṛjati iti arthaḥ
tatra kim anayoḥ vacanayoḥ uttiṣṭhan iti vācam visṛjati iti ca uddiśya anayoḥ mantrayoḥ vidhānāt anayoḥ mantrayoḥ gauṇa utthāna vāc visargayoḥ vini yogaḥ
uta mantrayoḥ liṅgāt agni viharaṇa vrata karaṇa rūpa mukhya arthe viniyogaḥ utthāna vrata mantrayoḥ
kāla artha tvena upādānam iti saṃśayam vakṣyamāṇa tvena ātideśikīm saṅgatim pūrva adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa tvāt pūrvapakṣaḥ ca
spaṣṭa tvāt an ullikhya ātideśika sūtra anurodhāt siddhāntam eva āha tatra api iti
pūrvavat eva iti anena sautra tathāśabda sūcitā ātideśikī saṅgatiḥ darśitā
tatra pūrvatra mukhya kriyā antara sattvāt tasyāḥ ca sādhu tva mātra artha tve pramāṇa abhāvāt avaghnan ityasya
lakṣaṇām vinā api hetu tva ādi arthatayā upapatteḥ tris abhyāsasya ca vidheya antara sattvena prabalasya api
brāhmaṇa vākyasya anyathā upapatti saṃbhavāt yuktaḥ laiṅgikaḥ viniyogaḥ
prakṛte tu vidheya antara abhāve uttiṣṭhan iti śatṛ pratyayasya lakṣaṇa artha tvam aṅgīkṛtya
kālasya eva tava mate vidheya tvāt vidhau lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ utthānasya ca sāmarthyāt kariṣyamāṇa deśa antara vihita kārya artha tvena
kṛtārthasya mantra pāṭha artha tva ayogena śatṛpratyayasya kāraṇa tva rūpa hetu tva arthaka tva asaṃbhavāt agatyā
phalatva rūpa hetutva arthaka tvam aṅgīkṛtya mantra pāṭhasya eva gauṇa sāmarthyena utthāna aṅgatvam yuktam
saṃbhavati ca an utthitena agnīnām edhitum vihartum vā śakya tvāt utthānasya agni indhana viharaṇa ādi hetoḥ svātantrya vivakṣayā mukhya tad kartṛ tva upapatteḥ agnīdh śabdena abhidhānam
naca adhvaryu utthānasya āgnīdhra kartṛka agni indhana ādi sādhanatva ayogāt tad nimitta kartṛ tva vivakṣā anupapattiḥ

original: viharetyasya praiṣatve sati “praiṣeṣu parādhikārā” diti nyāyenādhvaryukartṛkatāyā
analyzed: vihara ityasya praiṣa tve sati praiṣeṣu para adhikārāt iti nyāyena adhvaryu kartṛka tāyāḥ
bādhe pi iha pūrvapakṣe iti karaṇa rūpa vākya avagata utthāna aṅga tvena praiṣa tva abhāvena āgnīdhra kartṛ tva aprāptyā
samākhyā prāpta adhvaryu kartṛkatvasya eva prāpteḥ bādhaka abhāvāt

original: ataeva --------- agniviharaṇādisādhyābhāvālloṭaḥ prāptakālatārthatāmaṅgīkṛtyāgniviharaṇasya prāptaḥ kāla ityarthakatayā “agnīnvihare” tyasyāpyupapattiḥ
analyzed: ataeva agni viharaṇa ādi sādhya abhāvāt loṭaḥ prāptakālatā arthatām aṅgīkṛtya agni viharaṇasya prāptaḥ kālaḥ iti arthaka tayā agnīn vihare tyasya api upapattiḥ

original: vratavākyetu śatṛpratyayasyāpyabhāvāditikaraṇasya vākyatvena liṅgāpekṣayā durbalasyāpi brāhmaṇavākyatvena prābalyādyuktameva vāgvisargāṅgatvam
analyzed: vrata vākye tu śatṛ pratyayasya api abhāvāt iti karaṇasya vākya tvena liṅga apekṣayā durbalasya api brāhmaṇa vākya tvena prābalyāt yuktam eva vāgvisarga aṅgatvam

original: tatrāpi yathā bhakṣānuvāke “vāgjuṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatvi“ti bhakṣayitṛgataṃ tṛptikartṛtvaṃ
analyzed: tatra api yathā bhakṣa anuvāke vāc juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu iti bhakṣayitṛ gatam tṛpti kartṛ tvam
tṛpti hetu āsya gatāyām vāci upacaritam tathā hiṃsāyām iti kṛvi dhātoḥ vācya hiṃsā gata nāśaka tva sāmyāt gauṇyā
bhakṣaṇa avagateḥ yajamāna puruṣa gatam vrata śabda vācya kaṣṭa vṛtti artha payaḥ yavāgū ādi bhakṣaṇa kartṛ tvam
bhakṣaṇa hetu āsya gatāyām vāci śakyam upacaritum
bahuvacanam ca vācaḥ śabda ātmaka tvāt śabdasya ca tālu ādi pṛṣṭha sthāneṣu abhivyakteḥ tālu ādi adhiṣṭhāna bheda abhiprāyeṇa api śakyam yojayitum
loṭaḥ ca vācaḥ preṣya tvena praiṣa artha tva asaṃbhave pi pūrvavat eva prāpta kālatā artha tā aṅgīkārāt

original: he vāk vrataṃ bhakṣayituṃ tava prāptaḥ kāla ityarthena saṃbhavatyeva gauṇārthe vāgvisarge
analyzed: he vāc vratam bhakṣayitum tava prāptaḥ kālaḥ iti arthena saṃbhavati eva gauṇa arthe vāc visarge

original: viniyoga iti viśeṣāśaṅkayā saṃbhāvyamānaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ nirākartumāha -------- natu gauṇayoriti //
analyzed: viniyogaḥ iti viśeṣa āśaṅkayā saṃbhāvyamānam pūrvapakṣam nirākartum āha na tu gauṇayoḥ iti
iti karaṇasya iti
tasya avyaya tvena lupta vibhaktika tvāt śaktyā karaṇatva anukteḥ lakṣaṇāyām ca kālika saṃbandha avacchinna saptamī artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ
eva yukta tvāt na an apekṣita aṅga aṅgibhāva paratva āśrayaṇam yuktam iti etat mantra pāṭha kāle vācam
visṛjati iti arthaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: etena -------- itikaraṇasya śrutitvamaṅgīkṛtya pūrvapakṣe śrutyā gauṇe mantraviniyoga iti nyāyasudhoktaṃ --------- apāstam /
analyzed: etena iti karaṇasya śruti tvam aṅgīkṛtya pūrvapakṣe śrutyāḥ gauṇe mantra viniyogaḥ iti nyāyasudhā uktam apāstam
itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇā iti

original: haviṣkṛnmantrapāṭhajñāpyatvasyaiva visarge upapatterna svātantryeṇa tatra karaṇatayā mantravidhānaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: haviṣkṛt mantra pāṭha jñāpya tvasya eva visarge upapatteḥ na svātantryeṇa tatra karaṇatayā mantra vidhānam yuktam iti arthaḥ
etat ca itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇa arthatva aṅgīkaraṇam saha śabda abhāve pi siddhānta upapatti pradarśana mātra artham

original: vastutastu --------- sahaśabdaśravaṇena tadyoga eva tṛtīyopapattermantrapāṭhasamakālīnatvarūpasāhityasyaiva pratīteḥ na mantrakaraṇatvāśaṅkāpīti  #
analyzed: vastutas tu saha śabda śravaṇena tad yoge eva tṛtīya upapatteḥ mantra pāṭha sama kālīna tva rūpa sāhityasya eva pratīteḥ na mantra karaṇa tva āśaṅkā api iti
dhyeyam
atas ca uttara padārtha vidhi pāṭha krameṇa yathā utthānasya kālaḥ nirjñātaḥ tathā eva mantra pāṭha krameṇa

original: vratahaviṣkṛnmantrayorapi nirjñāta iti tatra tatrāprāptakālavidhānamevetyupasaṃharati ------ ataśceti //
analyzed: vrata haviṣkṛt mantrayoḥ api nirjñātaḥ iti tatra tatra aprāpta kāla vidhānam eva iti upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: yadyapi cāhvānasya mantrapāṭhātiriktapṛthakprayatnānāpādyatvenānyathānupapattyā tattyāgārthaṃ vāgvisargaḥ prāpnotyevetyanuvādatvameva yuktam,
analyzed: yadi api ca āhvānasya mantra pāṭha atirikta pṛthak prayatna an āpādya tvena anyathā anupapattyā tad tyāga artham vāgvisargaḥ prāpnoti eva iti anuvāda tvam eva yuktam
na tu kāla vidhi tvam
tathā api tanmātra aṃśe vāgyama bādhe tad uttaram api prasaktasya nivṛtti artham avadhi rūpa kāla vidhi tvam āvaśyakam

original: yadyapica pūrvatra kālānuvādādihaca vidheyatvāttatra pūrvādhikaraṇatātideśārthatā tathāśabdoktā yujyate;
analyzed: yadi api ca pūrvatra kāla anuvādāt iha ca vidheya tvāt tatra pūrva adhikaraṇa tā atideśa artha tā tathāśabda uktā yujyate

original: tathāpi gauṇe na viniyogaḥ kintu mukhye ityetāvatā sāmyena tadupapattiriti jñeyam //
analyzed: tathā api gauṇe na viniyogaḥ kintu mukhye iti etāvatā sāmyena tad upapattiḥ iti jñeyam
prayojanam pūrvapakṣe agnīdh mantraḥ utthānāt pūrvam prayojyaḥ
evam vrata haviṣkṛt mantrau api vāgvisargāt pūrvam prayojyau
karaṇa tvāt
siddhānte tu utthāna kāle agnīdh mantraḥ
vrata haviṣkṛt mantra pāṭha sama kālam vāgvisargaḥ ityādi spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti caturtham utthāna adhikaraṇam
a pā sūktavāke
darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ sūktavākena prastaram praharati iti śrutam

original: tatra sūktavākapadavācyasya mantrasya iṣṭadevatāprakāśanena kṛtārthatvāt prastarapraharaṇasya
analyzed: tatra sūktavāka pada vācyasya mantrasya iṣṭadevatā prakāśanena kṛtārtha tvāt prastara praharaṇasya
ca upayukta prastara pratipatti tvena kṛtārtha tvāt darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta itivat kāla arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: tṛtīyā cetthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇaparā satī sūktavākasya kālikasaṃbandhena praharaṇopalakṣaṇatvenānvayaṃ bodhayantī nānupapannā /
analyzed: tṛtīyā ca itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇa parā satī sūktavākasya kālika saṃbandhena praharaṇa upalakṣaṇa tvena anvayam bodhayantī na anupapannā
na ca evam lakṣaṇā
tasyāḥ api ānuśāsanika tvena śakya tvāt
atas ca anuyāja uttaram sūktavāka pāṭhāt tad kāla viśiṣṭam prastara uddeśena praharaṇam eva vidhīyate

original: na tu sūktavākasya praharaṇāṅgatvamiti prāpte -------- pracuraprayogāllāghavācca karaṇatva eva tṛtīyāyāḥ śaktirnatu itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe;
analyzed: na tu sūktavākasya praharaṇa aṅga tvam iti prāpte pracura prayogāt lāghavāt ca karaṇa tve eva tṛtīyāyāḥ śaktiḥ na tu itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇe
tasya ānuśāsanika tve pi lākṣaṇika tvena api upapatteḥ

original: ataśca śrutyā praharaṇāṅgatvasyāpyavagateḥ praharatirmāntravarṇikadevatākalpanayā āśrayikarmarūpahomalakṣako na virudhyate /
analyzed: atas ca śrutyā praharaṇa aṅgatvasya api avagateḥ praharatiḥ māntravarṇika devatā kalpanayā āśrayi karma rūpa homa lakṣakaḥ na virudhyate

original: ata eva sūktavākaeva yājyeti yāgaliṅgamapi saṅgacchate /
analyzed: atas eva sūktavākaḥ eva yājyā iti yāga liṅgam api saṅgacchate

original: yadyapi ca nāsya mantratvādivadabhiyuktaprasiddhiviṣayatvākhyaṃ mukhyaṃ yājyātvaṃ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yadi api ca na asya mantra tva ādi vat abhiyukta prasiddhi viṣaya tva ākhyam mukhyam yājyā tvam saṃbhavati
evakāra upabaddha tvena eva liṅgasya yājyā tva asādhaka tvāt
tathā api yāga sādhana tva mātreṇa yājyā tva vyapadeśāt yāga liṅga tvam

original: ataśca śrutyā mantrasya praharaṇāṅgatve 'pi mukhyasāmarthyasya nātra bādhaḥ;
analyzed: atas ca śrutyā mantrasya praharaṇa aṅga tve mukhya sāmarthyasya na atra bādhaḥ
praharaṇe pi tad upapatteḥ
iti pañcamam sūktavāka aṅga tā adhikaraṇam
darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ iti
mantrasya sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa pradarśana artham etat uktam

original: “idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī madramabhū“dityādi “namo devebhya” ityanto nigadarūpo mantraḥ sūktavākastasyaca sūktavākatvamagre vyaktīkariṣyate /
analyzed: idam dyāvāpṛthivī madram abhūt ityādi namaḥ devebhyaḥ iti antaḥ nigada rūpaḥ mantraḥ sūktavākaḥ tasya ca sūktavāka tvam agre vyaktīkariṣyate

original: tena mantreṇa prastaraṃ darbhamuṣṭimagnau prakṣipatīti vākyasyārthaḥ //
analyzed: tena mantreṇa prastaram darbha muṣṭim agnau prakṣipati iti vākyasya arthaḥ
tatra gauṇa sāmarthyasya śruti sahāya tayā viniyojaka tve bhihite mukhya sāmarthyasya api
tad sahāya tā nirūpaṇena pūrva uktasya kāla artha saṃyogasya iha apavāda karaṇena ca pāda adhyāya asaṅgatī

original: tathā sūktavākasya kālopalakṣaṇatayānvayena kālārthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ hotrāsminmantre
analyzed: tathā sūktavākasya kāla upalakṣaṇa tayā anvayena kāla arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ hotrā asmin mantre
paṭhyamāne tad pāṭha kāle prastaram praharet iti

original: athavā sūktavākasya karaṇatayānvayena praharaṇāṅgamiti saṃśayaṃ ca spaṣṭatvādanuktvā pūrvapakṣamevāha -------- tatreti //
analyzed: athavā sūktavākasya karaṇatayā anvayena praharaṇa aṅgam iti saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrvapakṣam eva āha tatra iti
iṣṭadevatā iti
ājyabhāga anūyāja anteṣu karmasu uddiṣṭāḥ agni ādayaḥ devatāḥ iti arthaḥ
upayuktā iti

original: “prastarejuhūmāsādayati sarvā vā struca” iti vākyena strugdhāraṇe upayuktaprastarapratipattitvenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prastare juhūm āsādayati sarvāḥ vā strucaḥ iti vākyena struc dhāraṇe upayukta prastara pratipatti tvena iti arthaḥ
kṛtārtha tvam eva hi ākāṅkṣā viraha saṃpādanena aṅga aṅgi saṃbandha vighaṭaka miti atas tam eva sūtra upātta tayā hetum āha kṛtārtha tvāt iti

original: evañca cāturthikanyāyena kālārthasaṃbandhaṃ dṛṣṭāntavyājena sādhayati -------- darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiti //
analyzed: evam ca cāturthika nyāyena kāla artha saṃbandham dṛṣṭānta vyājena sādhayati darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti

original: yadyapyatra dṛṣṭānta iva kālārthasaṃbandhabodhakaḥ ktvāpratyayo nāsti;
analyzed: yadi api atra dṛṣṭānte iva kāla artha saṃbandha bodhakaḥ ktvāpratyayaḥ na asti
tathā api kṛtārtha tā eva pūrva ukta rītyā kāla artha tā āpādane hetuḥ

original: ktvāpratyayastu kālaviśeṣe paurvāparyarūpe niyāmakamātramiti na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: ktvāpratyayaḥ tu kāla viśeṣe paurvāparya rūpe niyāmaka mātram iti na doṣaḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhi karaṇatvaparatṛtīyopapattirityata āha -------- tṛtīyā ceti /
analyzed: katham tarhi karaṇatva para tṛtīyā upapattiḥ iti atas āha tṛtīyā ca iti

original: “itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīye” tyanuśāsanena gamakatvarūpalakṣaṇārthatvena sūktavākavṛttigamakatvābhidhānāttasyaca tatkālīnatvasaṃpādanena saṃbhavāttṛtīyopapattirityarthaḥ
analyzed: itthaṃbhūta lakṣaṇe tṛtīye ti anuśāsanena gamaka tva rūpa lakṣaṇa artha tvena sūktavāka vṛtti gamaka tva abhidhānāt tasya ca tad kālīna tva saṃpādanena saṃbhavāt tṛtīya upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇatva arthatve lakṣaṇa āpattim nirasyati na ca evam iti
etena yat jñāna janaka tva rūpa lakṣaṇa tva abhidhānena eva jñāna kriyāyāḥ upātta tvāt anupātta jñāna rūpa kriyā dvārā
kriyā saṃbandhasya upātta bhāvanā nirūpita karaṇa tva apekṣayā vilambita tvena kāraka vibhakti apekṣayā
itthaṃbhūta tṛtīyāyāḥ daurbalyam pārthasārathi ādibhiḥ uktam tat apāstam
nā api gamaka tvasya akāraka tvāt dhātvartha anvaya pratīteḥ pradhāna bhūta bhāvanā nirūpita kāraka tva apekṣayā daurbalyam
akārakasya api nimitta ādeḥ anuṣṭhāpya tva saṃbandhena bhāvanā anvaya vat gamaka tvasya api eka kārya kāraṇa bhāva kalpanā lāghava anurodhena
sva janya bhāvanā jñāna viṣaya tā saṃbandhena bhāvanā anvaya upapatteḥ tad kalpya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: evañca pūrvoktapraiṣamantravadiha prakaraṇe mantrasyānvayānupapatterna tadaṅgatvaṃ mantrasya,
analyzed: evam ca pūrva ukta praiṣa mantra vat iha prakaraṇe mantrasya anvaya anupapatteḥ na tad aṅga tvam mantrasya

original: nahi “idaṃ havirajuṣatāvīvṛdhata maho jyāyo 'kṛte“ti mantrabhāgasya puroḍāśasevayā vṛddho 'gniḥ svasminyajamāne tejobāhulyaṃ kṛtavānityarthaḥ  #
analyzed: nahi idam haviḥ ajuṣata avīvṛdhata mahaḥ jyāyo kṛtā iti mantra bhāgasya puroḍāśa sevayā vṛddhaḥ gniḥ svasmin yajamāne tejaḥ bāhulyam kṛtavān iti arthaḥ
praharaṇe saṃbhavati
bhūta nirdeśa anupapatteḥ
pratipatteḥ devatā an apekṣaṇāt ca

original: ataḥ kālārthaḥ saṃbandha ityabhipretya pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati --------- ataśceti //
analyzed: atas kāla arthaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati atas ca iti
prastara praharaṇasya barhiṣi prastara sādana anantaram snuh dhāraṇa kārya artha tayā viniyukta prastara pratipatti rūpa tayā
vihitasya struc dhāraṇa kārya aniṣpatteḥ anirjñāta kāla tvam vyatirekeṇa sūcayitum asya nirjñāta kāla tva upapatti artham anūyāja uttaram iti uktam
atas eva āha tad kāla viśiṣṭam iti
yadi api gamaka tve pi tṛtīyāyāḥ śaktiḥ

original: tathāpi praharati bhāvanāyā yathā kārakākāṅkṣā na tathā gamakāpekṣayā,
analyzed: tathā api praharati bhāvanāyāḥ yathā kāraka ākāṅkṣā na tathā gamaka apekṣayā

original: ata ākāṅkṣitānvayasiddhyarthaṃ karaṇatvenaiva kṛtārthasyāpi nāsti vacanasyātibhāra iti nyāyenānvayāśravaṇaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: atas ākāṅkṣita anvaya siddhi artham karaṇa tvena eva kṛtārthasya api nā asti vacanasya atibhāraḥ iti nyāyena anvaya āśravaṇam yuktam

original: kimuta tatrāpi śaktikalpane pramāṇābhāvāllakṣaṇaiveti vinā karaṇaṃ tadāśrayaṇaṃ na yuktamiti cābhipretya siddhāntamāha -------- pracureti //
analyzed: kim uta tatra api śakti kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt lakṣaṇā eva iti vinā karaṇam tad āśrayaṇam na yuktam iti ca abhipretya siddhāntam āha pracura iti
yat tu praharaṇa bhāvanāyām anvaya ayogya tvam uktam

original: tat ajuṣatetyasya puroḍāśādiviṣayatve 'pyagnyādiḥ puroḍāśādi sevitavān tena vṛddho 'gnistejobāhulyaṃ na kṛtavān //
analyzed: tat ajuṣata iti asya puroḍāśa ādi viṣaya tve pi agni ādiḥ puroḍāśa ādi sevitavān tena vṛddhaḥ agniḥ tejaḥ bāhulyam na kṛtavān

original: yattu yajamāna āyurādyāśāste tadanena pratyakṣanirdiṣṭena prastarākhyena haviṣetyevamagrimeṇaikavākyatayā,
analyzed: yat tu yajamānaḥ āyuḥ ādi āśāste tat anena pratyakṣa nirdiṣṭena prastara ākhyena haviṣā iti evam agrimeṇa ekavākyatayā
athavā idam śabdena puroḍāśa ādeḥ hutasya vyapadeśa anupapattyā pratyakṣa nirdiṣṭa prastarasya eva
parāmarśa upapatteḥ ajuṣata iti bhūta nirdeśasya āśaṃsāyām bhūta vat ca iti anuśāsanāt sevanam
kuru iti arthatayā upapādana saṃbhavāt akiñcitkaram iti abhipretya āha atas ca iti
evam ubhayavidha liṅga saṃbhave śruti sahāyasya prābalyam sūcayitum śrutyā iti uktam

original: nanu praharaṇasya pratipattirūpatayā devatānapekṣaṇānmāntravarṇikadevatākalpanayāpi tatprakāśanāsaṃbhavātkathaṃ mantrasyāṅgatvasaṃbhava ityata  #
analyzed: nanu praharaṇasya pratipatti rūpa tayā devatā anapekṣaṇāt māntravarṇika devatā kalpanayā api tad prakāśana asaṃbhavāt katham mantrasya aṅga tva saṃbhavaḥ iti atas
āha praharatiḥ iti

original: mantrasya kriyāprakāśanena tatsaṃbandhiprakāśanena vā karaṇatvāttadabhāve mantragatakaraṇatvānyathānupapattyā
analyzed: mantrasya kriyā prakāśanena tad saṃbandhi prakāśanena vā karaṇa tvāt tad abhāve mantra gata karaṇa tva anyathā anupapattyā
tad arthasya aṅga tva kalpanasya āvaśyaka tvena prakṛte śruti avagata aṅga tā nirvāhāya māntravarṇika devatā kalpanayā
dravya devatā sabandhāt praharatau devatā uddeśa pūrvaka dravya tyāga aṃśasya api a jahat svārtha lakṣaṇā
phala mukha tvāt na virudhyate iti arthaḥ

original: tyāgāṃśaṃ prati dravyasya karaṇatvāt prastaramiti dvitīyānupapattiṃ parihartuṃ āśrayikarmarūpetyuktam /
analyzed: tyāga aṃśam prati dravyasya karaṇa tvāt prastaram iti dvitīya anupapattim parihartum āśrayi karma rūpā iti uktam
yathā eva sviṣṭakṛt yāgasya prakṣepa aṃśena upayukta dravya saṃskāraka tvam tyāga aṃśena adṛṣṭārtha tvam evam iha api
tyāga aṃśena adṛṣṭa artha tve pi prakṣepa aṃśena tad pratipatti tvāt tad upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
ayam ca atra viśeṣaḥ sviṣṭakṛti yaji padārtha antargata uddeśa aṃśasya anupayukta agni sviṣṭakṛt devatā viṣayatvāt tad aṃśe pi ārāt upakāraka tvam eva
prakṛte tu mantra aṃśena iva tyāga aṃśa antargata uddeśena api iṣṭānām eva devatā tvāt saṃskāraka tvam eva iti
yathā ca yajamāna kartṛka tyāga viśiṣṭa uddeśasya na yaji vācya tvam
apitu mantreṇa kriyamāṇasya eva iti nyāyasudhākāra ādīnām lekhanam

original: tathā taddūṣaṇapuraḥ saraṃ yajamānakartṛkasyaiva tasya tadvācyatvaṃ caturthe vyaktīkariṣyate //
analyzed: tathā tad dūṣaṇa puraḥsaram yajamāna kartṛkasya eva tasya tat vācyatvam caturthe vyaktīkariṣyate

original: atraca sūktavākasya karaṇamantratvānmantrāntena karmādiḥ sannipātya iti vacanāt sūktavākapāṭhānantaramekaprastaradravyakahomānuṣṭhāne
analyzed: atra ca sūktavākasya karaṇa mantra tvāt mantra antena karma ādiḥ sannipātyaḥ iti vacanāt sūktavāka pāṭha anantaram eka prastara dravyaka homa anuṣṭhāne
arthāt tad ānantarya rūpa kāla lābhāt kāla artha tā api ca prasaṅgāt bhaviṣyati iti atra bhaṭṭa pādānām

original: siddhānte uktiriti sthite yannyāyasudhākṛto yājyāvatsūktavākasyāpi homakālaprayojyatvena
analyzed: siddhānte uktiḥ iti sthite yat nyāyasudhākṛtaḥ yājyā vat sūktavākasya api homa kāla prayojya tvena
āhuti ākhya hūyamāna avastha dravya saṃbandha lakṣaṇa guṇa yoga ādi ājyā tvena stutiḥ yuktā iti granthena
prastara praharaṇasya sūktavāka pāṭha yaugapadya abhidhānam
tat ayuktam eva

original: āgneyādiyāgeṣu pratyekaṃ devatātvenānvitānāmihāpi tathaiva devatātvāṅgīkāreṇa samuccayena
analyzed: āgneya ādi yāgeṣu pratyekam devatā tvena anvitānām iha api tathā eva devatā tva aṅgīkāreṇa samuccayena
jyotiṣṭoma vat āvṛtti āpattau api agniḥ idam haviḥ ajuṣata tyādi tad tad devatā vāci pada uccāraṇe
sati eva tad tad devatā uddeśena dravya tyāga anuṣṭhāna asaṃbhavena yaugapadya asaṃbhavāt
nahi tadā avayava mātra pāṭhena antya avayava pada pāṭha abhāve samasta sūktavāka janya prakāśanam sidhdyati
vastutas tu agni ādi devatā vidhi kalpanāyām pratyekam āgneya ādiṣu devatā tvena anvitānām api agni ādīnām
samuccitānām eva lāghavāt devatā tva kalpanasya yukta tvāt tāvatā api anantarita tad tad devatā prakāśana rūpa prayojana siddheḥ na
yuktam pratyekam tat kalpanam iti para prayukta prastara ākhya dravya antara an ākṣepeṇa ekasya eva
prastarasya tāvat uddeśena mantra pāṭha anantaram sakṛt tyāga anuṣṭhāna pūrvakam pūrvapakṣa upapatteḥ āvṛttau
pramāṇa abhāvāt yaugapadyam asaṃbhavyat nyāyam ca

original: ataeva sūktavākapāṭhasamasamayameva “agnaye ida” miti tyāgenāṃśataḥ prastarasyāhutasya
analyzed: ataeva sūktavāka pāṭha sama samayam eva agnaye idam iti tyāgena aṃśataḥ prastarasya a hutasya

original: dāhānuṣṭhānaṃ yājñikānāmapyapāstamiti prakāśakāraireva parākrāntatvāt neha vistarabhayāt prapañcyate //
analyzed: dāha anuṣṭhānam yājñikānām api apāstam iti prakāśakāraiḥ eva parākrānta tvāt na iha vistara bhayāt prapañcyate
prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ mantra tva vat iti
etena yājñika prasiddheḥ avayava yogāt ca hotṛ pravacana vihita tyajyamāna dravya saṃbandha uddeśa aṅga bhūta devatā prakāśaka tva rūpa mantra tvasya akhaṇḍasya
yājyā tvasya kvācitka ādhvaryava vihita mṛgāreṣṭi darśa pūrṇamāsīya yājyāsu avyāpaka tvāt tatra ca
yājyā pada prayogasya gauṇa tva kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ
nanu atra eva yājyā pada prayogāt prasiddhi viṣaya tva saṃbhavaḥ iti atas āha evakāra upabaddha tvena iti
eva kārasya aprasakta yājyā antara niṣedhaka tva ayogāt sūktavākaḥ eva yājyā vat praśastaḥ iti artha pratīteḥ aupacārika yājyā tva kathanāt asya

original: nigadarūpatvena yājyā vai nigadā ityanyatra teṣāṃ yājyatvaniṣedhācca vihitayājyātvānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: nigada rūpa tvena yājyāḥ vai nigadāḥ iti anyatra teṣām yājya tva niṣedhāt ca vihita yājyā tva anupapattiḥ
atas eva an avānam yajati ityādi mukhya yājyā dharmāṇām iha aprāptiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evañca yadi laiṅgikaṃ devatāprakāśanārthatvamanapekṣya śrutyā sūktavākasya praharaṇāṅgatā,
analyzed: evam ca yadi laiṅgikam devatā prakāśana arthatvam an apekṣya śrutyā sūktavākasya praharaṇa aṅga tā

original: śrautañca praharaṇāṅgatvamanapekṣya liṅgena devatāprakāśanāṅgatā bodhyeta tato virodhācchrutyā
analyzed: śrautam ca praharaṇa aṅga tvam an apekṣya liṅgena devatā prakāśana aṅga tā bodhyeta tatas virodhāt śrutyā
liṅga bādhe śruti viniyojyasya katham api praharaṇa śakti abhāvāt śruteḥ eva viniyojaka tva ayogāt ubhaya anugrahāya iṣṭadevatā kīrtana mātreṇa
kṛtārtha tvam sūktavākasya aṅgīkṛtya kāla artha praharaṇa anvayaḥ bhyupagamyeta
na tvā id asti
kintu śruti anugraha artham liṅgena praharaṇa aṅga bhūta devatā kīrtana dvārā śruti avagata praharaṇa aṅga tva apekṣaṇāt sūktavākasya
ca praharaṇa śakti sidhdyai śrutyā a liṅga avagata devatā aṅga tva apekṣaṇāt śruti liṅgayoḥ tulya ārtha tvena
virodha parihāra upapatteḥ na virodha parihārāya iṣṭadevatā kīrtana mātreṇa kṛtārtha tvam aṅgīkṛtya anyatra
viniyoga anarha tvāt kāla artha tā abhyupagantavyā iti abhipretya siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas ca iti
prayojanam pūrvapakṣe praharaṇa mātra anuṣṭhānam
siddhānte tu iṣṭadevatā uddeśena tyāgasya api ityādi spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti pañcamam sūktavāka aṅga tā adhikaraṇam
a pā kṛtsna upadeśāt
śrutyā liṅga upaṣṭabdhayā praharaṇa aṅgatva avagamāt na liṅga mātreṇa sūktavākasya iṣṭadevatā smaraṇa artha tvam
na ca atra avirodhaḥ pi

original: adhyetṛprasiddhyā samastānuvāke sūktavākaśabdasya rūḍhatvenāvayavaśo vibhajya viniyoge 'vayavalakṣaṇāpattyā śrutivirodhāpatteḥ /
analyzed: adhyetṛ prasiddhyā samasta anuvāke sūktavāka śabdasya rūḍha tvena avayavaśas vibhajya viniyoge vayava lakṣaṇa āpattyā śruti virodha āpatteḥ
na ca asau suṣṭu uktam vakti iti vyutpattyā iṣṭadevatā vāci pada samudāye yaugikaḥ
pārāyaṇa adhyayana ādau katipaya pada prayogeṇa api sūktavāka padārtha sampatti prasaṅgena samasta anuvāke rūḍheḥ avaśyaṃbhāvāt
astuva iṣṭadevatā prakāśana mānuṣaṅgikam phalam

original: praharaṇameva tu śrutiviniyogāt sarvānuvākaprayojakaṃ iti darśe paurṇamāse ca sarvaḥ
analyzed: praharaṇam eva tu śruti viniyogāt sarva anuvāka prayojakam iti darśe paurṇamāse ca sarvaḥ

original: prayoktavya iti prāpte -------- prabalayāpi śrutyā liṅgasya bādhe praharatilakṣyahomāntargatadevatoddeśasyārādupakārakatvāpatteḥ
analyzed: prayoktavyaḥ iti prāpte prabalayā api śrutyā liṅgasya bādhe praharati lakṣya homa antargata devatā uddeśasya ārāt upakāraka tva āpatteḥ
dṛṣṭa vidhayā sannipattyā upakāraka tva lābha artham śrutiḥ eva laiṅgika iṣṭadevatā prakāśana arthatvam
mantrasya anumanyate

original: ataeva śrutibalīyastvātpraharaṇaprayuktaḥ sūktavākaḥ praharaṇābhāve ananuṣṭhīyamāno 'pi vibhajya viniyogāṃśe iṣṭadevatāprakāśanarūpalaiṅgikakāryasyaiva  #
analyzed: ataeva śruti balīyaḥ tvāt praharaṇa prayuktaḥ sūktavākaḥ praharaṇa abhāve an anuṣṭhīyamānaḥ vibhajya viniyoga aṃśe iṣṭadevatā prakāśana rūpa laiṅgika kāryasya eva
prayojaka tvam anumanyate
na ca evam sūktavāka śabdasya avayava lakṣaṇa artha tva āpattiḥ

original: sūktavākapadasya suṣṭhu uktaṃ vaktīti vyutpattyā iṣṭadevatāprakāśakamantraviśeṣe yogarūḍhatvāt /
analyzed: sūktavāka padasya suṣṭhu uktam vakti iti vyutpattyā iṣṭadevatā prakāśaka mantra viśeṣe yoga rūḍha tvāt

original: tena yatra yāvatyo devatā iṣṭāḥ prākṛtyo vaikṛtyo vā tatra tāvāneva sūktavākaḥ /
analyzed: tena yatra yāvatyaḥ devatāḥ iṣṭāḥ prākṛtyaḥ vaikṛtyaḥ vā tatra tāvān eva sūktavākaḥ
atas ca sūktavāka prātipadika śruti anurodhena api liṅga ābādhaḥ
na ca adhyayana ādau yoga bādhāt rūḍhi mātra kalpanā

original: tatra tadānīntanavaidikaprasiddhyanurodhena dārśapūrṇamāsikadevatāpadasamudāyayukta eva mantre nirūḍhalakṣaṇāṅgīkārāt,
analyzed: tatra tadānīntana vaidika prasiddhi anurodhena dārśapūrṇamāsika devatā pada samudāya yukte eva mantre nirūḍha lakṣaṇa aṅgīkārāt
aśvakarṇa ādau tu śakya saṃbandha pratīti abhāvāt kḷpta avayava śakti bādhena atirikta śakti kalpanam iti viśeṣaḥ
prayojanam vibhajya viniyogaḥ
iti ṣaṣṭham sūktavāka bibhajya viniyoga adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇe śruti liṅga avirodhena aindrī vat śruti viniyojya tve mukhya arthe
viniyogasya sādhitasya iha keṣāñcid padānām asamaveta artha tvāt asaṃbhavena ākṣipya samādhānāt ākṣepikīm anantara saṅgatim utsarga adhikaraṇa prasakta
mukhya artha viniyogasya sthāpanāt pāda saṅgatim
tathā paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām ca praharaṇa anuṣṭhāne sati paurṇamāsyām api amāvāsyā devatā vāci pada yuktasya

original: sarvasya sūktavākasya pāṭha uta tattatkālīnaprayoge tattaddevatāvācipadānāmaprayogeṇa pāṭha iti saṃśayaṃ,
analyzed: sarvasya sūktavākasya pāṭhaḥ uta tad tad kālīna prayoge tad tad devatā vāci padānām aprayogeṇa pāṭhaḥ iti saṃśayam

original: ataeva pūrvodāhṛtā eva vicārādviṣayavākyaṃ ca spaṣṭatvādanuktvā pūrvapakṣamevāha --------- śrutyeti //
analyzed: ataeva pūrva udāhṛtāḥ eva vicārāt viṣaya vākyam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrvapakṣam eva āha śrutyā iti

original: prabalapramāṇena praharaṇāṅgatvenaiva nirākāṅkṣasya sūktavākasyeṣṭadevatāprakāśanaviṣaye liṅgena śrutikalpanānupapatternāvirodhena devatāprakāśakatve
analyzed: prabala pramāṇena praharaṇa aṅga tvena eva nirākāṅkṣasya sūktavākasya iṣṭa devatā prakāśana viṣaye liṅgena śruti kalpanā anupapatteḥ na avirodhena devatā prakāśaka tve
yena tad tad devatā prakāśana rūpa prayojaka abhāvāt tad tad devatā vāci pada lopena kāla vyavasthayā mantra pāṭhaḥ prāpnuyāt iti arthaḥ
ataeva uttamaprayāja sviṣṭakṛt mantrayoḥ niṣkṛṣya yathāliṅgam prayoga siddheḥ iha tya siddhānta nyāyena eva
prasādhanīya tve pi śruti virodha hetuka pūrvapakṣasya tatra asaṃbhavāt anudāharaṇa tvam iti dhyeyam
vastutas tu virodhaḥ eva asti iti āha na ca iti
praharaṇam eva tu iti

original: viniyojakapramāṇadvayasattve prabalapramāṇapramitasyaiva śeṣiṇaḥ prayojanakalpanaucityaṃ tuśabdena sūcitam /
analyzed: viniyojaka pramāṇa dvaya sattve prabala pramāṇa pramitasya eva śeṣiṇaḥ prayojana kalpanā aucityam tuśabdena sūcitam
tatas ca āyuḥ ādi vat iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya ānuṣaṅgika tve pi praharaṇasya iṣṭadevatā pada sāmānādhikaraṇam

original: karaṇyena sūktavākaṃ prati prayojakatvāttatsattve saṃpūrṇasūktavākapāṭho 'vikala ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: karaṇyena sūktavākam prati prayojaka tvāt tad sattve saṃpūrṇa sūktavāka pāṭhaḥ vikalaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yadanena haviṣeti mantre pratyakṣanirdiṣṭasya prastarahaviṣa āyurādiphalasyaca nirdeśenaikadeśapāṭhasya
analyzed: yat anena haviṣā iti mantre pratyakṣa nirdiṣṭasya prastara haviṣaḥ āyuḥ ādi phalasya ca nirdeśena eka deśa pāṭhasya
sākāṅkṣa tvena ayukta tvāt ca tad aṃśe homasya prayojaka tve pi iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya api
mantra liṅga adhīna tvāt sannipattyā upakāraka tva kalpanā bhūla tvāt vibhajya viniyoga aṃśa mātre
prayojaka tva mātram kalpyate

original: natu homābhāve 'pi sūktavākapāṭhaviṣaye ityabhipretyāha -------- ata eveti /
analyzed: na tu homa abhāve pi sūktavāka pāṭha viṣaye iti abhipretya āha atas eva iti

original: ataeva apūrve avabhṛthe praharaṇābhāve ājyabhāgādyaṅgeṣṭadevatāprakāśanārthatayā na sūktavākapāṭha iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ataeva apūrve avabhṛthe praharaṇa abhāve ājyabhāga ādi aṅga iṣṭadevatā prakāśana artha tayā na sūktavāka pāṭhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
etena paramārthataḥ tu praharaṇa aṅga tva upadeśāt prakriyamāṇa prastara prakāśana prādhānya avagateḥ na arthataḥ

original: 'pi vākyabheda” iti nyāyasudhoktau “tathā sati prastaraprakāśanatātparyakatvena praharaṇaprayuktatāpattestasya
analyzed: vākya bhedaḥ iti nyāyasudhā uktau tathā sati prastara prakāśana tātparyaka tvena praharaṇa prayukta tā āpatteḥ tasya
ca sūktavāka śabdena puroḍāśa kapāla vat devatā prakāśana tātparyaka tvena tad prayuktasya eva
sataḥ viniyogena siddhānte niṣṭa tvāt iti prakāśa kāraiḥ dūṣaṇam āpādya idam āyukta prastara joṣaṇa kartṛtayā
prādhānyena sakala prayoga samaveta iṣṭadevatā prakāśane eva tātparyam tad avighātena eva
praharaṇe pi viniyogāt devatā kalpaka tvam iti uktam parāstam
tuṣa upavāpa anuṣṭhānāt kāla antarīṇa kapāla upādāna prayojaka tvasya puroḍāśe iva iha api tad āpatti vāraṇāya
iṣṭadevatā prakāśana prayuktasya sūktavākasya praharaṇa prayojya tva āvaśyaka tayā praharaṇa saṃbandhi dravya prakāśaka tvena
praharaṇa prayojaka tvasya akāmena āpatteḥ

original: anyathā yathāśakti prayoge prastarahomābhāve 'pi anūyājottaramiṣṭadevatāprakāśanānurodhena sūktavākapāṭhāpatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā yathāśakti prayoge prastara homa abhāve pi anūyāja uttaram iṣṭadevatā prakāśana anurodhena sūktavāka pāṭha āpatteḥ
atas yathā eva darśa pūrṇamāsa a prayuktasya api bhedana homasya bhedana prayojya tvāt na ekatareṇa
vinā tad anuṣṭhānam evam praharaṇa prayukta sūktavāka antargata katipaya pada janya iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya eva
prayojaka tvam ādāya sūktavāka śabda nirdeśya tva upapatteḥ praharaṇasya api ca iṣṭadevatā prakāśana prayukteḥ eva

original: puroḍāśakapāletu tuṣopavāpakālīnapuroḍāśopādānaprayuktatvāsaṃbhavāt puroḍāśakapālapade siddhavannirdeśapratīteḥ tuṣopavāpaṃ vināpi prayuktatvasiddhiriti  #
analyzed: puroḍāśa kapāle tu tuṣa upavāpa kālīna puroḍāśa upādāna prayukta tva asaṃbhavāt puroḍāśa kapāla pade siddha vat nirdeśa pratīteḥ tuṣa upavāpam vinā api prayukta tva siddhiḥ iti
vaiṣamyam

original: ataeva yadaṃśe prayojakatvaṃ anyataḥ sidhyati na tadaṃśe anyatarasyāpi prayojakatvaṃ kalpyate,
analyzed: ataeva yad aṃśe prayojaka tvam anyatas sidhyati na tad aṃśe anyatarasya api prayojaka tvam kalpyate

original: gauravādato vibhajyaviniyogāṃśe iṣṭadevatāprakāśanasya prayojakatvam anuṣṭhānāṃśe praharaṇasyeti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ /
analyzed: gauravāt atas vibhajya viniyoga aṃśe iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya prayojaka tvam anuṣṭhāna aṃśe praharaṇasya iti na kaḥ pi virodhaḥ
evaṃsthite atas ca iṣṭadevatā prakāśana upajīvi tvāt aprayojakam praharaṇam iti vārtikam api
iṣṭadevatā prakāśana upajīvi tvāt iti hetu upādānāt vibhajya viniyoga aṃśe eva prayojaka tva abhāva abhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyam
nahi sūktavāka śabdāt pratīyamānam iṣṭadevatā prakāśana prayukta tvam apahnotum śakyam
śrutyā eva pūrvokta rītyā anumata tvāt iti āśayaḥ

original: atraca “prakaraṇāvibhāgādubhe prati kṛtsnaśabda” iti sūtrasvārasyena sūktavākapadasya
analyzed: atra ca prakaraṇa avibhāgāt ubhe prati kṛtsna śabdaḥ iti sūtra svārasyena sūktavāka padasya
rūḍhi abhyupagamena prayoga dvaya varti praharaṇa dvaya uddeśena kṛtsna sūktavāka vidhāne
ekaika praharaṇe avayavaśas prayoga siddhiḥ iti śruti virodha parihāram āśaṅkya yājya ādi pade

original: lakṣaṇāpatteḥ samudāyasya phalasādhanatvāyogāt samudāyināmeva phalaṃ pratyupādeyatayā
analyzed: lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ samudāyasya phala sādhana tva ayogāt samudāyinām eva phalam pratyupādeya tayā
vivakṣita sāhityānām sādhanatve pi iti kartavyatā aṃśe uddeśya tvena avivakṣita sāhityānām anvayāt
pratyekam eva itikartavya tayā prayāja ādīnām iva praharaṇasya anvaye sūktavākasya api tad aṅgasya

original: pratyekameva anvayaprāptau kālaikyāt trayāṇāmarthe praharaṇatantratayā tantreṇaivānuṣṭhānaprāpteravayavaśaḥ
analyzed: pratyekam eva anvaya prāptau kāla aikyāt trayāṇām arthe praharaṇa tantra tayā tantreṇa eva anuṣṭhāna prāpteḥ avayavaśas
prayoga asiddheḥ iti bhāṣyakāreṇa pradūṣya
devatā padānām paraspara anvaya abhāvena eka artha pratipādaka tva asaṃbhavāt na ekaḥ tvad abhitas tantra pada apetāḥ ekaika devatā pada bhinnāḥ bahavaḥ

original: ataśca vibhaktasyaiva sūktavākasya tṛtīyayā praharaṇāṅgatvāt prātipadikatṛtīyāśrutyoravirodhe
analyzed: atas ca vibhaktasya eva sūktavākasya tṛtīyayā praharaṇa aṅga tvāt prātipadika tṛtīyā śrutyoḥ avirodhe

original: sati ekavacanasya sūktavākasāmānyābhiprāyeṇopapattiriti tasmin kāle yāvadapekṣā tasminkāle
analyzed: sati ekavacanasya sūktavāka sāmānya abhiprāyeṇa upapattiḥ iti tasmin kāle yāvat apekṣā tasmin kāle
tāvat devatā vāci pada yuktasya eva sūktavāka tvāt tāvat mātreṇa praharaṇa anuṣṭhāne vaiguṇya aprasakteḥ iṣṭa devatā prakāśana rūpa laiṅgika kārya anurodhena eka praharaṇa prayoga tantra padānām

original: sakṛtpāṭhe 'pi sūktavākatrayapāṭhopapattiriti kṛtaṃ virodhaparihāraṃ vārtikakāro adūṣayat /
analyzed: sakṛt pāṭhe sūktavāka traya pāṭha upapattiḥ iti kṛtam virodha parihāram vārtikakāraḥ adūṣayat
yadi api pratyeka padānām na aikārthya abhidhāyaka tvam
tathā api yat anena haviṣā āśāste iti eka vākya tayā eka prayojanaka tvena ekārtha tvam
tatra ca iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya eva prayojaka tvāt arthataḥ prādhānyam

original: tathāpi pūrvoktarītyā praharaṇasyāpi aṅgitvena śabdator'thataśca prādhānyasattvādekaprayojanatvopapattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api pūrva ukta rītyā praharaṇasya api aṅgi tvena śabdataḥ ṛthataḥ ca prādhānya sattvāt eka prayojana tva upapattiḥ
yadi ca tad tad devatā prakāśanānām eva śabdataḥ prādhānyam aṅgīkṛtya nānā vākya tvam iṣyeta

original: tato “yā te aṅgna” ityādivadabhitaḥ tantrapadānāmapyanuṣaṅgeṇa pṛthakpāṭhāpattiḥ /
analyzed: tatas yā te aṅgnaḥ ityādi vat abhitas tantra padānām api anuṣaṅgeṇa pṛthak pāṭha āpattiḥ

original: sūktavākenetyekavacanabalāt aniyamenaikasyaiva sūktavākasya śrutyā viniyogāpatteḥ tadaṃśa eva sannipatyopakārakatvalābhārthamiṣṭadevatāprakāśanārthatvopapatteḥ;
analyzed: sūktavākena iti ekavacana balāt aniyamena ekasya eva sūktavākasya śrutyā viniyoga āpatteḥ tad aṃśe eva sannipatya upakāraka tva lābha artham iṣṭadevatā prakāśana arthatva upapatteḥ
sūktavāka traya pāṭhe pramāṇa abhāvāt yāvat pradhāna traya devatāka tva anupapattiḥ ca
atas vaiśvānara vākya vat upakrama upasaṃhāra aikyena eka vākya tvāt nānā vākya tvena sūktavāka bahutva asiddheḥ

original: samudāya eva sūktavākatvāt prātipadikaśrutivirodhe avayavaśaḥ prayogo durnnivāra iti /
analyzed: samudāyaḥ eva sūktavāka tvāt prātipadika śruti virodhe avayavaśas prayogaḥ durnnivāraḥ iti
evam ca vidhau ca samudāye ca toya śabdaḥ yathā iṣyate
saṃsargi dravya rūpa tvāt sūktavāka pade tathā
iti vārtika tātparyam anusaṃdhāya śruti virodham pariharati sūktavāka padasya iti
uktam iti
ājyabhāga ādi iṣṭadevatām iti arthaḥ
etena ardhendrāṇi juhoti iti vat agni saṃbodhya tvam sūkta vāc asi iti abhidhānāt
sūktavāka pada ghaṭita tvena sūktavāka tvasya mantre saṃbhave pi iha mantra antargata pada prakāśya artham ādāya
yogasya antaraṅga tayā saṃbhavataḥ tyāgena pada ghaṭita yogasya abahiraṅgasya āśrayaṇam na
yuktam iti sūcitam
atas ca iṣṭadevatā prakāśana rūpa kārya anurodhena iṣṭadevatā prakāśaka pada mātra uccāraṇena aniṣṭa devatā vāci pada anuccāraṇe
sūktavāka tva anupapattyā siddheḥ sūktavāka tva anapāyāt na sūktavāka pada śruti virodhaḥ
pratyuta anapekṣita aniṣṭa devatā pada uccāraṇe ajuṣata iti uddiṣṭa rūpa ukta vacanasya anṛta tayā durukta vākya tva āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
tena iti

original: yathā “āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāno 'sā” vityādeḥ sarvanāmātideśadvārā āmnātadevadattādināmapūritasyamantrasya yathāyuktisahitapāṭhena kārtsnyāvadhāraṇā,
analyzed: yathā āśāste yam sā u ityādeḥ sarvanāma atideśa dvārā āmnāta devadatta ādi nāma pūritasya mantrasya yathā yukti sahita pāṭhena kārtsnya avadhāraṇā

original: tathehāpi yuktisahitapāṭhena kṛtsnasūktavākāvadhāraṇayā tāvāneva sūktavākaḥ paṭhanīya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā iha api yukti sahita pāṭhena kṛtsna sūktavāka avadhāraṇayā tāvān eva sūktavākaḥ paṭhanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: taduktaṃ vārtike -------- “tena tridhaiva mantavyaḥ sūktavākaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: tat uktam vārtike tena tridhā eva mantavyaḥ sūktavākaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
svādhyāye karma kāle ca prakṛtau vikṛtau api
sarva prākṛta daivatyaḥ svādhyāye tāvat iṣyate
niṣkṛṣṭadevatā madhyaḥ prakṛtau samudāyayoḥ
sūrya ādi pada madhyaḥ ca vikṛtau avadhāryate iti
yoga bādhāt iti
adhyayana ādi kāle iṣṭa tva abhāvena phala upahita iṣṭadevatā prakāśaka mantra tva abhāvena yoga bādhāt tad artham
svarūpa yogyatā mātreṇa śakti aṅgīkāre ca aniṣṭa devatā prakāśaka padānām api yogyatā mātreṇa
prayoga upapatteḥ adhyayana ādi kāle sarva sūktavāke eva tad prasiddheḥ rūḍhi kalpanam āvaśyakam iti āśaṅkā arthaḥ
aśvakarṇa ādau iti
aśvakarṇa ādi śabdaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt śrutivirodhābhāvāt upajīvyatvena mukhyasāmarthyasyāpi yuktaṃ viniyojakatvamabhipretya prayojanamāha -------- prayojanamiti //
analyzed: tasmāt śruti virodha abhāvāt upajīvya tvena mukhya sāmarthyasya api yuktam viniyojaka tvam abhipretya prayojanam āha prayojanam iti
tad tad kālīna pradhāna aṅgatayā praharaṇa anuṣṭhāne tad kālīna pradhāna saṃbandhi devatā vācaka pada yuktaḥ
sūktavākaḥ tad bhinna kālīna pradhāna saṃbandhi devatā vāci pada uddhāreṇa paṭhanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: siddhāntaprayojanoktyā pūrvapakṣe vyatirekeṇa paurṇamāsyāmamāvāsyāyāṃ vā kṛtsnasya prayojanamiti prayojanamarthāt sūcitam //
analyzed: siddhānta prayojana uktyā pūrvapakṣe vyatirekeṇa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyām vā kṛtsnasya prayojanam iti prayojanam arthāt sūcitam

original: yattu ------- prakāśakāraiḥ pūrvapakṣe sūktavākasya praharaṇaprayuktatvāt prastarasya nāśadoṣāpahāreṣvaprayogaḥ,
analyzed: yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ pūrvapakṣe sūktavākasya praharaṇa prayukta tvāt prastarasya nāśa doṣa apahāreṣu aprayogaḥ
siddhānte tu iṣṭadevatā prakāśana prayukta tvāt prayogaḥ iti prayojana antaram uktam

original: tatprastaranāśādiṣu ājyena homānuṣṭhānasya siddhānta iva pūrvapakṣe 'pi tulyatvena
analyzed: tad prastara nāśa ādiṣu ājyena homa anuṣṭhānasya siddhānte iva pūrvapakṣe tulya tvena
prayojaka homa sattvāt prayoga upapatteḥ prastara homa abhāve avabhṛthe iṣṭadevatā prakāśana mātra anurodhena
tad anuṣṭhānasya siddhānte pi adarśanāt ayuktam iti kaustubhe

original: atrāpica homābhāve 'pi iṣṭadevatāprakāśanasya sūktavākapāṭhaviṣaye prayojakatvanirāsopapādanavyājenaiva sūcitam //
analyzed: atra api ca homa abhāve pi iṣṭadevatā prakāśanasya sūktavāka pāṭha viṣaye prayojaka tva nirāsa upapādana vyājena eva sūcitam
iti ṣaṣṭham sūktavāka vibhajya viniyoga adhikaraṇam
a pā liṅga
kāmya iṣṭi kāṇḍe indra agni ādi devatyāḥ kāmya iṣṭayaḥ samāmnātāḥ

original: tenaiva krameṇa mantrakāṇḍe tattalliṅgā eva kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍamityevaṃ samākhyātā yājyānuvākyāmantrāḥ samāmnātāḥ /
analyzed: tena eva krameṇa mantra kāṇḍe tad tad liṅgāḥ eva kāmya yājyā anuvākyā kāṇḍam iti evam samākhyātāḥ yājyā anuvākyā mantrāḥ samāmnātāḥ
te liṅgāt indra agni ādi devatya karma mātra aṅgam
na tu durbala krama samākhyā anurodhena kāmya iṣṭi mātra aṅgam
na ca sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa abhāve liṅga mātreṇa viniyoga ayogaḥ
mantra gata prayojana ākāṅkṣā sahakṛta liṅgena sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa abhāve pi indra agni ādi devatā prakāśane mantra viniyoga upapatteḥ
naca indra agni svarūpe ānarthakyāt apūrva sādhanatva lakṣaṇa artham krama ādi apekṣā iti vācyam
indra agni ādi devatānām juhū vat kratu avyabhicarita tvena lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ
vyabhicāri tve pi vā laukikasya agni ādeḥ vaiyarthyāt eva vāraṇa upapattau pariśeṣāt evā apūrvīya tva upasthiteḥ
atas liṅga mātreṇa krama samākhyayoḥ bādhāt sarva artha tvam iti prāpte ākāṅkṣā bhāve
yogyatā rūpasya liṅgasya viniyojaka tva anupapatteḥ mantra gata prayojana ākāṅkṣāyāḥ ca sarva mantrāṇām

original: vācastome viniyogena nirākāṅkṣatayā abhāvānna liṅgamātrāt sarvārthatvopapattiḥ /
analyzed: vācastome viniyogena nirākāṅkṣa tayā abhāvāt na liṅga mātrāt sarva artha tva upapattiḥ

original: ataśca vākyaprakaraṇādinā sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇena tattadākāṅkṣotthāpanāttattatkratusaṃbandhe 'vagate dvāraviśeṣa eva liṅgādavagamyate
analyzed: atas ca vākya prakaraṇa ādinā sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇena tad tad ākāṅkṣā utthāpanāt tad tad kratu saṃbandhe vagate dvāra viśeṣaḥ eva liṅgāt avagamyate
na ca vācastomīya vākyena prakaraṇa ādi bādhaḥ
mantra viśeṣa viṣayāṇām teṣām mantra pāṭha kāla utpanna mantra prayojana ākāṅkṣā velāyām anupasthitena tena vākyena bādhā yogāt

original: nacaivaṃ prabalena viniyuktasyāpi durbalena viniyoge utkṛṣṭasyāpi pūṣānumantraṇamantrasya prakaraṇena gauṇer'the viniyogāpattiḥ;
analyzed: naca evam prabalena viniyuktasya api durbalena viniyoge utkṛṣṭasya api pūṣa anumantraṇa mantrasya prakaraṇena gauṇa irthe viniyoga āpattiḥ
pramāṇa dvayasya api eka viṣaya tvāt mantra prayojana ākāṅkṣā velāyām prabala pramāṇasya upasthita tvāt ca bādhaka tva upapatteḥ
atas ca prakṛte bādhā yogāt krama samākhyā anurodhāt kāmya iṣṭi viṣaya tvam eva mantrāṇām
na ca anyatra ākāṅkṣā utthāpakam kiñcid asti
avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha ādeḥ ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt
vastutas tu na atra avyabhicāraḥ

original: juhvādīnāṃ hi na tattvenānyatra kāraṇateti tasyā yuktaḥ kratunāvyabhicāritaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
analyzed: juhvā ādīnām hi na tattvena anyatra kāraṇatā iti tasyāḥ yuktaḥ kratunā avyabhicāritaḥ saṃbandhaḥ

original: devatārūpasyāgnyādiśabdasya tu ānupūrvīviśiṣṭavarṇatvena kratuṃ pratīva svārthapratipādanaṃ pratyapi kāraṇatvānnāvyabhicaritakratusaṃbandha  #
analyzed: devatā rūpasya agni ādi śabdasya tu ānupūrvī viśiṣṭa varṇa tvena kratum prati iva sva artha pratipādanam prati api kāraṇa tvāt na avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha
iti vaiṣamyam
atas ca vyabhicārāt avyabhicāre pi vā ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka tva anupapatteḥ na anyatra viniyogaḥ

original: ataeva svārasikī ākāṅkṣā yatra na nivartate yathār'thajñāne upaniṣajjanyātmajñāne vā,
analyzed: ataeva svārasikī ākāṅkṣā yatra na nivartate yathā artha jñāne upaniṣad janya ātma jñāne vā

original: tatra ākāṅkṣotthāpanaprayojanābhāvāt sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇaṃ vināpi bhavatyeva liṅgamātrādviniyogaḥ,
analyzed: tatra ākāṅkṣā utthāpana prayojana abhāvāt sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇam vinā api bhavati eva liṅga mātrāt viniyogaḥ
prakṛte tu svārasika ākāṅkṣā nivṛtteḥ ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa apekṣā iti vaiṣamyam
na ca evam prabala krama mātreṇa eva tad upapatteḥ samākhyā vaiyarthyam

original: yatra sāptadaśyavadagnidevatyakarmakrame āgneyamantradvayāmnānaṃ tatra prathamātikrame kāraṇābhāvātkramāvirodhācca sāmidhenīṣu niveśe prāpte  #
analyzed: yatra sāptadaśya vat agni devatya karma krame āgneya mantra dvaya āmnānam tatra prathama atikrame kāraṇa abhāvāt krama avirodhāt ca sāmidhenīṣu niveśe prāpte
samākhyayā yājyā anuvākyā kārye niveśaḥ
sāmidhenīṣu tu anyāsām āgamaḥ
na ca evam krama upanyāsa vaiyarthyam
yatra anya devatya pūrva iṣṭi yājyā āmnāna anantaram uttara iṣṭi yājyātaḥ pūrvam āgneyyaḥ ṛcaḥ paṭhitāḥ tatra

original: talliṅgakamantreṇa yājyākārye niveśāsaṃbhavāt samākhyābādhe 'pi kramamātreṇottareṣṭisāmidhenīkārye viniveśaḥ,
analyzed: tad liṅgaka mantreṇa yājyā kārye niveśa asaṃbhavāt samākhyā bādhe pi krama mātreṇa uttara iṣṭi sāmidhenī kārye viniveśaḥ
tad sāmidhenī sthāna paṭhita tvāt
atas siddham kāmya iṣṭiṣu eva viniyogaḥ iti
iti saptamam liṅga krama samākhyāna adhikaraṇam
kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ iti
aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet yasya sajātāḥ vīyuḥ

original: “agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet rukkāma” ityādivākyavihitā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet ruc kāmaḥ ityādi vākya vihitāḥ iti arthaḥ
sajātāḥ jñātayaḥ vipratipannāḥ bhaveyuḥ itivīyuḥ iti asya arthaḥ
tad tad liṅgāḥ eva iti

original: yadeveṣṭiṣu cihnamindrāgnyādidevatāśabdastadeva cihnaṃ yeṣu tādṛśya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yat eva iṣṭiṣu cihnam indra agni ādi devatā śabdaḥ tat eva cihnam yeṣu tādṛśyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yājyā anuvākyā mantrāḥ iti
indra agnī rocanāt iva ityādayaḥ iti arthaḥ
vakṣyamāṇa niyata vyavasthā upapādaka tayā krama samākhyā śabdayoḥ upādānam

original: tatra liṅgaviniyogavicārāt pādādhyāyasaṅgatī pūrvatra śruteḥ liṅgasāpekṣatve ukte
analyzed: tatra liṅga viniyoga vicārāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī pūrvatra śruteḥ liṅga sāpekṣa tve ukte
prasaṅgāt iha liṅgasya api anya pramāṇa sāpekṣa tva pratipādanāt prāsaṅgikīm anantara saṅgatim ca
tathā kim etāḥ liṅgāt indra agni devatya nitya kāmya karma mātra aṅgam uta pūrva ukta kāmya iṣṭi mātra aṅgam

original: kramasamākhyābhyāmiti saṃśayaṃ ca spaṣṭatvādanuktvā pūrvapakṣamāha ------- tatheti //
analyzed: krama samākhyābhyām iti saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrvapakṣam āha tathā iti
svādhyāya vidhi adhyāpitasya mantra jātasya prayojana ākāṅkṣa tvāt ākāṅkṣā sahakṛtena yogyatā rūpeṇa
liṅgena mantrasya indra agni prakāśana artha tva upapatteḥ liṅgasya sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa apekṣā bhāvena
krama samākhyābhyām niyata vyavasthā sidhyet

original: nahi liṅgaṃ sāmānyataḥ kratusaṃbandhe 'vagata eva dvāraviśeṣe viniyojakamityatra kiñcinniyāmakamasti /
analyzed: nahi liṅgam sāmānyatas kratu saṃbandhe vagate eva dvāra viśeṣe viniyojakam iti atra kiñcid niyāmakam asti
śruti vat eva pūrvam kratu saṃbandha an avagame pi ākāṅkṣā sahakṛta liṅga mātreṇa viniyoga upapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
devatā tvasya yāga eka nirūpita tvāt vihita tva ghaṭita tvena alaukika tvāt avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandham upapādayati indra agni ādi iti

original: devatātvasya alaukikatve 'pi tena rūpeṇa mantre 'prakāśanādadhiṣṭhānamātrasya cendrāgnyādeḥ
analyzed: devatā tvasya alaukika tve pi tena rūpeṇa mantre prakāśanāt adhiṣṭhāna mātrasya ca indra agni ādeḥ
mantra arthavāda ādau yāgam vinā svarga leka ādi stha tvena pratipādanāt laukika tva avagateḥ
na avyabhicarita tvam iti abhipretya āha vyabhicāri tve pi vā iti
mantra arthavādānām anya para tvena aindra ādīnām svarga ādi stha tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ
pariśeṣāt eva iti
indra ādi padāt taddhitena kratu avyabhicāri tvena eva devatā tva pratīteḥ smāraka vidhayā kratu upasthityā apūrva sādhanatva upasthitiḥ iti arthaḥ
evam apūrva sādhanatva upasthiti artham sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa sāpekṣa tvam liṅge

original: prācīnopapāditaṃ vyarthaṃ sūcayitvā mantrāṇāmākāṅkṣotthāpakatvena tadapekṣatvaṃ svayaṃ

analyzed: darśayan siddhāntam āha ākāṅkṣā bhāvaḥ iti

original: vahanayogyasyāpi puṃso nairākāṅkṣye sati vahane viniyogādarśanādyogyatāmātrasya ākāṅkṣābhāve viniyojakatvānupapatterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vahana yogyasya api puṃsaḥ nairākāṅkṣye sati vahane viniyoga adarśanāt yogya tā mātrasya ākāṅkṣā abhāve viniyojaka tva anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
vācastoma padam brahmayajña ādeḥ api upalakṣaṇam
vākya prakaraṇa ādinā iti

original: tatra vaṣaṭkārādimantrāṇām “eṣa vai saptadaśa” iti vākyam lavanamantrāṇāṃ prakaraṇaṃ prakṛte kramasamākhyobhayaṃ pūṣānumantraṇādausamākhyāmātramiti  #
analyzed: tatra vaṣaṭkāra ādi mantrāṇām eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ iti vākyam lavana mantrāṇām prakaraṇam prakṛte krama samākhyā ubhayam pūṣa anumantraṇa ādau samākhyā mātram iti
vivekaḥ
idam eva sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa sāpekṣa tvam liṅgasya
śruteḥ tu svatas eva tad utthāpaka tvāt tad anapekṣā iti arthaḥ
mantra viśeṣa iti
sāmānya viśeṣa bhāva nyāyena api viparīta bādhaka tā sūcanāya viśeṣa pada upādānam
durbalena iti
ākāṅkṣā utthāpanena iti śeṣaḥ
pramāṇa dvaya iti
vācastoma viniyojaka vākyasya mantra prayojana ākāṅkṣā velāyām anupasthita tvena bādhaḥ eva
na tu tena durbalayoḥ api bādhaḥ

original: iha tadānīmeva upasthitapramāṇadvayasamāveśe prabalena durbalasya bādha eveti na tadākāṅkṣotthāpakatvasaṃbhava iti viśeṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: iha tadānīm eva upasthita pramāṇa dvaya samāveśe prabalena durbalasya bādhaḥ eva iti na tad ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka tva saṃbhavaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na ca anyatra iti
krama prāpta kāmya iṣṭi vyatirikta karmaṇi iti arthaḥ
pramāṇa abhāvāt iti
prakaraṇa pāṭha ādau prakaraṇa paṭhitena mayā katham asya upakartavyam iti apekṣā utpattyā api
avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandhasya vyāpti rūpa tayā tasya anaiyatya bādhaka tve pi ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka tve pramāṇa abhāvaḥ

original: nahi vahniviṣaye nirākāṅkṣasya vahnyanumitau jātāyāṃ tadviṣaye vyāptimātreṇākāṅkṣā upajāyate /
analyzed: nahi vahni viṣaye nirākāṅkṣasya vahni anumitau jātāyām tad viṣaye vyāpti mātreṇa ākāṅkṣā upajāyate
atas na tasya ākāṅkṣā utpādaka tva saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
avyabhicarita kratu saṃbandha svarūpasya anyathā durupapāda tvāt apūrva mātra nirūpita sādhanatā avacchedakībhūta dharma avacchinnasya apūrva avyabhicarita tva rūpatayā eva avaśya nirvacanīyasya api
iha asaṃbhavaḥ iti āha vastutas tu iti
sva artha pratipādanam
tasya tam prati akāraṇa tve artha pratipādaka tva abhāvena prātipadika saṃjñā anupapattiḥ

original: juhūśabdasya tatra kāraṇatve 'pi kratuṃ pratyākāraviśeṣaviśiṣṭārthasyaiva niyamena kāraṇatvamiti vaiṣamyam /
analyzed: juhū śabdasya tatra kāraṇa tve pi kratum prati ākāra viśeṣa viśiṣṭa arthasya eva niyamena kāraṇa tvam iti vaiṣamyam

original: ata evātrārthasya apūrvasādhanatvakalpane pramāṇābhāvānna taddvārāpi padasya apūrvāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva atra arthasya apūrva sādhanatva kalpane pramāṇa abhāvān na tad dvārā api padasya apūrva avyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ
svārasikī iti
svatas eva sākāṅkṣasya na ākāṅkṣā utthāpaka pramāṇa apekṣā iti arthaḥ
upaniṣad iti
atra ca avināśī vai are yama ātmā an ucchitti dharmā mātrā saṃsargaḥ tu asya bhavatī
ti upaniṣad janyam mātrā śabda vācya dharma adharma vikāra śarīra saṃbandha rahita sāṃsārika kartṛ bhoktṛ nitya ātma jñānam ekam

original: tathā “apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyuḥ viśoko vijighnannasaṃpipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpa”
analyzed: tathā apahata pāpmā vijaraḥ vimṛtyuḥ viśokaḥ vijighnan asaṃpipāsaḥ satya kāmaḥ satya saṃkalpa
ityādi upaniṣad kṛta pāpa ādi doṣa rāhitya kāmyamāna phala prāpti prayatna anapekṣa saṃkalpa mātra adhīna siddhi rūpa guṇa viśiṣṭa ātma

original: pratipādanapūrvikayā “so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavya” iti śrutyā vihitaṃ vedāntavākyāvadhāraṇātmakajijñāsopetaṃ
analyzed: pratipādana pūrvikayā saḥ nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ iti śrutyā vihitam vedānta vākya avadhāraṇa ātmaka jijñāsā upetam
tad avadhārita ātma svarūpa anucintana ākhya anveṣaṇa ātmakam apahata pāpma tva ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa ātma jñānam dvitīyam

original: tathā ātmānamupāsītetyādi vidhivihitaṃ nirguṇātmaviṣayamaparokṣasākṣātkāraparyantamātmajñānaṃ tṛtīyamiti yadyapyātmajñānaṃ trividham;
analyzed: tathā ātmānam upāsīta ityādi vidhi vihitam nirguṇa ātma viṣayam aparokṣa sākṣātkāra paryantam ātma jñānam tṛtīyam iti yadi api ātma jñānam trividham

original: tathāpi dvitīyatṛtīyayorupāsanārūpātmajñānayoḥ karmaṇi puruṣe vā dṛṣṭaprayojanābhāvādadṛṣṭāpekṣāyāṃ
analyzed: tathā api dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ upāsanā rūpa ātma jñānayoḥ karmaṇi puruṣe vā dṛṣṭa prayojana abhāvāt adṛṣṭa apekṣāyām

original: śrutyādyabhāvena kratvaṅgatvānupapatteḥ “sa sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmānavāpnoti
analyzed: śruti ādi abhāvena kratu aṅga tva anupapatteḥ sa sarvān ca lokān āpnoti sarvān ca kāmān avāpnoti
tarati śokam ātma vidi tyādi vākya śeṣa samarpitam dvitīya ātma jñānasya phalam

original: tathā “sa khalvevaṃ vartayan yāvadāyuṣaṃ brahmalokamabhisaṃbadhyate naca punarāvartate”
analyzed: tathā sa khalu evam vartayan yāvadāyuṣam brahma lokam abhisaṃbadhyate na ca punar āvartate

original: iti vākyaśeṣasasarpitaṃ phalaṃ tṛtīyātmajñānasyeti vyākaraṇādhikaraṇe ācāryaiḥ puruṣārthatvasya
analyzed: iti vākyaśeṣa sa sarpitam phalam tṛtīya ātma jñānasya iti vyākaraṇa adhikaraṇe ācāryaiḥ puruṣa artha tvasya
pratipādanāt iha prathamam eva ātma jñānam grāhyam
tasya kratu aṅga tvam kevala liṅgāt eva
yadi api atra api vākyaśeṣa samarpitam phalam saṃbhāvyate
tathā api tasya parṇamayī nyāyena artha vāda tvāt aṅga tvam eva iti arthaḥ
viniyogaḥ iti
na ca artha jñānasya sākṣāt karmasu sāmarthyāt avyabhicāri dvāra anapekṣaṇāt liṅga mātreṇa
karmaṇi viniyoga saṃbhave pi ātma jñānasya sākṣāt karma viṣaya tva abhāvena tatra asāmarthyāt

original: jñeyātmarūpasya dvārasya lokavedasādhāraṇyena kratvavyabhicārābhāvāt kathaṃ tanmātreṇa
analyzed: jñeya ātma rūpasya dvārasya loka veda sādhāraṇyena kratu avyabhicāra abhāvāt katham tad mātreṇa
kratu aṅga tvam iti vācyam

original: laukikakarmapravṛtteḥ dehādivyatiriktātmajñānaṃ vināpi siddheḥ tadvyāvṛttaye avyabhicaritadvārānapekṣaṇāt

analyzed: pāralaukika phala sādhana karmaṇām eva ākāṅkṣita tvena sāmarthya mātreṇa tad upapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
vistareṇa ca etat viśvajit adhikaraṇe caturthe upapādayiṣyate

original: atraca yathānuṣṭheyakarmānuṣṭhānaupayikatvena ātmajñānasya karmāṅgatā tathā na niṣiddhakarmāṅgatvam;
analyzed: atra ca yathā anuṣṭheya karma anuṣṭhāna aupayika tvena ātma jñānasya karma aṅga tā tathā na niṣiddha karma aṅga tvam
tathātve anātma jñānavatā kṛta brahma hanana pratyavāya janaka tva anāpatteḥ
kintu tad phalībhūta nivṛtti aṅgatvam eva

original: taduktaṃ vārtike -------- “ātmajñānaṃ hi saṃyogapṛthaktvāt kratvarthapuruṣārthatvena jñāyate /
analyzed: tat uktam vārtike ātma jñānam hi saṃyoga pṛthaktvāt kratu artha puruṣa artha tvena jñāyate
tena vinā para loka phaleṣu karmasu pravṛtti nivṛtti asaṃbhavāt
iti
etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ niṣedha paripālana rūpa nivṛtteḥ apūrva janaka tva abhāvena tatra upaniṣad niyama janya apūrva anupayogāt nitya tva ādi prakāraka ātma jñānasya
nivṛttau svarūpa upayogi tayā eva upayogaḥ
upaniṣad niyamaḥ tu na apekṣyate
vihita karmasu tu saḥ pi iti jñeyam

original: athavā ------- yathā niṣedhādhyayananiyamo niṣedheṣvanupayujyamāno 'pinimittaniścayadvārā prāyaścitteṣu upayujyate,
analyzed: athavā yathā niṣedha adhyayana niyamaḥ niṣedheṣu anupayujyamānaḥ pi nimitta niścaya dvārā prāyaścitteṣu upayujyate

original: tathoktātmajñānaniyamo niṣedhe anupayukto 'pi prāyaścittādhikārahetubhūtāmanutāpahetukāṃ nivṛttiṃ saṃpādayan prāyaścitteṣu upayujyata iti draṣṭavyam
analyzed: tathā ukta ātma jñāna niyamaḥ niṣedhe anupayuktaḥ pi prāyaścitta adhikāra hetu bhūtām anutāpa hetukām nivṛttim saṃpādayan prāyaścitteṣu upayujyate iti draṣṭavyam

original: etacca sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇaṃ vinā kvāpi liṅgamātrasya viniyojakatvāyogāt
analyzed: etat ca sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇam vinā kvāpi liṅga mātrasya viniyojaka tva ayogāt

original: “yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavatī“ti “omityudgīthamupāsīte“ti
analyzed: yat eva vidyayā karoti śraddhayā upaniṣadā tat eva vīryavattaram bhavati iti om iti udgītham upāsīta iti

original: udgīthopāsanāprakaraṇe chāndogye paṭhitābhyāmapi vākyābhyāmeva prakaraṇabādhena tayoḥ
analyzed: udgītha upāsanā prakaraṇe chāndogye paṭhitābhyām api vākyābhyām eva prakaraṇa bādhena tayoḥ
kratu aṅga tvam na liṅga mātreṇa iti nyāyasudhākṛtaḥ bhimatam api prakaraṇa bādhena etad vākyābhyām
sarva kratu aṅga tva ayogāt ayuktam iti pārthasārathi abhisaṃhita dūṣaṇam abhipretya uktam

original: nyāyasudhākṛnmatopanyāsapūrvakaṃ taddūṣaṇopanyāseca prakāśakāraireva parākrāntamiti neha tat prapañcyate //
analyzed: nyāyasudhākṛt mata upanyāsa pūrvakam tad dūṣaṇa upanyāse ca prakāśakāraiḥ eva parākrāntam iti na iha tat prapañcyate
paramārthataḥ tu yadi kṛṣi ādi vat nitya prāptasya vidhi kalpane pramāṇa abhāvena
vidheya tva anupapatteḥ janyatā mātra bodhe pi aṅgatva asaṃbhavāt aṅgatā bodhaka tvena yat eva iti etat vākya dvayam eva
svīkartavyam iti kaustubhe pūjya pāda uktam anusandhīyate

original: tadā karotītyasya leṭtvaṃ prakalpya kathañcit nyāyasudhoktameva sādhviti jñeyam //
analyzed: tadā karoti iti asya leṭ tvam prakalpya kathañcid nyāyasudhā uktam eva sādhu iti jñeyam
samākhyā vaiyarthyam iti

original: yājyānuvākyākāṇḍamiti samākhyāvaiyarthyaṃ sūtre ca tadupādānaṃ vyarthamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yājyā anuvākyā kāṇḍam iti samākhyā vaiyarthyam sūtre ca tad upādānam vyartham iti arthaḥ
sāptadaśya vat iti

original: sāmidhenyaṅgabhūtasāptadaśyaṃ yasmin karmaṇi agnidevatye pāthikṛtīyeṣṭirūpe ātideśikamantraprāptyā na pradhāne yājyāpekṣā;
analyzed: sāmidhenī aṅga bhūta sāptadaśyam yasmin karmaṇi agni devatye pāthikṛtīya iṣṭi rūpe ātideśika mantra prāptyā na pradhāne yājyā apekṣā
vācanika sāptadaśya āmnānāt
sāmidhenīṣu āgneya ṛk dvaya apekṣā
tatra tad tad iṣṭi krama āmnāta āgneya mantra dvayasya prathama atikrame kāraṇa abhāvena sāmidhenīṣu

original: kramāvirodhena ca niveśaprasaktau yājyākārye tanniveśasya samākhyayaiva vaktavyatvāt
analyzed: krama avirodhena ca niveśa prasaktau yājyā kārye tad niveśasya samākhyayā eva vaktavya tvāt
tad āvaśyaka tvam iti arthaḥ
ataeva etādṛśa sthale apekṣita vidhāna rūpa nyāyasya eva samākhyayā bādhaḥ
na tu kramasya kaścana visaṃkocaḥ iti
sāmidhenīṣu anyayoḥ āgamam āha sāmidhenīṣu iti

original: evaṃ tarhi kāmyayājyānuvākyākāṇḍamiti samākhyayaiveṣṭasiddheḥ kramopanyāsavaiyarthyamāśaṅkya pariharati --------- nacaivamiti //
analyzed: evam tarhi kāmya yājyā anuvākyā kāṇḍam iti samākhyayā eva iṣṭa siddheḥ krama upanyāsa vaiyarthyam āśaṅkya pariharati na ca evam iti
yatra iti

original: agnivāruṇeṣṭikrame taddevatyayājyānuvākye paṭhitvā somāraudreṣṭikramāmnātatattaddevatyayājyānuvākyāpāṭhāt āgneyya ṛcaḥ pṛthupājavatyaśca samāmnātāḥ,
analyzed: agni vāruṇa iṣṭi krame tad devatya yājyā anuvākye paṭhitvā somāraudra iṣṭi krama āmnāta tad tad devatya yājyā anuvākyā pāṭhāt āgneyyaḥ ṛcaḥ pṛthu pājavatyaḥ ca samāmnātāḥ
tatra tāsām liṅga viniyukta mantra antareṇa bādhāt uttara iṣṭi yājya kārye samākhyā mātreṇa

original: viniyogānupapatteḥ liṅgasahakṛtasamākhyayānyatra viniyogaprasaktau krameṇa tāṃ bādhitvā
analyzed: viniyoga anupapatteḥ liṅga sahakṛta samākhyayā anyatra viniyoga prasaktau krameṇa tām bādhitvā
uttara iṣṭi sāmidhenī niveśa lābhāya krama upādānam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu kramaḥ pūrvasyāmapīṣṭau sādharaṇa ityata āha -------- tatsāmidhenīti //
analyzed: nanu kramaḥ pūrvasyām api iṣṭau sādharaṇaḥ iti atas āha tat sāmidhenī iti
pūrva iṣṭi sāmidhenī sthānasya tadīya yājyā ādi pāṭhena vyavadhānāt uttara iṣṭi sāmidhenī sthāne eva paṭhita tvam iti arthaḥ
siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas iti

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvottarapakṣapratipādanena tathā “manotāyāntu vacanādavikāra” iti dāśamikādhikaraṇapūrvottarapakṣaprayojanena ca spaṣṭatvānnoktam
analyzed: prayojanam pūrva uttara pakṣa pratipādanena tathā manotā āyāntu vacanāt avikāraḥ iti dāśamika adhikaraṇa pūrva uttara pakṣa prayojanena ca spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti saptamam liṅga sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa apekṣa tva adhikaraṇam liṅga krama samākhyāna adhikaraṇam
a pā adhikāre
jyotiṣṭome āgneyyā āgnīdhram upatiṣṭhate iti atra kim aprakṛta sādhāraṇyena ṛc mātram āgnīdhra upasthāna aṅgam

original: uta prakṛtā eva yāḥ stotrādāvapi viniyuktāstā eveti cintāyām --------- āgneyīpadasyāviśeṣeṇa
analyzed: uta prakṛtāḥ eva yāḥ stotra ādau api viniyuktāḥ tāḥ eva iti cintāyām āgneyī padasya aviśeṣeṇa
sarva paratvāt prakaraṇasya tad saṃkocaka tva anupapatteḥ agni devatya ṛc mātrasya eva viśiṣṭa vidhi uttara kālīna viśeṣaṇa vidhinā
āgnīdhra upasthāna aṅga tvena vidhānam
na tu atra āgneyī uddeśyā
yena ānarthakya bhiyā vrīhi vat prakaraṇena saṃkocyeta
tṛtīyayā upādeya tva avagamāt
yatra ca upasthāna svarūpe ānarthakya āśaṅkā
tatra prakaraṇa anupraveśe pi na āgneyī padasya prakṛta para tva āpattiḥ
na ca āgneyī padasya yaugika tvāt taddhita anta tvāt vā saṃnihita paratvam
yaugikānām avayava artha viśiṣṭa vyakti mātra vāci tvena saṃnihita vāci tve pramāṇa abhāvāt
taddhitasya tad vāci tve pi prakṛtānām ṛcām eka prakaraṇa stha tve pi pradeśa antara stha tvena saṃnihita tva abhāvāt
astu vā prakaraṇa saṃnihitasya eva taddhitena grahaṇam

original: tathāpi yatra na taddhitaśravaṇaṃ yathā brahmaudanaprāśanādau caturo brāhmaṇān bhojayedityādau,
analyzed: tathā api yatra na taddhita śravaṇam yathā brahmaudana prāśana ādau caturaḥ brāhmaṇān bhojayet ityādau
tatra prakṛta ṛtvij grahaṇe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ

original: naca ------ prakṛtānāmapūrvārthatvasya kḷptatvātkekavalaṃ dvārarūpāgnīdhropasthāpanasaṃbandhakaraṇe lāghavādaprakṛtānāñcobhayakaraṇe gauravāpatteḥ  #
analyzed: naca prakṛtānām apūrva artha tvasya kḷpta tvāt kekavalam dvāra rūpa āgnīdhra upasthāpana saṃbandha karaṇe lāghavāt aprakṛtānām ca ubhaya karaṇe gaurava āpatteḥ
prakṛta niyamaḥ iti vācyam
prakṛta grahaṇe pi upasthāna svarūpasya dvāra tve tad kārya āpanne ūha ādi anāpatteḥ apūrva sādhana tva lakṣaṇāyāḥ āvaśyaka tvāt
nahi prakṛta viṣaye pi prakaraṇena vākya antara kalpanayā apūrva artha tva bodhaḥ

original: tathātve vrīhīṇāṃ svarūpeṇa dvāratvāpattau yavānāṃ tadanāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tathātve vrīhīṇām sva rūpeṇa dvāra tva āpattau yavānām tad anāpatteḥ
atas lāghavāt apūrva sādhanībhūta stotra tvena eva uddeśya tā
tāvatā ca apūrva sādhanībhūta upasthāna artha tvasya alābhāt
asti eva prakṛta grahaṇe tad vidhau apūrva sādhana tva lakṣaṇā
apica stotra apūrva sādhana tva kḷptau api na upasthāna janya jyotiṣṭoma apūrva sādhana tva lābhaḥ prakṛtānām
atas sarvāsām eva grahaṇam
aprakṛtānām eva vā
kārya sākāṅkṣa tvāt iti prāpte aprakṛta grahaṇe tāsām apūrva sādhanībhūta upasthāna artha tva anyathā anupapattyā
apūrva artha tvasya api vrīhi ādi vat kalpanīya tva āpatteḥ prakṛtānām ca kārya antara saṃbandha bodhaka vidhau eva apūrva artha tvasya
kḷpta tvāt lāghava upajīvinā prakṛta niyamaḥ

original: saṃbhavatica prakṛtānāmapyāgneyīnāṃ vāṅniyamanyāyena stotradvārā jyotiṣṭomāpūrvasaṃbandhāsaṃbhave 'pi kāryāntaradvārā saḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca prakṛtānām api āgneyīnām vāc niyama nyāyena stotra dvārā jyotiṣṭoma apūrva saṃbandha asaṃbhave pi kārya antara dvārā saḥ

original: āgneyīnāṃ stotrādau viniyoge 'pi pārthakyena jyotiṣṭamaprakaraṇe pāṭhādeva vā tadapūrvasaṃbandhāvagamaḥ /
analyzed: āgneyīnām stotra ādau viniyoge pārthakyena jyotiṣṭama prakaraṇe pāṭhāt eva vā tad apūrva saṃbandha avagamaḥ
ayam eva ca brahmaudana prāśane ṛtvij tva niyāmaka nyāyaḥ
na ca evam ātreyāya hiraṇyam dadāti iti atra api tad niyama āpattiḥ
ṛtvikṣu ātreya tvasya niyamena aprāpteḥ

original: ataeva cāgnimupanidhāya stuvītetyādāvākṣepaṇīyastotrāpūrvasaṃbandhasyāhavanīyādāvaprāptatvānna tanniyamo 'pitu vinā vacanaṃ āyatanabahirbhāvāyogāllaukikasyaiveti  #

atas siddham lāghava anurodhena prakṛtasya eva grahaṇam

āgneyyā iti

original: etacca aindyā sado vaiṣṇavyā havirdhānamiti vākyadvayasyāpyupalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat ca aindyā sadaḥ vaiṣṇavyā havirdhānam iti vākya dvayasya api upalakṣaṇam
atra yadi api śruteḥ viniyojaka tvam

original: tathāpi liṅgena sāmānyasaṃbandhakāripramāṇasāpekṣatvena viniyoge pūrvādhikaraṇe cintite
analyzed: tathā api liṅgena sāmānya saṃbandha kāri pramāṇa sāpekṣa tvena viniyoge pūrva adhikaraṇe cintite

pāda saṅgatim atas eva tathā eva anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an ullikhya aprakṛta mātra grahaṇa koṭim

original: kaiścit bhrameṇoktāṃ nirasitumavaśyavaktavyaṃ saṃśayaṃ darśayati ------ kimiti //

original: aprakṛtamātragrahaṇapakṣo hi prakṛtānāṃ yātayāmatvāt viniyuktaviniyogāt vā grahaṇāsaṃbhave saṃbhavet,

na ca tat ubhayam atra asti

prakṛta mātra grahaṇa pakṣasya ayukta tvam prakṛta aprakṛta sādhāraṇya uktyā sūcitam
tāḥ eva iti

original: yadyapyāgneyyā upādeyatvāt tadgataikatvavivakṣayā na bahvīnāṃ karaṇatvaprasaktiḥ;

original: tathāpi prakṛtāgneyībahutvamādāya athavā aindrī vaiṣṇavīti ṛgantarābhiprāyeṇa vā tā iti bahuvacanaṃ neyam /

original: tathāca yāḥ prakaraṇe paṭhitāḥ viśiṣya stotrāntare viniyuktā “agna āyāhi vītaya” ityādayaḥ tā evetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca yāḥ prakaraṇe paṭhitāḥ viśiṣya stotra antare viniyuktāḥ agne āyāhi vītaye ityādayaḥ tāḥ eva iti arthaḥ
pūrvapakṣa upapattim āha āgneyī padasya iti

āgneyyā kariṣyamāṇa uddeśya tva āśaṅkā nirāsa upodbalanāya prāpta upasthāna vidhi sūcanāya ca viśiṣṭa vidhi anyathā anupapatti prasūta viśeṣaṇa vidhi vidheya tā uktyā
upādeya tvam sūcitam
taddhita anta tvāt vā iti

original: āgneyīśabdasya taddhitāntatvāt tasyaca sarvanāmārthavṛttitvena sannihitavyaktivācitvāt nāprakṛtagrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: āgneyī śabdasya taddhita anta tvāt tasya ca sarvanāma artha vṛtti tvena sannihita vyakti vāci tvāt na aprakṛta grahaṇam iti arthaḥ
atra nyāya sudhākāra ādibhiḥ agni devatya tva ṛk tva sannihita tva ādīnām mantra viśeṣa upalakṣaṇa tvāt ekena
ca upalakṣaṇena prākṛta kārya siddhau upalakṣaṇa antara anapekṣaṇāt agni devatya ṛk tvayoḥ śruta tva aviśeṣeṇa
ubhayoḥ api upalakṣaṇa tve pi vigraha vākya stha sarvanāma gamya tvena vilambita pratītika tvāt avivakṣā avagateḥ
sarva grahaṇam iti samāhitam
tad sannihita tva upalakṣita vyakti viśeṣasya api guṇa adhikaraṇe taddhita vācyatva prasādhanāt ṛktve pi
strī tva anumeya tayā vilambita pratītika tvasya tulya tayā sannihita tvasya upalakṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ iti

original: kaustubhadarśitarītyā ayuktaṃ matvā tadaṅgīkṛtyāpi pariharati -------- taddhitasyeti //

yathā iti
atra ca sarvanāma śravaṇa abhāvāt brāhmaudanika agni saṃskāraka homa śeṣa odana pratipatti artha tayā
ṛtvij saṃskāra artha tva abhāvena tad nāśe punar bhojana anuṣṭhāna adarśanena ca teṣām uddeśya tva anupapattyā
prakṛta grahaṇe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu evaṃ prakṛtagrahaṇe niyāmakāntarābhāve 'pi aprakṛtagrahaṇe tasyā āgnīdhropasthānasvarūpārthatvenā'narthakyāpatterapūrvārthatvakalpanasyāpyāvaśyakatvāt
analyzed: nanu evam prakṛta grahaṇe niyāmaka antara abhāve pi aprakṛta grahaṇe tasyāḥ āgnīdhra upasthāna sva rūpa artha tvena ānarthakya āpatteḥ apūrva artha tva kalpanasya api āvaśyaka tvāt
kṛpta apūrva artha tāyāḥ prakṛtāyāḥ eva āgnīdhra upasthāpana rūpa dvāra antara saṃbandha mātra karaṇena

prakaraṇena svatantra vākya antara kalpanayā prakṛtāyāḥ apūrva artha tva bodha asaṃbhave kena

original: tarhi tasyāstadbodha ityapekṣāyāṃ yatra yaduddeśena viniyogaḥ tatra apūrvasādhanatvalakṣaṇāyā
analyzed: tarhi tasyāḥ tad bodhaḥ iti apekṣāyām yatra yad uddeśena viniyogaḥ tatra apūrva sādhanatva lakṣaṇāyāḥ

original: evaṃ tāvat prakṛtāprakṛtānāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasādhyādhunā kaiściduktamaprakṛtamātragrahaṇamapi yuktyā pūrvapakṣe sādhayati --------- aprakṛtānāmeva  #

original: puroḍāśakapālasya ananyathāsiddhavācanikaviniyogabalāt nirākāṅkṣasya viniyuktasyāpi viniyogo 'gatyā āśritaḥ,

original: prakṛtetutena rūpeṇa viniyogābhāvādanyathānupapatteśca kṣīṇatvānna yuktaṃ viniyuktanirākāṅkṣaviniyogāśrayaṇamiti ubhayākāṅkṣyā dāśatayīto 'prakṛtagrahaṇameva  #

nyāyyam

original: vastutastu -------- tasyā api vācastomādau viniyogena kāryasākāṅkṣatvābhāvāt ākāṅkṣotthāpakakramasamākhyādirūpasāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇena

original: yasyāḥ sāmānyataḥ kratusaṃbandho 'vagataḥ tasyā yāvalliṅgena viniyogakalpanam tataḥ

yadi api tathābhūtā a stotra aṅga bhūtā api āgneyī bhavati

original: tathāpi tasyāṃ stotra eva nirākāṅkṣatvānna grahaṇamityāśayaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api tasyām stotre eva nirākāṅkṣa tvāt na grahaṇam iti āśayaḥ
siddhāntam āha aprakṛta iti
yadi api upasthāna aṅga tvena mantrasya vidhānāt
tathā api sarvatra apūrva sādhanībhūta aṅga uddeśena aṅga vidhau arthāt apūrva artha tvena api tad vidhānam anyathā anupapattyā vidhi kalpanayā āvaśyakam
tat etat avaghāta vidhau agatyā aṅgīkṛtam
prakṛte tu aprakṛta grahaṇe ca apūrva saṃbandhasya tad sādhana saṃbandhasya ca ubhayasya api

original: śrūyamāṇena vidhinā śrutyarthābhyāṃ karaṇe gauravāpatteḥ prakṛtagrahaṇecāpūrvasaṃbandhasya
analyzed: śrūyamāṇena vidhinā śruti arthābhyām karaṇe gaurava āpatteḥ prakṛta grahaṇa ica apūrva saṃbandhasya
kḷpta tvāt kevalam apūrva sādhanībhūta saṃbandha mātra karaṇena lāghava upapatteḥ tad grahaṇasya eva lāghava upajīvinā
vidhinā anumata tvāt pradhāna bhūta vidhi śruti anurodhena prātipadika śruteḥ saṃkoce pi
bādhaka abhāvena prakṛta mātra grahaṇa siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu upasthāna aṅga bhūtāyāḥ prakṛtāyāḥ katham jyotiṣṭoma apūrva saṃbandha saṃbhavaḥ

original: tasyāḥ stotradvārā tatsaṃbandhādato 'syāstadapūrvasaṃbandhavidhikalpanamāvaśyakamityata āha --------- saṃbhavati ceti //
analyzed: tasyāḥ stotra dvārā tad saṃbandhāt atas syāḥ tad apūrva saṃbandha vidhi kalpanam āvaśyakam iti atas āha saṃbhavati ca iti
stotra dvārā iha tad asaṃbhave pi upasthāna rūpa kārya antara dvārā jyotiṣṭoma apūrva saṃbandha saṃbhavāt na tad apūrva saṃbandha ayogya tvam

original: ataeva ------- yadyapyapūrvasaṃbandhaḥ svakalpakena viśiṣyopasthitena ca kāryāntarasaṃbandhena nirākāṅkṣaḥ;
analyzed: ataeva yadi api apūrva saṃbandhaḥ sva kalpakena viśiṣya upasthitena ca kārya antara saṃbandhena nirākāṅkṣaḥ

original: tathāpi tadā'kāṅkṣayaiva tadupajīvanaṃ nānupapannaṃ iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api tad ākāṅkṣayā eva tad upajīvanam na anupapannam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu prakṛta āgneyī mantrasya stotra apūrva saṃbandha kḷptau api upasthāna janya apūrva saṃbandhasya
dvāra tayā kalpanā āvaśyaka tvena gauravam siddhānte pi aviśiṣṭam eva iti ākṣepaṇīya apūrva saṃbandhasya
kārya antara artham api anyatra niyamena kḷptau tanmātra upajīvanena anyatra kārya antara saṃbandha mātra karaṇam iti etad adhikaraṇa nyāyasya
katham āgneyī vākye pravṛttyā prakṛta niyama siddhiḥ iti atas āha āgneyīnām iti

original: upasthānajanyāpūrvasaṃbandhakalpanāvaśyakatve 'pi na taddvārā jyotiṣṭomasaṃbandho 'pi kalpyaḥ prakṛtagrahaṇe āpatati;
analyzed: upasthāna janya apūrva saṃbandha kalpanā āvaśyaka tve pi na tad dvārā jyotiṣṭoma saṃbandhaḥ api kalpyaḥ prakṛta grahaṇe āpatati
stotram vinā api tad saṃbandhasya pāṭhāt eva siddheḥ
atas stotra apūrva dvāraka tva mātra kalpana vat iha api upasthāna janya apūrva dvāraka tva mātrasya eva
kalpanāt aprakṛta grahaṇe tu tasya api kalpanā āpatteḥ gauravam iti evam ākṣepaṇīya apūrva saṃbandhasya
kḷpta tvam upapādanīyam iti arthaḥ
brahmodanaprāśana vākye brahmodanaprāśana aṅga bhūta brāhmaṇa vidhau prāśanasya pratipatti tvena
dṛṣṭārtha tvāt ādhāna ādi apūrva sādhana lakṣaṇayā tatra tad apūrva saṃbandhasya dṛṣṭārtha tvāt ādhāna ādi apūrva sādhana lakṣaṇayā

original: tatra tadapūrvasaṃbandhasya ṛtvijāṃ prayogāṅgatvena nityaprāptatvāt prakṛtagrahaṇopapattirityabhipretyāha
analyzed: tatra tad apūrva saṃbandhasya ṛtvijām prayoga aṅga tvena nitya prāpta tvāt prakṛta grahaṇa upapattiḥ iti abhipretya āha
ayam eva ca iti
niyamena aprāpteḥ iti

original: tatra niyamataḥ prāptyabhāvena vidhiśruterapūrvasaṃbandhākṣepakatvasyāvaśyakatvānna kadācit prakṛtasattve 'pi tanniyama ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tatra niyamataḥ prāpti abhāvena vidhi śruteḥ apūrva saṃbandha ākṣepaka tvasya āvaśyaka tvāt na kadācid prakṛta sattve pi tad niyamaḥ iti arthaḥ
āyatana iti

original: “vinā eṣa indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasyāhitāgneragnirapakṣāyati taṃ saṃbharedidanta
analyzed: vinā eṣaḥ indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya āhitāgneḥ agniḥ apakṣāyati tam saṃbharet idanta
ekam iti vacanena

prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
yājñikāḥ tu āgneya kṛṣṇa ṛgrīva paśu krama āmrātena agne yana su pathā iti āgneyī mantreṇa abhimarśanam ācaranti na upasthānam
tatra āgneyyā ṛcā āgnīdhram abhimṛśet iti taittirīya śrutiḥ eva pramāṇam draṣṭavyam

original: some ------ “bhakṣe hi māviśetyā” dirbhakṣānuvāka ityevaṃ samākhyāto mantraḥ śrutaḥ /
analyzed: some bhakṣe hi mā āviśa iti ā ādiḥ bhakṣa anuvākaḥ iti evam samākhyātaḥ mantraḥ śrutaḥ

original: tatra yastāvadasyāṃśo bhakṣaṇameva pratipādayati sa tatraiva viniyujyate,
analyzed: tatra yaḥ tāvat asya aṃśaḥ bhakṣaṇam eva pratipādayati sa tatra eva viniyujyate
grahaṇa avekṣaṇa samyak jaraṇa pratipādakānām tu aṃśānām kim grahaṇa ādau eva viniyogaḥ
bhakṣaṇa mantra eka vākya tayā bhakṣaṇe eva iti cintāyām grahaṇa ādeḥ avihita tvena apūrvam
pratyaṅga tva vat janaka tvasya api abhāvāt grahaṇasya arthāt bhakṣaṇa janaka tvena pakṣa prāptau api
bāhubhyām sadhyāsam iti anena uktasya bāhu dvaya karaṇakasya grahaṇasya katham api aprāpteḥ avekṣaṇasya

original: ca bhakṣājanakatvenaivāprāpteḥ samyagjaraṇasya tadanukūlavyāpārasya vā bhakṣottarabhāvitayā
analyzed: ca bhakṣa ajanaka tvena eva aprāpteḥ samyak jaraṇasya tad anukūla vyāpārasya vā bhakṣa uttara bhāvi tayā
bhakṣa ajanaka tvena teṣām apūrva prayojaka tvasya api abhāvāt grahaṇa ādi artha tve ānarthakya āpatteḥ
bhakṣaṇa mantra eka vākya tayā bhakṣaṇa artha tvam eva eṣām
ataeva samākhyā api upapannā bhavati iti prāpte grahaṇa ādi pratyakṣa vidhi abhāve
samākhyā sahakṛta avāntara prakaraṇena bhakṣa saṃbandhe tad tad mantrāṇām avagate liṅga balena
māntravarṇika grahaṇa ādi vidhi kalpanayā tad prāpti upapatteḥ tad artha tvena eva mantra viniyoga upapattau

original: na svato nirākāṅkṣayordvayorākhyātapadayoḥ kathañcidekavākyatāṃ parikalpya gauṇyā
analyzed: na svatas nirākāṅkṣayoḥ dvayoḥ ākhyāta padayoḥ kathañcid ekavākya tām parikalpya gauṇyā

na ca evam api samyak jaraṇasya kṛtya sādhya tvāt na vidhi saṃbhavaḥ
samyak jaraṇa anukūla vyāpārasya āsana viśeṣasya eva anuṣṭheyasya vidheya tvāt

original: vamanavirekanimittaprāyaścittāmnānācca samyagjaraṇaparyantameva bhakṣaṇaṃ pratipattiriti tasya bhakṣopayogitā // 24 // 9 //

analyzed: ādi śabdena vicāra viṣaya tayā āvaśyakasya dīrgha āyu tvāya śantanu tvāya rāyaspoṣāya varcase
