original: mandrābhibhūtiḥ keturyajñānāṃ vāgjuṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu ------- vasumadgaṇasya rudravadgaṇasyādityavadgaṇasya
analyzed: mandra abhibhūtiḥ ketuḥ yajñānām vāc juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu vasumat gaṇasya rudravat gaṇasya ādityavat gaṇasya

original: somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya mādhyandinasya savanasya gāyatrachandasaḥ triṣṭup
analyzed: soma devate mati vidaḥ prātaḥsavanasya mādhyandinasya savanasya gāyatra chandasaḥ triṣṭubh

original: chandaso jagacchandaso 'gnihuta indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata
analyzed: chandasaḥ jagat chandasaḥ gni hutaḥ indra pītasya narāśaṃsa pītasya pitṛ pītasya madhumata
upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi ityantasya bhāgasya upādānam
etat ca bhāṣya likhita krameṇa likhitam

original: taittirīyaśākhāyāntu avakhyeṣamityasyāgre mandrābhibhūtirityādi bhakṣayāmītyantaṃ paṭhitvā hinva me iti paṭhitam /
analyzed: taittirīya śākhāyām tu avakhyeṣam ityasya agre mandra abhibhūtiḥ ityādi bhakṣayāmi iti antam paṭhitvā hinva me iti paṭhitam
pūrvapakṣa upayogi tayā iti evam samākhyātaḥ iti uktam
tatra sarvasya api udāharaṇa tā āśaṅkā nirāsāya viṣayam vivinakti tatra iti

original: mandrābhibhūtirityādi juṣāṇetyantasya tṛptyā asya phalaprakāśanapūrvakaṃ bhakṣaṇaprakāśanārthatvasya
analyzed: mandra abhibhūtiḥ ityādi juṣāṇā iti antasya tṛptyā asya phala prakāśana pūrvakam bhakṣaṇa prakāśana artha tvasya
spaṣṭa tvāt tṛpyatu ityantasya bhakṣaṇa prakāśaka tvasya uttara adhikaraṇe sādhayiṣyamāṇa tvāt ca
vasumat ādeḥ ca liṅga samākhyābhyām nirvivādam eva abhiṣutya āhavanīye hutvā pratyañcaḥ
paretya sadasi bhakṣān bhakṣayati iti vihita bhakṣaṇa aṅga tvam

original: tadgatānāñca prātaḥsavanādiśabdānāṃ tathā indrapītādiśabdānāṃ ca sūktavākavibhāgādhikaraṇanyāyena tadvadeva yathāsavanaṃ viniyogasya spaṣṭatvamiti  #
analyzed: tad gatānām ca prātaḥsavana ādi śabdānām tathā indra pīta ādi śabdānām ca sūktavāka vibhāga adhikaraṇa nyāyena tadvat eva yathāsavanam viniyogasya spaṣṭa tvam iti
na udāharaṇa tvam iti arthaḥ
aṃśānām iti
bhakṣehime tyādeḥ tyantasya grahaṇe nṛ cakṣasam ityādeḥ a

original: tyantasya avekṣaṇe “hinva me“tyādeḥ “atigā” ityantasya samyagjaraṇe ityevamaṃśānāṃ
analyzed: ti antasya avekṣaṇe hinva mā ityādeḥ atigāḥ ityantasya samyak jaraṇe iti evam aṃśānām
viniyogaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tatra siddhānte yathāliṅgaṃ viniyogāt tadupayogyuddeśyatāvacchedakanirūpaṇāt pādādhyāyasaṅgatī
analyzed: tatra siddhānte yathāliṅgam viniyogāt tad upayogi uddeśya tā avacchedaka nirūpaṇāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī
tathā pūrva adhikaraṇe kratu saṃbandha rahita dvāra saṃbandha anupapatteḥ prakṛta grahaṇe
ukte prakṛte sarvathā vihita grahaṇa ādeḥ apūrva saṃbandha abhāve dvāra tva abhāvaḥ iti evam pūrvapakṣa utthānāt
pratyudāharaṇa rūpām anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pāda adhyāya saṅgatyoḥ ati spaṣṭa tvam

original: prathamataḥ siddhāntakoṭyupanyāsena sūcayan sandehaṃ darśayati ------- kimiti //
analyzed: prathamatas siddhānta koṭi upanyāsena sūcayan sandeham darśayati  kim iti
grahaṇa ādi artha tve liṅga mātra sattve pi grahaṇa ādi svarūpa artha tve mantra niyamasya ānarthakya āpatteḥ
teṣām avihita tvena apūrvam prati aṅga tvasya janakasya vā abhāve tad apūrva sādhanatva lakṣaṇayā
ānarthakya parihāra anupapatteḥ na tad aṅga tvena mantra viniyogaḥ yuktaḥ
apitu vihita bhakṣaṇa aṅgatayā eva iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣam āha grahaṇa ādeḥ iti
bhakṣa ajanaka tvena eva iti

original: grahaṇaṃ vinā bhakṣaṇāsaṃbhavena tasya pakṣaprāptasaṃbhāvanāyāmapi avekṣaṇasya loke niyamatastajjanakatvāvikḷpteḥ sarvathaivāprāptirityarthaḥ
analyzed: grahaṇam vinā bhakṣaṇa asaṃbhavena tasya pakṣa prāpta saṃbhāvanāyām api avekṣaṇasya loke niyamataḥ tad janaka tva avikḷpteḥ sarvathā eva aprāptiḥ iti arthaḥ
bhakṣa uttara bhāvitayā iti
naca bhakṣa uttara bhāvi bhakṣaṇa janya phala prakāśana dvārā aganma ityādi mantrasya darśa pūrṇamāsa aṅgatvam iva bhakṣaṇa aṅgatvam iti vācyam
kavala saṃyoga rūpa bhakṣaṇasya bhakṣyamāṇa pratipatti rūpa tayā samyak jaraṇa phalaka tva abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
bhakṣa mantra eka vākya tayā iti
sati api ākhyāta bhede upakrama upasaṃhāra aikye sati eka vākya tā prayojakībhūta ākāṅkṣā sattvasya
vaiśvānara vākye darśanāt atra api bhakṣehi ityādinā bhakṣaṇasya eva upakramāt bhakṣayāmi ityantena
tasya eva upasaṃhārāt upakrama upasaṃhāra aikya pratīteḥ ekavākyatā prayojakībhūta ākāṅkṣā rūpa liṅgāt
grahaṇa avekṣaṇa samyak jaraṇa viśiṣṭa tvena athavā bhakṣaṇa lakṣaṇayā vā bhakṣa artha tvam iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ laukikaviniyogāsaṃbhave pūrvoktaikavākyatārūpaliṅgopaṣṭabdhayā durbalayāpi samākhyayā viniyoge virodhābhāva ityāha --------- ataeveti
analyzed: evam laukika viniyoga asaṃbhave pūrvokta ekavākyatā rūpa liṅga upaṣṭabdhayā durbalayā api samākhyayā viniyoge virodha abhāvaḥ iti āha ataeva iti
yadi api iyam laukikī

original: tathāpi anāditvāt bhakṣasaṃbandhabodhe niyāmakatayā yogyatvādaṅgatvaṃ gamayantyupapannā bhavati /
analyzed: tathā api anādi tvāt bhakṣa saṃbandha bodhe niyāmaka tayā yogya tvāt aṅga tvam gamayantī upapannā bhavati
itarathā bhakṣa abhakṣa samudāya āśrayeṣu liṅga samavāyena gauṇī vṛttiḥ āśrayaṇīyā bhavet iti arthaḥ

original: ato yadyapi “bhakṣehītyādriyamāṇaṃ pratīkṣya” ” aśvinostvā bāhubhyāṃsadhyāsamiti” pratigṛhyetyāpastambasūtre pratīkṣaṇe bhakṣehītyayamaṃśo
analyzed: atas yadi api bhakṣehi iti ādriyamāṇam pratīkṣya aśvinoḥ tvā bāhubhyām sadhyāsam iti pratigṛhya iti āpastamba sūtre pratīkṣaṇe bhakṣehi iti ayam aṃśaḥ

original: tathāpi pratīkṣaṇaliṅgakatvāpratīterayuktaṃ taditi matvā sarvasyāpyanuvākasya bhakṣāṅgatvamabhipretya pūrvapakṣamupasaṃharati -------- iti  #
analyzed: tathā api pratīkṣaṇa liṅgaka tva apratīteḥ ayuktam tat iti matvā sarvasya api anuvākasya bhakṣa aṅgatvam abhipretya pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati iti
prāptaḥ iti
yadi api ca atra upakrama upasaṃhāra aikyāt ekavākya tā upagamana rūpam kḷptam bhavet

original: tathāpi grahaṇādiprakāśakamantrabhāgasya bhakṣaṇāṅgatvaṃ vākyenaiveti tasya prabalena liṅgena bādhopapattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api grahaṇa ādi prakāśaka mantra bhāgasya bhakṣaṇa aṅga tvam vākyena eva iti tasya prabalena liṅgena bādha upapattiḥ

original: vastutastu ------- upakramasya sādhāraṇatvāt pratyuta mukhyasāmarthyānurodhena grahaṇādiviṣaya evopapatternātrākhyātabhede satyekavākyatvamapi
analyzed: vastutas tu upakramasya sādhāraṇa tvāt pratyuta mukhya sāmarthya anurodhena grahaṇa ādi viṣaye eva upapatteḥ na atra ākhyāta bhede sati ekavākyatvam api

original: naca dīrghāyutvāyetyasya bhakṣaṇaphalapratipādakasya grahaṇe 'nanvaya eva bhakṣaṇārthatvatātparyagrāhakaḥ;
analyzed: naca dīrgha āyu tvāya ityasya bhakṣaṇa phala pratipādakasya grahaṇe nanu ayam eva bhakṣaṇa arthatva tātparya grāhakaḥ
tasya grahaṇa phalībhūta bhakṣaṇa phala pratipādanena stāvaka tayā anvaya upapatteḥ

original: ato liṅgenaikavākyatābhaṅgāt grahaṇādyaṅgatvamevetyabhipretya siddhāntaṃ pratipādayan ānarthakyaparihārāya prathamato grahaṇādividhiṃ sādhayati  #
analyzed: atas liṅgena eka vākya tā bhaṅgāt grahaṇa ādi aṅgatvam eva iti abhipretya siddhāntam pratipādayan ānarthakya parihārāya prathamatas grahaṇa ādi vidhim sādhayati
grahaṇa ādi iti
kalpaka mantrasya bhakṣa aṅga tvāt tad kalpya vidhi vihita grahaṇa ādīnām api bhakṣa aṅga tva siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
tad artha tvena eva iti
yadi api sadheḥ hiṃsā artha tvāt cakṣiṇau bhāṣaṇa artha tvāt hinoteḥ gati artha tvāt na grahaṇa avekṣaṇa samyak jaraṇa prakāśana liṅga tā eṣām saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi bījatantusantānārthanirvapatineva bāhudbayakaraṇakahiṃsāvinābhāvāt bāhukaraṇatvārhatayā ca lakṣaṇayā grahaṇapratipādakatvam /
analyzed: tathā api bīja tantu santāna artha nirvapatinā iva bāhu dbaya karaṇaka hiṃsā vinābhāvāt bāhu karaṇa tva arhatayā ca lakṣaṇayā grahaṇa pratipādaka tvam

original: cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñityanena vihitasya khyāñādeśasyāniṭtvena khyeṣamiti rūpāsiddhāvapi
analyzed: cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti anena vihitasya khyāñ ādeśasya an iṭ tvena khyeṣam iti rūpa asiddhau api

original: chandasi dṛṣṭānuvidhitvena khyeñityupasaṅkhyānakaraṇāt sic bahulaṃ leṭīti sickaraṇāśrayaṇāt
analyzed: chandasi dṛṣṭa anuvidhi tvena bahulam leṭi iti sic karaṇa āśrayaṇāt
vāc viṣaya vyakta tā ākhya prakāśana vācinā api avakhyeṣam iti anena loke khyātaḥ ityādau vede

original: ca nṛṣu khyāyata iti nṛcakṣā ityevamihaiva sarvajñātatvarūpaprasiddhyākhyaprakāśanamātre
analyzed: ca nṛṣu khyāyate iti nṛ cakṣāḥ iti evam iha eva sarva jñāta tva rūpa prasiddhi ākhya prakāśana mātre
prayogāt tatpareṇa satā sucakṣuṣṭva āci sucakṣuḥ pada eka vākya tā vaśāt cākṣuṣa jñāna ākhya avekṣaṇa rūpa prakāśana pratipādanam aviruddham

original: hinoteśca prīṇane 'pi prayogāddhinvetyanena he haritavarṇa soma me gātrāṇi prīṇaya
analyzed: hinoteḥ ca prīṇane pi prayogāt hinva iti anena he harita varṇa soma me gātrāṇi prīṇaya

original: gaṇānindriyagaṇān vedabhāṣyakāralekhanāt putrādīn vā somapānaviṣayatṛṣṇārahitān mā
analyzed: gaṇān indriya gaṇān veda bhāṣyakāra lekhanāt putra ādīn vā soma pāna viṣaya tṛṣṇā rahitān mā
kuru śivaḥ san me saptarṣīn āsya saptama cakṣuḥ nāsā śrotra ākhya dvandva dvaya rūpa śīrṣa
ṇi a chidra sañcāri sapta prāṇa ākhyān upatiṣṭhasva vāc nābhim atikramya mukha vāyu mārgeṇa

original: mā gā ityarthāvagamāt samyagjaraṇaṃ vinā tadanupapatteḥ gātraprīṇanaphalībhūtasamyagjaraṇapratipādakatvañca
analyzed: mā gāḥ iti artha avagamāt samyak jaraṇam vinā tad anupapatteḥ gātra prīṇana phalībhūta samyak jaraṇa pratipādaka tvañca
saṃbhavati iti tad artha tvena eva viniyogaḥ iti arthaḥ
yadi api agnaye juṣṭam iti mantrasya devatā nirvāpa prakāśaka tva vat asya api grahaṇa ādi viśiṣṭa bhakṣaṇa prakāśaka tva aṅgīkāreṇa mantra ekatvam abhyupagamya api
grahaṇa anaṅga tvam śakyate vaktum
tathā api upakrama upasaṃhāra aikya ādi rūpa eka vākyatā upagamana sāmarthya abhāve svarasataḥ pratīyamāna tad tad ākhyāta gata mukhya viśeṣya arthaka tva bādha

original: eva pramāṇābhāvo mantrabhedāṅgīkāre kathaṃ cicchabdena sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: eva pramāṇa abhāvaḥ mantra bheda aṅgīkāre katham cit śabdena sūcitaḥ
vamana vireka iti
soma aindram carum nirvapet śyāmākam soma vāmine iti samyak jaraṇa abhāva nimitta vyaṅga tā samādhitsayā

original: vamane prāyaścittasya vireke 'pi kvacit prāyaścittasya cāmnānāt bhakṣaṇasya udasthāpanarūpapratipattyarthatvāvagamena
analyzed: vamane prāyaścittasya vireke kvacid prāyaścittasya ca āmnānāt bhakṣaṇasya uda sthāpana rūpa pratipatti artha tva avagamena

original: tasya samyagjaraṇaṃ vinānupapatteḥ tadanukūlāsanaviśeṣasya vidheyasya bhakṣopayogitetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya samyak jaraṇam vinā anupapatteḥ tad anukūla āsana viśeṣasya vidheyasya bhakṣa upayogi tā iti arthaḥ

original: etena -------- tṛptivadānuṣaṅgikatayā ananuṣṭheyatvānna mantrāpekṣā iti ------- apāstam;
analyzed: etena tṛpti vat ānuṣaṅgika tayā ananuṣṭheya tvāt na mantra apekṣā iti apāstam
grahaṇa ādi vat pṛthak prayatna anuṣṭheya tvena tad apekṣā upapatteḥ

original: evañca bhakṣānuvākasamākhyā sākṣāt paraṃparayā ca neyeti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca bhakṣa anuvāka samākhyā sākṣāt paraṃparayā ca neyā iti bhāvaḥ
prayojanam pūrvapakṣe grahaṇa ādeḥ na niyamaḥ
mantra pāṭha krameṇa pāṭha ante bhakṣaṇam siddham

original: bhāṣyalikhitamantrapāṭhakramasya arthakrameṇa bādhāt mandrābhibhūtirityasyānantaraṃ hinva ma iti mantrapāṭhaśceti spaṣṭatvānnoktam //
analyzed: bhāṣya likhita mantra pāṭha kramasya artha krameṇa bādhāt mandra abhibhūtiḥ iti asya anantaram hinva me iti mantra pāṭhaḥ ca iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti navamam bhakṣa mantrasya grahaṇa ādi aṅga tā adhikaraṇam liṅga samākhyāna adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
a pā guṇa abhidhānāt
tasmin eva anuvāke mandrā abhibhūtiḥ ityādiḥ tṛpyatu iti antaḥ tṛptau viniyoktavyaḥ grahaṇa ādau iva iti prāpte grahaṇa ādi vat anuṣṭheya tva abhāvāt tṛpteḥ aprakāśya tvam
naca samyak jaraṇavat tṛpti anukūla vyāpāra rūpa bhakṣaṇa bāhulya ākṣepaka tvam
alpam bhakṣayati iti vacana virodhena tad kalpanā anupapatteḥ
ataeva tṛpteḥ bhakṣaṇena ajananāt na tasyāḥ svarga vat janya tva mātreṇa prakāśya tva upapattiḥ

original: ataśca liṅgaviniyogāsaṃbhavātsatyapi ākhyātadvayasya svato nirākāṅkṣatve itikaraṇādhyāhāreṇa
analyzed: atas ca liṅga viniyoga asaṃbhavāt sati api ākhyāta dvayasya svatas nirākāṅkṣa tve iti karaṇa adhyāhāreṇa
tṛpyatu iti etad artham bhakṣayāmi iti evam bhakṣa mantra eka vākya tām prakalpya sva artha viśiṣṭa bhakṣaṇa prakāśaka tvam eva aṅgīkartavyam
svārthaḥ ca śrutyā tṛptiḥ eva
tad prakāśana aṃśe ca adṛṣṭa artha tvam
athavā lakṣaṇayā bhakṣaṇa stutiḥ
sarvathā na liṅgāt viniyogaḥ
iti daśamam guṇa abhidhāna adhikaraṇam

original: (B2) pūrvavat pādādhyāyasaṅgatī āpavādakīmanantarasaṅgatiñca spaṣṭatvādanuktvā pūrvoktānuvākagataikadeśaviṣayatvaṃ darśayan pūrvapakṣamāha  #
analyzed: pūrvavat pāda adhyāya saṅgatī āpavādakīm anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrva ukta anuvāka gata eka deśa viṣaya tvam darśayan pūrvapakṣam āha
tasmin eva iti
prāyas spaṣṭa artham adhikaraṇa antam

original: prayojanaṃ tu pūrvapakṣe vasumadgaṇasyetyādi bhakṣayāmītyantena bhakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā pāṭhakramabādhenopariṣṭāt mandrābhibhūtirityādi tṛpyatvityantamantrasya  #
analyzed: prayojanam tu pūrvapakṣe vasumat gaṇasya ityādi bhakṣayāmi ityantena bhakṣaṇam kṛtvā pāṭha krama bādhena upariṣṭāt mandrā abhibhūtiḥ ityādi tṛpyatu ityanta mantrasya
pāṭhaḥ
siddhānte tu yathāmrānam iti spaṣṭam
iti daśamam mandra abhibhūteḥ grahaṇa anaṅga tā adhikaraṇam guṇa abhidhāna adhikaraṇam
a pā liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt

original: bhakṣamantraḥ kiṃ indradevatyābhyāsa evāṅgaṃ tadbhinnābhyāseṣvamantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ uta teṣūhenotānūhena veti cintāyām /
analyzed: bhakṣa mantraḥ kim indra devatya abhyāsaḥ eva aṅgam tad bhinna abhyāseṣu amantrakam bhakṣaṇam uta teṣu ūhena uta anūhena vā iti cintāyām
prakaraṇāt bhakṣa mantrasya sarva pradāna artha tva avagame pi indra pītasya iti liṅgena indra devatya pradāna mātra aṅgatvam

original: naca ------- indreṇa yasminsavane pīta iti bahuvrīhisvīkāreṇa somasambandhisavanaviśeṣaṇatvāṅgīkārālliṅgāvirodha iti ------ vācyam;
analyzed: naca indreṇa yasmin savane pītaḥ iti bahuvrīhi svīkāreṇa soma sambandhi savana viśeṣaṇatva aṅgīkārāt liṅga avirodhaḥ iti vācyam

original: pūrvapada eva saṃbandhilakṣaṇāpādakasya lakṣaṇānugatasyendreṇa pītaḥ svīkṛta ityevaṃ
analyzed: pūrva pade eva saṃbandhi lakṣaṇa āpādakasya lakṣaṇa anugatasya indreṇa pītaḥ svīkṛtaḥ iti evam
tatpuruṣasya eva laghu bhūta tvāt

original: vidyante ca devatāyāḥ pratigrahābhāve 'pi devasvaṃ na gṛhṇīyādityādivacanabalena saṃbandhaviśeṣarūpaḥ svīkāraḥ /
analyzed: vidyante ca devatāyāḥ pratigraha abhāve deva svam na gṛhṇīyāt ityādi vacana balena saṃbandha viśeṣa rūpaḥ svīkāraḥ
na ca sthūla pṛṣatī pada vat svarāt eva bahuvrīhi tva nirṇayaḥ
tadvat iha samāsasya lakṣaṇa anugata tva abhāvena svarasya eva bādhyamāna tvāt
yathā ca tatpuruṣa pakṣe svara avirodhaḥ tathā kaustubhe eva upapāditam
atas ca liṅgāt indra devatya pradāne eva mantrasya aṅga tva avagamāt anaindrāṇām ca
karmaṇaḥ eka tvena prakṛti vikāra bhāva abhāvāt ūha anupapatteḥ vrīhīṇām medhā eti vadana aindrāṇām amantrakam
bhakṣaṇam iti ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: dvitīyastu satyapi karmaikatve pradānānāṃ bhinnatvādaviruddhaḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ tu sati api karma ekatve pradānānām bhinna tvāt aviruddhaḥ prakṛti vikāra bhāvaḥ

original: indrāya tvā vasumata ityādimānagrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ ca liṅgādindramātraviṣayatvāttadanurodhena
analyzed: indrāya tvā vasumate ityādi māna grahaṇa mantrāṇām ca liṅgāt indra mātra viṣaya tvāt tad anurodhena
ca tad prakāśyayoḥ māna grahaṇayoḥ tad saṃskāryasya somasya tad saṃskārāṇām ca abhiṣava ādīnām
tad miśrāṇām ca aṅga antarāṇām aindra mātra viṣaya tva pratīteḥ itareṣām adharmakāṇām yuktaḥ atideśaḥ
bhavati ca aṅga vaśena api pradhāna saṃkocaḥ
agni ādi anurodhena kratūnām āhitāgni viṣaya tvāt

original: ataśca prakṛtāpūrvīyadevatāprakāśakasya bhakṣamantrasya kāryamukhena vikṛtāvāgatasya bhavatyeva yathādevatamūha iti /
analyzed: atas ca prakṛta āpūrvīya devatā prakāśakasya bhakṣa mantrasya kārya mukhena vikṛtau āgatasya bhavati eva yathādevatam ūhaḥ iti
evam sthite ntarā cintā
iti ekādaśam liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśa adhikaraṇam
indra pīta adhikaraṇam
atra ca an aindra pradāneṣu liṅga pramāṇaka mantra viniyogasya siddhānte pratipādyasya
pūrvapakṣa dvaye pi anaṅgīkārāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī prāsaṅgikīm ca anantara saṅgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā

original: tanmantrameva viṣayatvena darśayan saṃśayamāha -------- bhakṣamantra iti //
analyzed: tat mantram eva viṣaya tvena darśayan saṃśayam āha bhakṣa mantraḥ iti
teṣu ūhena iti
etena ūha pakṣasya svatantra koṭi tvam
apitu ādya koṭi phalībhūtasya anaindrāṇām amantraka tvasya ākṣepa mātram iti nyāyasudhā uktam apāstam
pūrva ukta rītyā siddhānti abhipretasya pakṣasya pratipakṣatayā ūha upanyāsena saṅgati upapatteḥ asthāyi pūrvapakṣa phala ākṣepasya niṣprayojana tvāt ca
atas tasya api svatantra koṭi tvam iti arthaḥ
liṅga avirodhaḥ iti
anya devatyasya api somasya uktavidha savana saṃbandhi tvena prakāśana upapatteḥ tad avirodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
pada dvaya iti
tatpuruṣe pūrva pade eva saṃbandhini lakṣaṇā
bahuvrīhau tu pada dvaye pi anya padārtha lakṣaṇa iti pada dvaya lakṣaṇa āpādaka tvam
bahuvrīhau ekasmin eva pade viśiṣṭa artha lakṣaṇa itarat tātparya grāhakam iti aṅgīkāre pi lakṣya tā avacchedaka gauravam

original: itarasya tātparyagrāhakasya vākyārthānvaye 'pi arthāt pratipadikatvamiti doṣaḥ /
analyzed: itarasya tātparya grāhakasya vākya artha anvaye pi arthāt pratipadika tvam iti doṣaḥ
yadi api bahuvrīhau anya padārthe śaktiḥ
tathā api avayava artha upasthiti sāpekṣa tvāt anya padārtha upasthiteḥ tatra gauravam
sarvathā tatpuruṣaḥ laghu bhūtaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇa ananugata tvam api doṣam āha ananugata iti

original: samānādhikaraṇānāṃ bahuvrīhiriṣyata iti kātyāyanasmaraṇāt vyadhikaraṇapadānāṃ tadanupapatteḥ
analyzed: samāna adhikaraṇānām bahuvrīhiḥ iṣyate iti kātyāyana smaraṇāt vyadhikaraṇa padānām tad anupapatteḥ

original: “saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhā” viti jñāpakabalāt kaṇṭhekāla ityādau saptamyantabahuvrīhyāśrayaṇe
analyzed: saptamī viśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhau iti jñāpaka balāt kaṇṭhe kālaḥ ityādau saptamī anta bahuvrīhi āśrayaṇe
pi iha tathā āśrayaṇe pramāṇa abhāvāt lakṣaṇa ananugata tvam
tatpuruṣe tu kartṛ karaṇe kṛtā bahulam iti anuśāsana śiṣṭa tvam

original: kiñca mantrasya bhakṣaṇāṅgatānirvāhāya avaśyāpekṣite bhakṣaṇasya tatsaṃbandhinaḥ
analyzed: kiñca mantrasya bhakṣaṇa aṅga tā nirvāhāya avaśya apekṣite bhakṣaṇasya tad saṃbandhinaḥ

original: karmakārakasya somasya vā prakāśane prayojane tatpuruṣapakṣe saṃbhavati na bahuvrīhyāśrayaṇenāpradhānānākāṅkṣitasavanaprakāśanaparatvaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ
analyzed: karma kārakasya somasya vā prakāśane prayojane tatpuruṣa pakṣe saṃbhavati na bahuvrīhi āśrayaṇena apradhāna an ākāṅkṣita savana prakāśana paratvam yuktam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu śabdasya devatātvāt kathaṃ svīkṛta ityarthopapattirityāśaṅkāṃ bahuvrīhāvapyavaśyāpekṣitaprakāreṇa pariharati ---------- vidyate ceti //
analyzed: nanu śabdasya devatā tvāt katham svīkṛtaḥ iti artha upapattiḥ iti āśaṅkām bahuvrīhau api avaśya apekṣita prakāreṇa pariharati vidyate ca iti
nanu na ayam tatpuruṣaḥ
tathātve samāsasya iti sūtreṇa anta udātta tva āpatteḥ
ādi udāttam ca etat pīta padam
indra pratipādakam tu svatas eva ādi udāttam

original: tathā sati bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadamiti sūtreṇa pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaravidhānāt samastameva padamādyudāttaṃ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: tathā sati bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrva padam iti sūtreṇa pūrva pada prakṛti svara vidhānāt samastam eva padam ādi udāttam saṃpadyate

original: ataḥ sthūlapṛṣatītyatreva svarāt bahuvrīhinirṇaye sati savanaparatvopapattirityabhipretyāśaṅkate -------- naceti //
analyzed: atas sthūla pṛṣatī iti atra iva svarāt bahuvrīhi nirṇaye sati savana paratva upapattiḥ iti abhipretya āśaṅkate na ca iti
bahuvrīheḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇya saṃbhavena lakṣaṇa anugata tva abhāvāt samāsa svarayoḥ anyatarasya agatika tve

original: kalpanīye aṅgadharmatvāt svarasyaiva bādhyatvena tasyaiva chāndasatvakalpanayā nirvāho yuktaḥ,
analyzed: kalpanīye aṅga dharma tvāt svarasya eva bādhya tvena tasya eva chāndasa tva kalpanayā nirvāhaḥ yuktaḥ
na tu pradhāna bhūta svārtha tyāgaḥ iti arthaḥ
yathā ca iti

original: “tṛtīyā karmaṇī“ti sūtreṇa karmaṇi ktānte upapade pare tṛtīyāntaṃ pūrvapadaṃ prakṛtisvaraṃ
analyzed: tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti sūtreṇa karmaṇi kta ante upapade pare tṛtīyā antam pūrva padam prakṛti svaram

original: bhavatīti vidhānāt tathā “ktece” ti sūtreṇāpi tatsvaravidhānāt tatpuruṣapakṣe 'pi
analyzed: bhavati iti vidhānāt tathā kta i ca iti sūtreṇa api tad svara vidhānāt tatpuruṣa pakṣe pi
svara avirodhaḥ kaustubhe upapāditaḥ iti arthaḥ
ādyam pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati atas ca iti
vrīhīṇām medhe itivat iti
vrīhīṇām medhaḥ iti asya yava prayogaḥ iva iha anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
an aindrāṇām iti
sāmānya uktyā camasa pradhāna śeṣāṇām iva graha pradāna śeṣāṇām api amantraka tva ukti sūcanena mitrāvaruṇa ādi devatya huta śeṣāṇām amantrakam

original: tatrāpi pitṛpītasyetyādipadānāṃ taddevatyapradāneṣu prāptāvapi taditarapadānāṃ vibhajya
analyzed: tatra api pitṛ pītasya ityādi padānām tad devatya pradāneṣu prāptau api tad itara padānām vibhajya
viniyoge savana traye pi aindra pradānānām indra pīta pada prayogeṇa sa mantrakam bhakṣaṇam
na tu anyeṣām pradānānām iti arthaḥ
tatra aindra pradānānām prakṛti tvam sādhayitum āha indrāya tvā iti

original: “indrāya tvā vasumate minomī“ti mānamantrasyādipadopāttasya “indrāya tvā vasumate
analyzed: indrāya tvā vasumate minomi iti māna mantrasya ādi pada upāttasya indrāya tvā vasumate

original: gṛhṇāmī“ti grahaṇamantrasya ca indrapradānāṅgatvaṃ liṅgāt pratīyate ityaviśeṣapravṛttasomavākyamapi
analyzed: gṛhṇāmi iti grahaṇa mantrasya ca indra pradāna aṅga tvam liṅgāt pratīyate iti aviśeṣa pravṛtta soma vākyam api
tanmātra viṣayam eva iti arthaḥ
aṅga vaśena api iti
mantra rūpa aṅga vaśena māna grahaṇa ādeḥ pradhānasya saṃkocaḥ iti arthaḥ
yathādevatam iti
mitrāvaruṇa pītasya ityādi ūhita mantra pāṭhena samantrakam teṣām api bhakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ

original: ūhapūrvapakṣanirāse sati tadviṣayottaravicārāsaṃbhavādanirasta eva ūhapakṣe avasaralābhāt
analyzed: ūha pūrvapakṣa nirāse sati tad viṣaya uttara vicāra asaṃbhavāt anirastaḥ eva ūha pakṣe avasara lābhāt

original: pañcabhiradhikaraṇaistadviṣayaṃ viśeṣavicāraiḥ kartumantarāgarbhiṇīṃ kṛtvā cintāmārabhate ------- evamiti //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ adhikaraṇaiḥ tad viṣayam viśeṣa vicāraiḥ kartum antarā garbhiṇīm kṛtvā cintām ārabhate evam iti
iti ekādaśam liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśa adhikaraṇam
punar abhyunnīteṣu

original: savanamukhīyeṣu camaseṣvaindreṣu sarveṣu huteṣu ye hotṛkāṇāṃ maitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ camasāsteṣvabhakṣiteṣveva punaḥ somo 'bhyunnīya devatāntarebhyo  #
analyzed: savana mukhīyeṣu camaseṣu aindreṣu sarveṣu huteṣu ye hotṛkāṇām maitrāvaruṇa ādīnām camasāḥ teṣu a bhakṣiteṣu eva punar somaḥ bhyunnīya devatā antarebhyaḥ
mitrāvaruṇa ādibhyaḥ hutvā bhakṣyate

original: tatra pūrvapradānadevatābhūta indro 'pyupalakṣaṇīyo na veti cintāyām -------- unnayanakāle na devatāntaroddeśaḥ,
analyzed: tatra pūrva pradāna devatā bhūtaḥ indraḥ u pi upalakṣaṇīyaḥ na vā iti cintāyām unnayana kāle na devatā antara uddeśaḥ
yena unnītasya eva tad saṃbandhāt pūrva śeṣasya pūrva devatā saṃbandhaḥ na apeyāt
pradāna kāle tu saṃsṛṣṭasya eva devatā antara saṃbandhāt pūrva devatā saṃbandha apanaya pratīteḥ na upalakṣaṇam iti
prāpte unnayana kāle devatā saṃkalpa abhāve pi sāmarthyāt eva unnayanasya kariṣyamāṇa karma artha tva pratīteḥ
pūrva śeṣasya saṃsṛṣṭa tve pi etad artha tve pramāṇa abhāvāt anapanīta saṃbandhā pūrva devatā api upalakṣaṇīyā  /
iti dvādaśam abhyunnīta adhikaraṇam
atra bhakṣa mantrasya liṅgāt aindra pradāna aṅgatvasya pūrva adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa uktasya ākṣipya
samādhānāt pāda adhyāya anantara saṅgatīḥ spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā viṣayam āha savana mukhīyeṣu iti

original: trayāṇāṃ prātaḥsavanādisavanānāṃ mukhe camasapradānāntarāpekṣayā ādau bhavāḥ savanamukhīyasaṃjñakāścamasapātrasthitasomarasaviśeṣāḥ
analyzed: trayāṇām prātaḥsavana ādi savanānām mukhe camasa pradāna antara apekṣayā ādau bhavāḥ savanamukhīya saṃjñakāḥ camasa pātra sthita soma rasa viśeṣāḥ

original: teṣāṃ prātaḥsavane mādhyandinasavaneca śukrāmanthigrahottaraṃ pracāraḥ tṛtīyasavanetvādityagrahottaraṃ
analyzed: teṣām prātaḥsavane mādhyandina savane ca śukrāmanthi graha uttaram pracāraḥ tṛtīyasavane tu ādityagraha uttaram
pracāraḥ te ca anuṣṭhīyamānāḥ hotṛ brahma udgātṛ yajamāna maitrāvaruṇa brāhmaṇācchaṃsi potṛ
neṣṭra āgnīdhra acchāvāka camasāḥ iti ākhyāyante
tatrahotṛ ādīnām caturṇām ṛtvijām madhyatas kāriṇaḥ iti ākhyā
avaśiṣṭānām ṣaṇṇām maitrāvaruṇa prabhṛtīnām hotṛkāḥ iti ākhyā

original: tatrācchāvākacamasena na navabhiḥ camasaiḥ saha prātaḥsavane homaḥ,
analyzed: tatra acchāvāka camasena na navabhiḥ camasaiḥ saha prātaḥsavane homaḥ

original: kintu kālāntara iti taṃ vihāya navacamasān prathamamindrāya sakṛddhutvā tadanantaraṃ
analyzed: kintu kāla antare iti tam vihāya nava camasān prathamam indrāya sakṛt hutvā tad anantaram

original: ye hotṛkāṇāṃ camasāsteṣu pūrvavaṣaṭkāre hutābhakṣitaśeṣasahiteṣveva droṇakalaśāt
analyzed: ye hotṛkāṇām camasāḥ teṣu pūrva vaṣaṭkāre huta a bhakṣita śeṣa sahiteṣu eva droṇakalaśāt
soma antaram abhyunnīya mitrāvaruṇa ādi devatā antarebhyaḥ hutvā bhakṣyate iti anuṣṭhāna krame

original: sati ye madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasāḥ teṣāmaindratvenohasyaivābhāvādviśeṣataśca punarabhyunnayanābhāvāt /
analyzed: sati ye madhyatas kāriṇām camasāḥ teṣām aindra tvena ūhasya eva abhāvāt viśeṣataḥ ca punar abhyunnayana abhāvāt

original: ataeva acchāvākacamasasyānaindratvenohaviṣayatve satyapi punarabhyunnayanābhāvānna vicāraviṣayatvaṃ prātaḥsavane /
analyzed: ataeva acchāvāka camasasya an aindra tvena ūha viṣaya tve sati api punar abhyunnayana abhāvāt na vicāra viṣaya tvam prātaḥsavane

original: uttarayostu savanayorabhyunnayanasattve 'pi mādhyandinasavane sarveṣāṃ pradānānāmindradevatākatvāt vakṣyamāṇarītyā ūhāviṣayatvānna tadviṣayatvam
analyzed: uttarayoḥ tu savanayoḥ abhyunnayana sattve mādhyandina savane sarveṣām pradānānām indra devatāka tvāt vakṣyamāṇa rītyā ūha a viṣaya tvāt na tad viṣaya tvam
tṛtīyasavane tu indrāviṣṇu devatā artham abhyunnayanena devatā bhedena ca tad saṃbhavāt vicāra viṣaya tvam asti eva

original: ataeva prātaḥsavane 'pi brāhmaṇācchaṃsicamase punarabhyunnayane 'pi aindratvena pradānadvayasyāpi
analyzed: ataeva prātaḥsavane brāhmaṇācchaṃsi camase punar abhyunnayane pi aindra tvena pradāna dvayasya api

saṃbhavāt na cintā viṣaya tvam

original: maitrāvaruṇapotṛneṣṭrāgnīdhrāṇāmeva caturṇāṃ ye camasāḥ yeṣu krameṇa mitrāvaruṇau
analyzed: maitrāvaruṇa potṛ neṣṭṛ āgnīdhrāṇām eva caturṇām ye camasāḥ yeṣu krameṇa mitrāvaruṇau

original: marutastvaṣṭṭapatnyau agniriti devatāḥ teṣu saṃsṛṣṭaśeṣavatsu unnayanasyohasyaca
analyzed: marutaḥ tvaṣṭṛ patnyau agniḥ iti devatāḥ teṣu saṃsṛṣṭa śeṣavatsu unnayanasya ūhasya ca
saṃbhavāt vicāraḥ iti arthaḥ
vicāra svarūpam darśayati tatra iti
indraḥ pi iti

original: pūrvoktacatasṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ vācakapadohena upalakṣaṇasattve 'pi indramitrāvaruṇādipītasyetyevaṃ prākṛtendrapadasahitapadohena upalakṣaṇīyo
analyzed: pūrva ukta catasṛṇām devatānām vācaka pada ūhena upalakṣaṇa sattve pi indra mitrāvaruṇa ādi pītasya iti evam prākṛta indra pada sahita pada ūhena

original: saṃsargepi vāyavyaindravāyavasome grahaṇakālīnavivekamātreṇaiva budhdyā niṣkarṣopapattiṃ pūrvapakṣapratikūlāṃ nirasyati --------- unnayanakāla  #

iti
grahaṇa kāle devatā saṃyoga sattvena niṣkarṣa saṃbhave api unnayane tad saṃbandha vidhāna adarśanāt

original: unnayanakāle na devatāntarasaṃbandha iti pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ pratijñā /

tat eva upapādayati pradāna kāle tu iti

original: naca --------- unnayanakāle devatāvidhyabhāve yājyāmantravarṇaiḥ yāgaśeṣatayaiva devatāprāpteravyaktatvabhaṅga iti ------- vācyam;
analyzed: na ca unnayana kāle devatā vidhi abhāve yājyā mantra varṇaiḥ yāga śeṣa tayā eva devatā prāpteḥ avyakta tva bhaṅgaḥ iti vācyam
ukta vidhā vyakta tva asaṃbhave pi utpatti vākye avihita devatāka iṣṭi bhinna yāga rūpasya eva tasya aṅgīkāreṇa bādhaka abhāvāt
na ca śeṣasya uttara devatā uddeśena tyāge pi pūrva devatā saṃbandhasya api sattvāt tad upalakṣaṇa tva upapattiḥ

original: akṛte 'pi yāge yājñikānāṃ nirvāpaprabhṛti pratipattiparyantaṃ devatāntarasaṃbandhi
analyzed: a kṛte pi yāge yājñikānām nirvāpa prabhṛti pratipatti paryantam devatā antara saṃbandhi
haviḥ iti vyavahārāt dravye devatā saṃbandhasya pratipatti nāśyasya avaśya kalpanīyasya
dharmi grāhaka pramāṇena devatā antara saṃbandha virodhi tva avagamāt tad atyanta abhāva samāna adhikaraṇasya tad sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ avaśyam
śeṣasya uttara devatā saṃbandhe pūrva devatā saṃbandha apanaya pratīteḥ na upalakṣaṇīyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tyāgavelāyāṃ saṃsṛṣṭatvena vivekāpratītāvapi satyapicābhyunnayanakāle prakṛtau vikṛtau
analyzed: tyāga velāyām saṃsṛṣṭa tvena viveka apratītau api sati api ca abhyunnayana kāle prakṛtau vikṛtau
vā devatā saṃbandha abhāve prakṛtau unnayanasya dṛṣṭārtha tvāt yāgīya dravya saṃskāraka tva avagateḥ vikṛtau api
prākṛta unnayana anuvādena droṇakalaśa āpādanaka tva mātra vidhānena prākṛta kārya vat nayana antara vidhānena
vā punar abhyunnītasya eva phala camasa hṛdaya ādi vat yāgīya tva pratīteḥ pūrva śeṣasya ca
yāgīya dravya ādhāra pātroḥ lakṣaṇa tayā payasā maitrāvaruṇam śrīṇāti iti vihita payasaḥ iva
abhyunnīta saṃskāra mātra tva avagateḥ uttara yāga artha tve pramāṇa abhāvāt pūrva yāgīya haviḥ śeṣa bhakṣaṇasya
tantreṇa anuṣṭhāna anurodhāt anapanīta devatā saṃbandhāt upalakṣaṇīyā eva pūrvadevatā iti abhipretya
siddhāntam āha unnayana kāle iti

original: atraca rikteṣu pātreṣu yena somapūraṇaṃ kriyate sa unnayanapadasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca rikteṣu pātreṣu yena soma pūraṇam kriyate saḥ unnayana padasya arthaḥ

original: somaśeṣasahiteṣveva teṣu somāntarapūraṇaṃ yena kriyate sa abhyunnayanapadasyārthaḥ /
analyzed: soma śeṣa sahiteṣu eva teṣu soma antara pūraṇam yena kriyate sa abhyunnayana padasya arthaḥ

original: yadyapi ūhasyaindrapradānamātrasaṃbandhitvasya vā sthāyitvābhāvādetadvicārasyāsthāyinaḥ sthāyinā prayojanena na prayojanam /
analyzed: yadi api ūhasya aindra pradāna mātra saṃbandhi tvasya vā sthāyi tva abhāvāt etad vicārasya asthāyinaḥ sthāyinā prayojanena na prayojanam
ataeva uktam abhiyuktaiḥ ākṣepe ca apavāde ca prāptyām lakṣaṇa karmaṇi

original: prayojanaṃ na vaktavyaṃ yacca kṛtvā pravartate /
analyzed: prayojanam na vaktavyam yat ca kṛtvā pravartate
iti tathā api etad vicāra hetu bhūtasya pūrva śeṣa vṛtti uttara yāga aṅga tva sat asat bhāva rūpa vicārasya
sthāyinaḥ udāharaṇa antare phalībhūta tvena uttara yāga kāle abhyunnīta mātrasya eva devatā saṃbandha anusandhāna an anusandhāna rūpam avaśya vaktavyam
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti dvādaśam abhyunnīta adhikaraṇam
abhyunnīta pūrvadevatā upalakṣaṇa adhikaraṇam
a pā pātnīvate tu
dvi devatyānām aindra vāyava ādīnām śeṣāḥ āditya sthālyām āgatya tatas pi āgrayaṇa sthālīm āgacchanti
pātnīvataḥ ca āgrayaṇāt gṛhyate
tasmin bhakṣyamāṇe dvi devatyāḥ api upalakṣaṇīyāḥ
pūrvavat āgrayaṇasya eva patnīvat devatā saṃbandhāt iti prāpte pātnīvatam āgrayaṇāt gṛhṇāti iti apādāna tva śravaṇāt tasmāt apetasya pātnīvata tvam
na tu āgrayaṇasya eva

original: āgrayaṇavaccānāgrayaṇamapi saṃsṛṣṭatvāt tasmādapetamiti dvidevatyasyāpi devatāntarasaṃbandhena pūrvadevatāsaṃbandhāpāyāt /
analyzed: āgrayaṇa vat ca an āgrayaṇam api saṃsṛṣṭa tvāt tasmāt apetam iti dvi devatyasya api devatā antara saṃbandhena pūrva devatā saṃbandha apāyāt
bhūta pūrva gatyā ca prakṛtau anupalakṣaṇāt na upalakṣaṇīyāḥ
iti trayodaśam pātnīvate daivatya an upalakṣaṇa adhikaraṇam
atra ayam anuṣṭhāna kramaḥ prathamam prātaḥsavane aindra vāyava maitrāvaruṇa śukrāmanthi graha pātreṣu
dhārātaḥ soma grahaṇam kṛtvā mahatyāḥ dhārāyāḥ tathā antaryāma pātra gata śeṣa dhārāyāḥ ca iti evam
dhārā dvayena āgrayaṇa sthālyāḥ grahaṇam kṛtvā khare
sarve te grahāḥ sthālīcaḥ āsādyate

original: tataḥ kiyatā kālena bahiṣpavamānastotrottaramāśvinagrahaṇaṃ tataḥ prātaḥsavane pravṛtte
analyzed: tatas kiyatā kālena bahiṣpavamāna stotra uttaram āśvina grahaṇam tatas prātaḥsavane pravṛtte
pradāna kāle aindra vāyava maitrāvaruṇa āśvina pradāna śeṣa saṃpātam āditya sthālyām riktāyām eva

original: ādityasthālyāṃ saṃpātamapanayatī“ti vacanāt savanīyādityasaṃjñakadārupātreṇa pidhāya sthāpyate /
analyzed: āditya sthālyām saṃpātam apanayati iti vacanāt savanīyāditya saṃjñaka dāru pātreṇa pidhāya sthāpyate

original: tataḥ tṛtīyasavane grahaṇakāle ādityasthālīsthasya āgrayaṇasthasya āgrayaṇasthālyāṃ dhārayā grahaṇam /
analyzed: tatas tṛtīyasavane grahaṇa kāle āditya sthālī sthasya āgrayaṇa sthasya āgrayaṇa sthālyām dhārayā grahaṇam

original: tata ādityadārupātreṇa ādityasthālyā dvidevatyaśeṣasaṃpātaṃ gṛhītvā ādityebhyaḥ sa śeṣo hūyate /
analyzed: tatas āditya dāru pātreṇa āditya sthālyāḥ dvi devatya śeṣa saṃpātam gṛhītvā ādityebhyaḥ sa śeṣaḥ hūyate

original: tadīyaśeṣasyāgrayaṇasthālyāmapanayasya “ādityagrahasaṃpātāccaturthī” mitivacanāt caturthyā dhārāyā vidhānena śeṣābhāvānna bhakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tadīya śeṣasya āgrayaṇa sthālyām apanayasya ādityagraha saṃpātāt caturthī m iti vacanāt caturthyāḥ dhārāyāḥ vidhānena śeṣa abhāvāt na bhakṣaṇam

original: tata “upāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvatamāgrayaṇāt gṛhṇātī“ti vacanāt āgrayaṇasthālyāṃśeṣaṃ saṃsthāpya avaśiṣṭaṃ gṛhītvā sa śeṣaḥ patnīvate agnaye pradīyate
analyzed: tatas upāṃśu pātreṇa pātnīvatam āgrayaṇāt gṛhṇāti iti vacanāt āgrayaṇa sthālyām śeṣam saṃsthāpya avaśiṣṭam gṛhītvā sa śeṣaḥ patnīvate agnaye pradīyate
tadā ca etad śeṣasya anyatra viniyoga abhāvāt bhakṣaṇam sa mantrakam
tam imam anuṣṭhāna kramam abhisaṃdhāya viṣayam darśayati dvi devatyānām iti
aindra vāyava ādīnām iti ādi padena maitrāvaruṇa āśvina devatānām grahaṇa vat indra vāyu pūrvatana vāyu devatāyāḥ api grahaṇam
tathā eva uddeśena yāga anuṣṭhānāt

original: tatra pūrvādhikaraṇe savanamukhīyeṣu camaseṣu aindrapradānānāṃ prakṛtitvenetareṣāṃ
analyzed: tatra pūrva adhikaraṇe savana mukhīyeṣu camaseṣu aindra pradānānām prakṛti tvena itareṣām
an aindrāṇām vikṛti tvam kṛtvā ūha cintāyām prākṛta devatā vācaka pada prayogasya api kartavya tayā
sādhitasya idānīm samāna nyāyāt graheṣu api aindra anaindra pradānānām prakṛti vikṛti bhāvāt
patnī vat agni pītasya iti ūhe devatā antara pada prayogasya api prāptasya iha apavāda karaṇāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim apādāna bhūta āgrayaṇa apeta tva rūpāt vastu sāmarthyāt an āgrayaṇa
rūpasya api pūrva śeṣasya prasaṅgataḥ pātnīvata yāga aṅga tva vicārāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī ca
spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrvapakṣam āha tasmin iti
dvi devatya padam vāyoḥ api upalakṣaṇam
apinā patnī vat agni pītasya iti ūha vidyamāna tā sūcitā
upalakṣaṇīyāḥ iti
vāyu indra vāyu mitrāvaruṇa aśvina patnī vat agni pītasya iti eva indra mitrāvaruṇa pītasya itivat ūhena upalakṣaṇīyāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atra cādityapātragataśeṣasyāpi pūrvoktarītyā'grayaṇasthālyāṃ sattvādādityo 'pyupalakṣaṇīya iti viśeṣaḥ prācīnairnavīnaiścānukto 'pi somanāthenoktaḥ
analyzed: atra ca āditya pātra gata śeṣasya api pūrva ukta rītyā āgrayaṇa sthālyām sattvāt ādityaḥ pi upalakṣaṇīyaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ prācīnaiḥ navīnaiḥ ca anuktaḥ somanāthena uktaḥ

original: atracāgrayaṇasthālyāṃ prātaḥsavane dhārādvayena gṛhītvā sāditāyāṃ yaḥ somaḥ sa “ye
analyzed: atra ca āgrayaṇa sthālyām prātaḥsavane dhārā dvayena gṛhītvā sāditāyām yaḥ somaḥ sa ye

original: devāso divyekādaśasthe“ti mantreṇa gṛhītatvāt “te devā yajñamimaṃ juṣadhvami“ti mantraliṅgādyajñasaṃbandhitvenāvagatatvācca
analyzed: devāsaḥ divi ekādaśa stha iti mantreṇa gṛhīta tvāt te devāḥ yajñam imam juṣadhvam iti mantra liṅgāt yajña saṃbandhi tvena avagata tvāt ca
samasta deva rūpa devatā saṃbandhena tādṛś devatya vaiśvadeva grahe śeṣa tayā anvitaḥ iti
tatra homa śeṣasya agre viniyoga abhāvena bhakṣaṇasya eva prāpteḥ tad devatā saṃbandha apanayasya
spaṣṭa tvāt na pātnīvata bhakṣaṇe upalakṣaṇa tayā prasaktiḥ

original: yathāca vaiśvadevagrahe aṅgapradhānadevatānāṃ sarvāsāmeva devatātvaṃ tathā sūtrabhāṣyakārādibhiḥ dvādaśe prapañcitam /
analyzed: yathā ca vaiśvadeva grahe aṅga pradhāna devatānām sarvāsām eva devatā tvam tathā sūtra bhāṣyakāra ādibhiḥ dvādaśe prapañcitam

original: saṃbhavati vā kṣīranīravivekavatībhiḥ viśvadevadevatābhiḥ sarvadevatāliṅgakamantragṛhītameva sarvasaṃbandhinaṃ somaṃ śeṣāntare satyapi svabhāgatvena  #
analyzed: saṃbhavati vā kṣīra nīra vivekavatībhiḥ viśvadeva devatābhiḥ sarva devatā liṅgaka mantra gṛhītam eva sarva saṃbandhinam somam śeṣa antare sati api sva bhāga tvena
svīkartum

original: ataeva sādane “eṣa te yoniḥ viśvebhyastvā devebhya” iti mantragataṃ viśvadevārthasādanaliṅgam;
analyzed: ataeva sādane eṣa te yoniḥ viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ iti mantra gatam viśva deva artha sādana liṅgam

original: tathāpi “viśve devāḥ śrṛṇutemaṃ havaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭha /
analyzed: tathā api viśve devāḥ śrṛṇuta imam havam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ upadyaviṣṭha

original: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvaṃ” iti yājyāmantreca grahaṇasamānadevatākamantraliṅgaṃ copapadyate /
analyzed: ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam iti grahaṇa samāna devatāka mantra liṅgam ca upapadyate

original: nitarāṃ ca “avijñāto vā eṣa yadāgrayaṇa” ityarthavāde viśeṣato devatayā avijñātatvakalpanañca /
analyzed: nitarām ca a vijñātaḥ vai eṣa yat āgrayaṇaḥ iti arthavāde viśeṣataḥ devatayā a vijñāta tva kalpanam ca
yadi api āgrayaṇa sthālyāḥ na viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ pradīyate
tathā api pātnīvata gṛhīta avaśiṣṭa devatya śeṣa sthāpana artham vyāpṛta tvāt tasyāḥ ca agre droṇakalaśena
gṛhītvā hāriyojana graha pracāra anuṣṭhānāt tad pātra a pradāne vacanāt pātra antareṇa
pradāne na kaḥ pi doṣaḥ

original: ato vaiśvadevahutaśeṣabhakṣaṇe savitrāderupalakṣaṇatvaprasaktāvapi pātnīvate tadīyaśeṣābhāvāt taddevatāsaṃbandhāpanayāt nopalakṣaṇīyā viśvadevadevatā  #
analyzed: atas vaiśvadeva huta śeṣa bhakṣaṇe savitṛ ādeḥ upalakṣaṇa tva prasaktau api pātnīvate tadīya śeṣa abhāvāt tad devatā saṃbandha apanayāt na upalakṣaṇīyā viśvadeva devatā
iti nyāyasudhākāraḥ

original: etadeva sarvamabhisaṃdhāya āgrayaṇadevatābhūtānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāmupalakṣaṇaṃ kasmānna
analyzed: etat eva sarvam abhisaṃdhāya āgrayaṇa devatā bhūtānām viśveṣām devānām upalakṣaṇam kasmāt na

original: cintyata ityāśaṅkya tadapanayasya niḥsandigdhatvādityeva parihārasūcanārthaṃ tata
analyzed: cintyate iti āśaṅkya tad apanayasya niḥsandigdha tvāt iti eva parihāra sūcana artham tata
iti bhāṣyam vyācaṣṭe iti uktam nyāyasudhāyām

original: evaṃ sthite yat prakāśakāraiḥ etadanūdya āgrayaṇasthālyā na kvāpi śākhāyāṃ viśvadevebhyo
analyzed: evam sthite yat prakāśa kāraiḥ etat anūdya āgrayaṇa sthālyāḥ na kvāpi śākhāyām viśvadevebhyaḥ
hūyate yatas tasya viśvadeva pīta tvāt tatas pātnīvate viśvadeva pītasya iti ūhena upalakṣaṇa āśaṅkā udiyāt
atas nuṣṭhānam an ālocya bahu bhāṣī yat ūcivān
āśaṅkā ca samādhānam ubhayam tad asaṅgatam iti dūṣitam
tad āgrayaṇasya sarva deva rūpa devatā saṃbandha abhāve te devāḥ yajñam iman juṣadhvam iti
mantra liṅga virodhasya pracāra antare sarva devatā saṃbandha abhāvena duṣparihara tvāt tad mate
anuṣṭhāna virodha prasakteḥ ca anavarata anucintya māna dveṣya āropita bahu bhāṣi tva guṇa āveśāt eva iti

original: pātnīvatasya pūrvamasiddheḥ karmatvenānvayāyogāt gṛhṇāteḥ karmākāṅkṣāyāṃ prasiddhāgrayaṇasyaiva
analyzed: pātnīvatasya pūrvam asiddheḥ karma tvena anvaya ayogāt gṛhṇāteḥ karma ākāṅkṣāyām prasiddha āgrayaṇasya eva

original: pañcamyā karmatvalakṣaṇayā karmatvenānvaye sati āgrayaṇakarmakagrahaṇena pātnīvantaṃ
analyzed: pañcamyā karmatva lakṣaṇayā karmatvena anvaye sati āgrayaṇa karmaka grahaṇena pātnīvantam
kuryāt iti arthena āgrayaṇa sthita mātrasya eva abhyunnīta mātre uttara devatā saṃbandhasya iva
pātnīvat devatā saṃbandha pratīteḥ an āgrayaṇa stha rūpa dvi devatya śeṣasya saṃsṛṣṭasya api
patnī vat devatā saṃbandha abhāvena pūrva devatā saṃbandha apanaya abhāvaḥ iti upapattim abhipretya āha
pūrvavat iti
yadi api karma na śrūyate

original: tathāpi apādānatvena śrutasya tattvenānvayāsaṃbhavāt lakṣaṇāyāñca pramāṇābhāvāt āgrayaṇādapetasyaiva
analyzed: tathā api apādāna tvena śrutasya tattvena anvaya asaṃbhavāt lakṣaṇāyām ca pramāṇa abhāvāt āgrayaṇāt apetasya eva
upasthita tvāt pātnīvatam iti taddhitena parāmṛṣṭasya karma tvena anvayāt apeta tvasya ca
saṃsṛṣṭa mātre saṃbhavāt sarvasya eva uttara devatā saṃbandha pratīteḥ tasya ca upapādita rītyā
pūrvadevatā saṃbandha apanayam vinā anupapatteḥ tad āvaśyaka tvāt na upalakṣaṇam iti abhipretya
siddhāntam āha pātnīvatam iti

original: nanu saṃbandhāpanayane 'pi bhūtapūrvagatyopalakṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkāṃ parihartumāha ------- bhūtapūrvagatyā ceti //
analyzed: nanu saṃbandha apanayane bhūta pūrva gatyā upalakṣaṇam bhavatu iti āśaṅkām parihartum āha bhūta pūrva gatyā ca iti
indra pītaḥ iti vidyamāna saṃbandha rūpa phala samāna kālīna vyāpāra atīta tvasya abhidhānāt
tasya ca saṃbandha vidyamāna tayā eva prakṛtau upalakṣaṇāt iha vidyamāna saṃbandha devatayā upalakṣaṇe
aprākṛta kārya kāri tva āpatteḥ na tādṛśasya upalakṣaṇa tva saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ
iti trayodaśam pātnīvate dvidaivatya an upalakṣaṇa adhikaraṇam
a pā tvaṣṭāram

original: pātnīvata eva “agnā i patnīvāḥ sajūrdevena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ pibe“ti mantrāt tvaṣṭurapi devatātvam /
analyzed: pātnīvataḥ eva agne i patnīvāḥ sajūs devena tvaṣṭrā somam piba iti mantrāt tvaṣṭuḥ api devatā tvam

original: ataḥ so 'pyagnivadupalakṣaṇīya iti prāpte ---------- yuktamagnau patnīvacchabdasya yaugikatvena viśeṣyasākāṅkṣasya sāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣyagrāhakatvam,
analyzed: atas saḥ u pi agni vat upalakṣaṇīyaḥ iti prāpte yuktam agnau patnīvat śabdasya yaugika tvena viśeṣya sākāṅkṣasya sāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣya grāhaka tvam
tvaṣṭuḥ tu tṛtīyayā sahabhāva mātram pratīyate
na ca asau pāna kriyā anvaya avyabhicārī

original: 'sahaiva daśabhiḥ putrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' tyādau vyabhicārāt,
analyzed: saha eva daśabhiḥ putraiḥ bhāram vahati gardabhī tyādau vyabhicārāt
sati api pāne devatā tvasya a prāmāṇika tvāt ca

original: ataḥ pātnīvatamiti nirapekṣataddhitena patnīvato 'gnereva devatātvamiti sa evopalakṣaṇīyo na tvaṣṭā // 14 // 28 //
analyzed: atas pātnīvatam iti nirapekṣa taddhitena patnīvataḥ gneḥ eva devatā tvam iti saḥ eva upalakṣaṇīyaḥ na tvaṣṭā
iti caturdaśam pātnīvate tvaṣṭuḥ a devatā tva adhikaraṇam
viṣayam pradarśayati pātnīvataḥ eva iti

original: samarpite dharmāntarākāṅkṣāyāṃ prakaraṇāt jyotiṣṭomāṅgabhūte 'pi asmin vaimṛdhavat

pratyudāharaṇa rūpeṇa atra pūrvapakṣa utthānāt pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatiḥ iti nyāyasudhākāraḥ

original: yattu ------ pūrvanyāyātyayena yatra pūrvasādhyābhāvaḥ siddhāntatayocyate tatraiva pratyudāharaṇasaṅgatiḥ;
analyzed: yat tu pūrva nyāya atyayena yatra pūrva sādhya abhāvaḥ siddhāntatayā ucyate tatra eva pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatiḥ

original: yatratu pūrvanyāyātyayena pūrvapakṣamātraṃ pūrvasādhyameva ca siddhāntaḥ tatrātideśikīti
analyzed: yatra tu pūrva nyāya atyayena pūrvapakṣa mātram pūrva sādhyam eva ca siddhāntaḥ tatra ātideśikī iti

original: vyavasthāṃ tanmatadūṣaṇapūrvakaṃ mahatā prayatnena prasādhya pūrvasādhyasyaivasiddhāntitatvāt
analyzed: vyavasthām tad mata dūṣaṇa pūrvakam mahatā prayatnena prasādhya pūrva sādhyasya eva siddhāntita tvāt
ātideśikīm saṅgatim prakāśa kārāḥ āhuḥ
tat svayam eva tad prakhya tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇa ādiṣu pūrvapakṣa utthāna mātreṇa sādhya aikye
pi pratyudāharaṇa saṅgateḥ abhidhānena pūrva ukta vyavasthāyāḥ pūrva apara viruddha tvāt etādṛśe
viṣaye saṅgati dvaya sāṅkarye pi bādhaka abhāvāt vedānta adhikaraṇeṣu api etādṛśa vidhayā
pratyudāharaṇa saṅgati abhidhānam eva yat kaustubhe
tad siddhāntam ādāya api saṅgati saṃbhava abhiprāyeṇa jñeyam
niḥsandigdha tvāt iti anena trayastriṃśat devānām devatā tvasya aspaṣṭa tvāt na upalakṣaṇa tvam iti pūrva nyāya vailakṣaṇyam sūcitam
upalakṣaṇam ityasya anantaram manyate iti adhyāhāraḥ
evañca sati yadi api etasya anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya karma antara tve pi pṛthak soma grahaṇa vidhi abhāvāt

original: kathañcidatideśena tatprāptisaṃbhave 'pi vā “yaddhavirvahati tena śeṣeṇa saṃyojayati
analyzed: kathañcid atideśena tad prāpti saṃbhave vā yat haviḥ vahati tena śeṣeṇa saṃyojayati

original: devatā” mityarthavādena vaṣaṭkāradevatāyai yaddhaviḥ vahati taccheṣeṇānuvaṣaṭkāre
analyzed: devatā miti arthavādena vaṣaṭkāra devatāyai yat haviḥ vahati tad śeṣeṇa anuvaṣaṭkāre
devatām saṃyojayati iti arthakeṇa vaṣaṭkāra yāgīya soma śeṣa dravya tva pratīteḥ tayā ca uttama ādi vat
pratipatti lakṣaṇa sattvena anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya pratipatti tva avasāyāt yat vāva somasya agne vīhi iti anuvaṣaṭkaroti

original: tenaiṣa saṃsthitān somān bhakṣayanti sa eva somasya sviṣṭakṛdi“ti dravyapratipattyarthasviṣṭakṛdyāgarūpatvasaṃstavādapi
analyzed: tena eṣa saṃsthitān somān bhakṣayanti saḥ eva somasya sviṣṭakṛt iti dravya pratipatti artha sviṣṭakṛt yāga rūpa tva saṃstavāt api
ca tad niścayāt ca pratipatti karma tvam nirvivādam
atas eva saṃkarṣe anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya sviṣṭakṛt vat tantreṇa anuṣṭhānam pūrvapakṣayitvā
vaṣaṭkāra yāga ānantarya rūpa krama pṛthaktvāt dvi devatyeṣu anuvaṣaṭkāra niṣedha rūpa liṅgāt ca
siddhānta tvena sādhitāyāḥ āvṛtteḥ pratipatti karma tve eva upapattiḥ
anyathā artha karma tve tantra anuṣṭhāna āpatteḥ tad asaṃbhavāt
atas ca pratipatti karma bhūte smin yāge na artha karma bhūta soma yāga atideśaḥ saṃbhavati
tathā api niṣkāsa avabhṛtha vājina yāga nyāyena itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣāyām soma janya yāga tva sāmānyāt
atideśa upapattyā vaṣaṭkāra anuvaṣaṭkāra yāga aṅga bhūtayoḥ soma bhakṣaṇayoḥ tantreṇa anuṣṭhāne
tatra eva devatā dvaya upalakṣaṇam kartavyam iti arthaḥ
aindra pradānānām prakṛti tvam anaindra pradānānām vikṛti tvam iti pakṣe anaindra pradāneṣu atideśena
prāptasya api anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya tāvat yā agniḥ devatā sā na prakṛti bhūtā aindra pradāna saṃbandhi indra sthāna āpannā
yena tad sthāna āpanna tvena mantra prāptyā tasya api upalakṣaṇam syāt

original: prakṛtau aindrapradāne hotṛkacamaseṣu “madhyataḥ kāriṇāṃ camasādhvaryavo vaṣaṭkṛte
analyzed: prakṛtau aindra pradāne hotṛka camaseṣu madhyatas kāriṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ vaṣaṭkṛte

original: anuvaṣaṭkṛte juhuta hotṛkāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛddhutvā śukrasyābhyunnīyopāvartadhvami”
analyzed: anuvaṣaṭkṛte juhuta hotṛkāṇām camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛt hutvā śukrasya abhyunnīya upāvartadhvam i
ti adhvaryu kartṛka praiṣa sakṛddhoma āmnānena anuvaṣaṭkārasya eva abhāvāt madhyatas kāri camaseṣu
tad sattve pi tad aṅga bhūta anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya prayāja ādi vat kṛtsna vidhāna tvena itikartavya tā anapekṣaṇāt atideśa anupapatteḥ bhakṣaṇasya
tad mantrasya ca aprāptau na upalakṣaṇa saṃbhāvanā api iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha prakṛtau tu iti
nanu prakṛtau somam bhakṣayati iti bhakṣaṇasya vedi barhi nyāyena aṅga pradhāna sādhāraṇa soma uddeśena
vidhānāt upadeśena eva bhakṣaṇa prāpteḥ tad mantra prāptiḥ iti atas āha upadeśena iti

original: yavaprayoge “vrīhīṇāṃ medha” iti mantrasyāsāmarthyena prakṛtāvūhābhāvena ca lopavadihāpi tasya lopasyaiva prāpterityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yava prayoge vrīhīṇām medhaḥ iti mantrasya asāmarthyena prakṛtau ūha abhāvena ca lopa vat iha api tasya lopasya eva prāpteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ataeva upadeśena bhakṣaprāptāvindrapītādhikaraṇasiddhānte savanasaṃbandhitvāviśeṣāt mantraviniyoge 'pi na tadīyadevatopalakṣaṇaprasaktiḥ /
analyzed: ataeva upadeśena bhakṣa prāptau indrapīta adhikaraṇa siddhānte savana saṃbandhi tva aviśeṣāt mantra viniyoge pi na tadīya devatā upalakṣaṇa prasaktiḥ
siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: svayāgāṅgabhūtadravyapātṛtvasattve 'pi tatrātideśābhāvena prākṛtadevatākāryāpattyabhāvāt yathā adhvaryuṇā pāne kriyamāṇe tataḥ pūrvaṃ hotrā  #
analyzed: sva yāga aṅga bhūta dravya pātṛ tva sattve pi tatra atideśa abhāvena prākṛta devatā kārya āpatti abhāvāt yathā adhvaryuṇā pāne kriyamāṇe tatas pūrvam hotrā
na hotṛ pītasya iti evam upalakṣayet
tathā eva anuvaṣaṭkāra devatā na upalakṣaṇīyā iti arthaḥ
sūtre vaṣaṭkāra śabdena vaṣaṭkāra saṃbaddha anuvaṣaṭkāra saṃbandhāt lakṣita lakṣaṇayā anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgīya devatā ucyate iti jñeyam
atra nyāyasudhākṛtā anuvaṣaṭkāra yāgasya pratipatti karma tvam sādhitam

original: taddūṣaṇena arthakarmatvaṃ prakāśakārairuktamapi kaustubhe nirasya pratipattikarmatvameva aṅgīkṛtamitīhāpi tadeva pratipattibhūtasyetyanena  #
analyzed: tad dūṣaṇena artha karma tvam prakāśa kāraiḥ uktam api kaustubhe nirasya pratipatti karma tvam eva aṅgīkṛtam iti iha api tat eva pratipatti bhūtasya iti anena

na ūhaḥ karmaṇaḥ eka tvāt
abhyāsānām api phala camasa vat asamāna vidhāna tve pramāṇa abhāvāt ca
nahi māna grahaṇa mantra anurodhena tad uddeśyānām saṅkocaḥ yuktaḥ
agni vidyayoḥ tu sva sva vidhi prayukta tvena kratu vidhi prayukta tva abhāvāt yuktaḥ para prayukta agni vidyā upajīvaka tayā kratu adhikāra saṅkocaḥ

original: ato mānagrahaṇamantrāveva kāmaṃ aindramātrapradānaviṣayau bhavetāṃ na tu mānādyapi /
analyzed: atas māna grahaṇa mantrau eva kāmam aindra mātra pradāna viṣayau bhavetām na tu māna ādi api
vastutas tu vasumataḥ iti anena devatā antarasya api abhidhānāt tayoḥ api sarvārthatvam eva
atas bhakṣa mantrasya eva aindra pradāna viṣaya tvāt anaindrāṇām amantrakam bhakṣaṇam
iti saptadaśam an aindrāṇām amantraka bhakṣaṇa adhikaraṇam
evam indrapīta adhikaraṇa dvitīya ūha pūrvapakṣam upajīvya pañca kṛtvā acintāḥ pradarśya adhunā
sva prayojana sādhanāya pratyavatiṣṭhate iti āha evam iti
dūṣaṇa prakāram eva āha na ūhaḥ iti

guṇa tvāt ca guṇānām ca parārtha tva ādi ti nyāyena aṅga grāhi tva anupapatteḥ vikṛti tva asaṃbhavāt

original: yāgasyaca pratyabhyāsamapyekatvāt svasmin svato 'bhyāsānupapatteḥ nohena samantrakaṃ
analyzed: yāgasya ca prati abhyāsam api eka tvāt svasmin svatas bhyāsa anupapatteḥ na ūhena sa mantrakam
bhakṣaṇam an aindrāṇām

original: ekasyaiva somena yajeteti pratyakṣaśrutyā vihitasya yāgasya upapādakatvasaṃbhaveyāgāntarāṇāṃ
analyzed: ekasya eva somena yajeta iti pratyakṣa śrutyā vihitasya yāgasya

original: tatkalpane prāmāṇābhāvāt ekajyotiṣṭomayāgāṅgatve dharmāṇāṃ satyapi liṅgāt mantravyavasthopapatteḥ
analyzed: tad kalpane prāmāṇa abhāvāt eka jyotiṣṭoma yāga aṅga tve dharmāṇām sati api liṅgāt mantra vyavasthā upapatteḥ
aindra pradāna soma śeṣa bhakṣaṇam eva sa mantrakam iti arthaḥ
abhyāsānām guṇa tve pi paraṃparayā phalavat tvam
tāvatā api na soma phala camasa abhyāsānām iva vyavasthayā adharma grāhi tvam iti āha abhyāsānām api iti

original: phalacamase nityānityasaṃyogavirodharūpahetorasāmānavidhyepīha tadabhāve tatkalpane naiva kiñcit pramāṇam /

original: nāpi payasā maitrāvaruṇaṃ śrīṇātītivadaindrapradānābhyāsārthatvena vidhiśravaṇamato nāsāmānavidhyamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: na api payasā maitrāvaruṇam śrīṇāti iti vat aindra pradāna abhyāsa arthatvena vidhi śravaṇam atas na a sāmānavidhyam iti arthaḥ
nanu iha api māna grahaṇa mantrayoḥ aindra pradāna mātra viṣaya tvāt tad anurodhena

original: mānagrahaṇayoḥ tatsaṃskāryasya somasya tatsaṃskārāṇāṃ cābhiṣavādīnāṃ tatsaṃvalitānāṃ
analyzed: māna grahaṇayoḥ tad saṃskāryasya somasya tad saṃskārāṇām ca abhiṣava ādīnām tad saṃvalitānām
dīkṣaṇīya ādīnām api aindra pradāna mātra viṣayatva avagateḥ sāmānavidhi abhāva saṃbhavaḥ iti atas
āha nahi iti
yuktā eti

original: prakṛte tu mānagrahaṇamantrayoḥ taduddeśyānāñca paraprayuktatvābhāvena kratuvidhiprayuktatvakalpanāvaśyaṃbhāvāt
analyzed: prakṛte tu māna grahaṇa mantrayoḥ tad uddeśyānām ca para prayukta tva abhāvena kratu vidhi prayukta tva kalpanā avaśyaṃbhāvāt

original: sarvābhyāsānāñca prakaraṇāviśeṣeṇa viniyogaprayogavidhikalpakatvopapatterna yuktaḥ saṃkoca ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarva abhyāsānām ca prakaraṇa aviśeṣeṇa viniyoga prayoga vidhi kalpaka tva upapatteḥ na yuktaḥ saṃkocaḥ iti arthaḥ
ataeva māna grahaṇa mantrayoḥ vrīhi mantrasya vrīhi viṣaya tva vat liṅgāt aindra pradāna mātra viṣaya tve pi
māna ādīnām puroḍāśa pratiṣṭhāpanasya iva sarva viṣaya tvāt tadīya māna grahaṇayoḥ amantraka tve
pi akṣatiḥ iti āha atas iti
yadi api ca latā avasthāyām eva anuṣṭhīyamānayoḥ mantra grahaṇayoḥ tantreṇa eva anuṣṭhānāt
athavā aindra pradāna artham eva anuṣṭhānena prasaṅgataḥ nyeṣām api upakāraka tvāt
pṛthak anuṣṭhāna abhāvena sa mantraka tva amantraka tva kṛtaḥ na anuṣṭhāne kaścana viśeṣaḥ

original: tathāpi aindrapradānottaraṃ sarvasomanāśe pradānāntarāṇāmarthe some mīyamāne gṛhyamāṇe cāmantrakatvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api aindra pradāna uttaram sarva soma nāśe pradāna antarāṇām arthe some mīyamāne gṛhyamāṇe ca amantraka tva siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
ataeva indra pīta adhikaraṇa siddhāntasya an aindeṣu mantra prāpti rūpasya
eva saṃbhavāt siddhānte pi asya sāmānavidhyasya anirākaraṇena abhyupagata tva avagame pi

original: siddhānte anupayuktasya tasya kṛtvācintāmiṣeṇātrābhidhāne kiṃ prayojanamityāśaṅkottaraṃ
analyzed: siddhānte anupayuktasya tasya kṛtvā a cintā miṣeṇa atra abhidhāne kim prayojanam iti āśaṅkā uttaram

original: bhakṣamantre viśeṣābhāve 'pi “indrāya tvā vasumate” ityanayoḥ mānagrahaṇamantrayoḥ
analyzed: bhakṣa mantre viśeṣa abhāve pi indrāya tvā vasumate iti anayoḥ māna grahaṇa mantrayoḥ

original: sāmānavidhyetu tadasaṃbhavāt yathāvasthitayośca tatrāsāmarthyādaprayoga eveti bhaṭṭasomeśvareṇa
analyzed: tad asaṃbhavāt yathā avasthitayoḥ ca tatra asāmarthyāt aprayogaḥ eva iti bhaṭṭa someśvareṇa

original: evaṃ sthite etaduttaraṃ nyāyasudhāyāmalikhitamapi tallikhitabhrameṇānūdya anaindrapradāneṣu
analyzed: evam sthite etat uttaram nyāyasudhāyām alikhitam api tad likhita bhrameṇa anūdya an aindra pradāneṣu

original: tat kaustubhe pūrvoktānuṣṭhānaviśeṣopapādanavyājena pūjyapādaireva ayuktamiti sūcitam /
