analyzed: tyāgasya vyāsajya vṛtti tve pi pānasya pīta pada lakṣita svīkārasya vā pratyeka vṛtti tvena

original: ḍitthamātṛvadekena vyapadeṣṭuṃ śakyatvāt tyāgasya ca hutāhutasamudāyaviṣayatvena
analyzed: ḍittha mātṛ vat ekena vyapadeṣṭum śakya tvāt tyāgasya ca huta a huta samudāya viṣaya tvena
bhakṣyamāṇa huta avayava mātra viṣaya tva abhāvāt na pīta padena tyakta tva lakṣaṇā

original: ataścaturdhākaraṇādhikaraṇaviṣayatvābhāvāttasyāpi samantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇamiti prāpte --------- satyaṃ pītapadena svīkāralakṣaṇā;
analyzed: atas caturdhākaraṇa adhikaraṇa viṣaya tva abhāvāt tasya api sa mantrakam bhakṣaṇam iti prāpte satyam pīta padena svīkāra lakṣaṇā
pānasya navame niṣedhyamāna tvāt
tyāgasya tvad ukta rītyā lakṣayitum aśakya tvāt ca

original: svīkārasya tu devasvādipadālambanatayā kalpyamānasya hutāvaśiṣṭa eva kalpanīyatvādyuktā lakṣaṇā;
analyzed: svīkārasya tu deva sva ādi pada ālambana tayā kalpyamānasya huta avaśiṣṭe eva kalpanīya tvāt yuktā lakṣaṇā

original: tathāpi tasya lāghavena vyāsajyavṛttereva kalpane pratyekavṛttitve pramāṇābhāvāccaturdhākaraṇādhikaraṇaviṣayatvopapatterna tasya samantrakabhakṣaṇam
analyzed: tathā api tasya lāghavena vyāsajya vṛtteḥ eva kalpane pratyeka vṛtti tve pramāṇa abhāvāt caturdhā karaṇa adhikaraṇa viṣaya tva upapatteḥ na tasya sa mantraka bhakṣaṇam
iti aṣṭādaśam aindrāgna bhakṣasya a mantraka tā adhikaraṇam
bhakṣa mantrasya aindrāgna devatya hutaśeṣa bhakṣaṇa aṅgatva anaṅgatva vicārāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī
tathā pūrva adhikaraṇe aindra pradāna vyatirikta pradāna huta śeṣa bhakṣaṇe amantraka tvasya ādya pūrvapakṣa vādinā
sādhitasya iha ākṣipya samādhānāt ākṣepikīm anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā sthita
eva ādya pūrvapakṣe kṛtvā acintā tvena vicāram darśayati evam iti
pūrvapakṣam āha
tyāgasya iti

original: yadyapi caturdhākaraṇādhikaraṇanyāyenendrāgnyoḥ vyāsajyavṛttitvāt nendrapītapadena indrāya tyakta iti vyutpattyā indrāgnyantargatendro devatā  #
analyzed: yadi api caturdhākaraṇa adhikaraṇa nyāyena indra agnyoḥ vyāsajya vṛtti tvāt na indra pīta padena indrāya tyaktaḥ iti vyutpattyā indra agni antargata indraḥ devatā  /
śakyāḥ vyapadeṣṭum
tathā api pīta padasya tyakta tva lakṣaṇāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt caturthī samāsasya ananuśiṣṭa tvena anyāyya tvāt

original: kathañcidanuśāsane 'pi vā hutāhutasamudāyasyaiva pūrvaṃ tyaktasya homena nāśādahutasya
analyzed: kathañcid anuśāsane vā huta a huta samudāyasya eva pūrvam tyaktasya homena nāśāt ahutasya
bhakṣaṇa yogyasya atyakta tvena indrapīta pada vyapadeśya tva asaṃbhavāt pānam eva rasa āsvādana rūpa devatā niṣṭham

original: athavā tasya navame niṣetsyamānatvāt āhavanīyamukhaprakṣeparūpaṃ vā athavā hutasyaiva
analyzed: athavā tasya navame niṣetsyamāna tvāt āhavanīya mukha prakṣepa rūpam vā athavā hutasya eva
tad pada vyapadeśya tva āpattyā a huta bhakṣyamāṇe tad pada vyapadeśa asaṃbhavāt apīta avayava saṃgrahāya

original: samudāye lakṣaṇāpatteḥ devasvādipadālambanatayāvaśyakaḥ svīkāro vā saṃbandharūpaḥ
analyzed: samudāye lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ deva sva ādi pada ālambana tayā āvaśyakaḥ svīkāraḥ vā saṃbandha rūpaḥ
pīta śabda arthaḥ lakṣaṇayā vaktavyaḥ
tathā ca tṛtīyā samāsaḥ api anuśāsana śiṣṭaḥ labhyate
evam ca svīkārasya avayava avayavi sādhāraṇyena kalpitasya prati devatā adhiṣṭhānam bhedena
kalpanā upapatteḥ vyāsajya tyāge pi ardhasya indreṇa svīkṛta tvāt tad pada vyapadeśya tva upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
ḍittha mātṛ vat iti

original: ḍitthaḍabitthayormātari mātṛpadārthāntarnītajanyajanakabhāvarūpasaṃbandhasya pratyekaṃ vidyamānatayā ekenāpi saṃbhavati ḍitthamāteti vyapadeśaḥ,
analyzed: ḍittha ḍabitthayoḥ mātari mātṛ padārtha antar nīta janya janaka bhāva rūpa saṃbandhasya pratyekam vidyamāna tayā ekena api saṃbhavati ḍittha mātā iti vyapadeśaḥ
tadvat iha api upapadyate iti arthaḥ

original: caturdhākaraṇetu taddhitena devatātvasyaiva uktatvānna vyāsajyavṛttidevatākasya grahaṇam /
analyzed: caturdhākaraṇe tu taddhitena devatā tvasya eva ukta tvāt na vyāsajya vṛtti devatākasya grahaṇam
ataeva apaunaruktyam ca iti abhipretya vaiṣamyam āha atas caturdhā iti
lāghavena iti

original: vyāsajyavṛttidevatāsthale vyāsajyavartina ekasyaiva svīkārasya kalpane saṃbhavati na tatra nānātvakalpanā;
analyzed: vyāsajya vṛtti devatā sthale vyāsajya vartinaḥ ekasya eva svīkārasya kalpane saṃbhavati na tatra nānātva kalpanā
gauravāt iti arthaḥ
yat tu vārtika ādau tyaktatva lakṣaṇayā siddhānta upapādanam
tad prauḍhi pradarśana artham iti uktam kaustubhe tatra eva draṣṭavyam
amantraka tva pūrvapakṣasya sthāyi tve sthāyi vicāra prayojanam aindrāgna bhakṣaṇe

original: 'pi savanaviśeṣaṇatayā prayojye mantre tadarthānusandhānavelāyāṃ pūrvapakṣe bhinnasvīkāratvāt
analyzed: savana viśeṣaṇa tayā prayojye mantre tad artha anusandhāna velāyām pūrvapakṣe bhinna svīkāra tvāt
aindrāgna antargata indra pīta tvena api indra pīta padārtha anusandhānam
siddhānte tu tasya ekatvāt indra pīta padārtha tva abhāvāt na anusandhānam iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti aṣṭādaśam aindrāgna bhakṣasya a mantraka tā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
a pā chandasaḥ ca
tatra eva mantre gāyatra chandasaḥ ityādi śrutam
tat ca idam soma viśeṣaṇam eva asmin pūrvapakṣe

original: ataśca kevalameva yatraindrapradāne gāyatraṃ chando yathā bṛhaspatisavādau 'gāyatrametadaharbhavatī'ti śruteḥ,
analyzed: atas ca kevalam eva yatra aindra pradāne gāyatram chandaḥ yathā bṛhaspatisava ādau gāyatram etat ahar bhavati iti śruteḥ
tatra eva asya utkarṣaḥ
na tu jyotiṣṭome niveśaḥ
kevala gāyatra chandaska pradāna abhāvāt
na ca sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa abhāvaḥ
indra devatya tva prātaḥsavana ādīnām anyatra loka ādau abhāvena pāriśeṣyāt eva bṛhaspatisava upasthiti saṃbhavāt iti
prāpte bṛhaspatisave pi savana mukhīye ṛk antarasya paṭhita tvāt gāyatram etat iti ādeḥ ca
bhūmnā api vyākhyāna upapatteḥ prakṛtau vikṛtau vā kevala gāyatra chandaska tva abhāvāt nitya sāpekṣa tvena
samāsa upapatteḥ prakṛtau eva niveśaḥ

original: vastutastu gāyatryāḥ pratyekameva sādhanatvāt satyapi ṛgāntare na samāsabhaṅgāśaṅkāpi // 19 // 33 //
analyzed: vastutas tu gāyatryāḥ pratyekam eva sādhanatvāt sati api ṛga antare na samāsa bhaṅga āśaṅkā api
iti ekonaviṃśam mantra viśeṣāṇām aneka chandaske viniyoga adhikaraṇam

original: (B2) aindrapradānaśeṣabhakṣaṇe evāyaṃ mantra iti pūrvapakṣamupajīvya kṛtācintātvena
analyzed: aindra pradāna śeṣa bhakṣaṇe eva ayam mantraḥ iti pūrvapakṣam upajīvya kṛta ācintā tvena
kariṣyamāṇasya sadaḥ ntara sahita gāyatra chandaska aindra pradāne ipi ayam mantraḥ ṅgam uta
tad nirapekṣa gāyatra chandaska aindra pradāne eva iti vicārasya mantra gata aṅga tva vicāra rūpa tayā
pāda adhyāya saṅgatī tathā āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā tasmin eva
mantre eka deśa viṣaya tā pradarśana pūrvakam pūrvapakṣam āha tatra eva iti

original: yadi gāyatrachandasa itipadaṃ siddhānta iva savanaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: yadi gāyatra chandasaḥ iti padam siddhānte iva savana viśeṣaṇam bhavet

original: tadā kevalagāyatrachandaskaindrapradānamātrārthatāpūrvapakṣo na sidhyedityato yadyapīndrapītapada iva tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ somaparatvaṃ na saṃbhavati;
analyzed: tadā kevala gāyatra chandaska aindra pradāna mātra ārthatā pūrvapakṣaḥ na sidhyet iti atas yadi api indra pīta pade iva tatpuruṣa kṛtam soma paratvam na saṃbhavati
pakṣa dvaye pi bahuvrīheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt

original: tathāpyanantaropanyastendrapītapadasya tatpuruṣeṇa somaparatve sādhite sati tatsamabhivyāhārāt gāyatracchandasa ityādipadānāmapi tatparatvameva
analyzed: tathā api anantara upanyasta indra pīta padasya tatpuruṣeṇa soma paratve sādhite sati tad samabhivyāhārāt gāyatra chandasaḥ ityādi padānām api tad paratvam eva
na tu pūrva pada upasthāpita prātaḥsavana ādi paratvam
tathātve viśeṣya para prātaḥsavana ādi padānām etat uttaram prayoga āpatteḥ atas smin mahā adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣe soma viśeṣaṇam eva iti abhipretya āha  /
tat ca idam iti
yathā indra pīta padena kevala indraḥ eva prakāśyate
na tu anya sahitaḥ
samāsa vighāta āpatteḥ atas aindrāgna ādau mantra aprayogaḥ pūrvatra sādhitaḥ

original: tathehāpi gāyatracchanda ādipadaiḥ kevalameva gāyatryādyanyayogavyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇatvena chandaḥ prakāśyate natu chandontarasāpekṣam;
analyzed: tathā iha api gāyatra chandaḥ ādi padaiḥ kevalam eva gāyatrī ādi anya yoga vyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇa tvena chandaḥ prakāśyate na tu chandaḥ ntara sāpekṣam
samāsa vighāta āpatteḥ
atas chandaḥ ntara sāpekṣa gāyatra chandaska tvasya jyautiṣṭomika aindra pradāne sattvena
mantra liṅga virodhāt yatra tad nirapekṣa gāyatra chandaska tā tatra utkarṣaḥ iti abhipretya āha
atas ca iti
gāyatram etat iti
anena atideśa prāpta nānā chandaska tā bādhena dāśatayī gata autpatti gāyatrī chandaska ṛcām vidhānam aṣṭama caturtha pāde vakṣyate

original: ataeva -------- trivṛdbahiṣpavamānādau kvacit prāptagāyatrachandaskānuvādatvaṃ pakṣāntareṇa prakāśakāroktaṃ ------- apāstam /
analyzed: ataeva trivṛt bahiṣpavamāna ādau kvacid prāpta gāyatra chandaska anuvāda tvam pakṣa antareṇa prakāśa kāra uktam apāstam

original: yadyapi anyachandaskarga bādhenotpattigāyatrīvidhānābhidhānena kevalagāyatrachandaskatvamādāyātra pūrvapakṣa upatiṣṭhati;
analyzed: yadi api anya chandaska ṛga bādhena utpatti gāyatrī vidhāna abhidhānena kevala gāyatra chandaska tvam ādāya atra pūrvapakṣe upatiṣṭhati
tathā api utpatti gāyatrī vidhānena eva viśeṣa rūpeṇa anya chandaska ṛcām bādham abhipretya kevala gāyatra chandaska tva saṃbhavaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ------- manotāmantrasya sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇābhāvena vikṛtāvanutkarṣavadihāpi tadabhāvāt kathaṃ bṛhaspatisavopasthitirityāśaṅkate  #
analyzed: nanu manotā mantrasya sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa abhāvena vikṛtau anutkarṣa vat iha api tad abhāvāt katham bṛhaspatisava upasthitiḥ iti āśaṅkate
na ca iti

original: atra prakāśakāraiḥ bhakṣānuvāka iti samākhyayaiva sāmānyasaṃbandhabodhakapramāṇamityuktam,
analyzed: atra prakāśa kāraiḥ bhakṣa anuvākaḥ iti samākhyayā eva sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇam iti uktam
tat loke pi rāgataḥ prāpta soma bhakṣa sattvena samākhyāyāḥ tad sādhāraṇa tayā niyamataḥ
sāmānya yāga upasthāpaka tva abhāve viśeṣataḥ bṛhaspatisava yāga upasthāpaka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt ayuktam iti upekṣya
svayam anyathā pariharati indra devatya tva iti
laukika soma bhakṣe kevala gāyatra chandaska tva prātaḥsavana saṃbandhi tva indra pīta tva ādīnām asaṃbhavena
tad vyāvṛttyā pariśeṣāt eva viśeṣeṇa sāmarthyāt bṛhaspati savīya soma pratīti upapatteḥ
sāmānya saṃbandha bodhaka pramāṇa abhāve pi kṣati virahaḥ iti arthaḥ
ṛk antarasya paṭhita tvāt iti
yathāpāṭham anya chandaska ṛcām atideśataḥ prāpta tvāt iti arthaḥ
etat ca upalakṣaṇam ṛk antara āmnāna antarasya api

original: yathā mādhyandinasavane maruttvatīye tathā niṣkaivalyeca śastre krameṇa prakṛtau
analyzed: yathā mādhyandinasavane maruttvatīye tathā niṣkaivalye ca śastre krameṇa prakṛtau

original: janiṣṭhā ugra ityasya sūktasya mukhe yastastaṃbhetyṛcastathā indrasya nu vīryāṇīti
analyzed: janiṣṭhāḥ ugraḥ iti asya sūktasya mukhe yaḥ tastaṃbha iti ṛcaḥ tathā indrasya nu vīryāṇi iti

original: sūktamukhe dhunena yaḥ supraketaṃ madanta ityṛcaśca triṣṭup chandaskāyā āmnānasya
analyzed: sūkta mukhe dhunena yaḥ su praketam madantaḥ iti ṛcaḥ ca triṣṭubh chandaskāyāḥ āmnānasya

original: yastastaṃbha dhuneta yaḥ itisūktamukhīye ityāśvalāyanasūtragatavacanena kṛtatvāt /
analyzed: yaḥ tastaṃbha dhuneta yaḥ iti sūkta mukhīye iti āśvalāyana sūtra gata vacanena kṛta tvāt
gāyatram etat ityādeḥ ca iti

original: yato bṛhaspatisave ṛgantarāṇāmanyachandaskānāṃ vidhānāt gāyatratvaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ
analyzed: yatas bṛhaspatisave ṛk antarāṇām anya chandaskānām vidhānāt gāyatra tvam vidhīyamānam
yājyā ādi viṣayam
athavā prakāśakāra ukta rītyā viśeṣa vihita trivṛt stomakeṣu ājya ādi stotreṣu vā
athavā somanāthena ukta rītyā pradhāna mātre vā niviśate
atas jyotiṣṭome iva bṛhaspatisave pi na kevala gāyatra chandaska tvam
gāyatram etat ahar iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca bhūma guṇa yogāt gauṇam iti arthaḥ

original: ataeva yathā gurutvasya śiṣyatvānapekṣasya kadācidapyabhāvāt nityasāpekṣatayā asmākaṃ gurukulamityatrāsmadarthaśiṣyasāpekṣeṇāpi gurupadena
analyzed: ataeva yathā guru tvasya śiṣya tva anapekṣasya kadācid api abhāvāt nitya sāpekṣa tayā asmākam guru kulam iti atra asmad artha śiṣya sāpekṣeṇa api guru padena
evam iha api nitya chandaḥ ntara sāpekṣasya gāyatra padasya anya yoga vyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇa tayā
anvaya ayoge pi ayoga vyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ nitya sāpekṣa tayā chandaḥ padena samāsa upapattiḥ iti āha
prakṛtau iti

original: yadyapi tatra gurvādiśabdaḥ saṃbandhiśabdo naivaṃ gāyatrachandaḥ;
analyzed: yadi api tatra guru ādi śabdaḥ saṃbandhi śabdaḥ na evam gāyatra chandaḥ
tathā api śiṣya ādi nirapekṣa guru ādi artha asaṃbhava upapattyā yathā nitya sāpekṣa tvam tathā
iha api gāyatra chandaskasya asaṃbandhi śabda tve pi tad arthasya chandaḥ ntara nirapekṣasya abhāvāt nitya sāpekṣa tvam iti abhāvāt iti hetu uktyā sūcitam

original: evamayogavyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇatāṅgīkāreṇa nityatvena ca samāsopapattiṃ pradarśya adhunā anyayogavyāvṛttyāpi saṃbhavativiśeṣaṇatvamityāha --------  #
analyzed: evam ayoga vyāvṛttyā viśeṣaṇatā aṅgīkāreṇa nitya tvena ca samāsa upapattim pradarśya adhunā anya yoga vyāvṛttyā api saṃbhavati viśeṣaṇatvam iti āha  /
vastutas tu iti

original: gāyatraṃ chando 'syeti samāsārthāntarnītasaṃbandhasāmānyasya viśeṣaṃ vinā aparyavasānādṛgavāntarakāryadvāraiva
analyzed: gāyatram chandaḥ sya iti samāsa artha antar nīta saṃbandha sāmānyasya viśeṣam vinā aparyavasānāt ṛc avāntara kārya dvārā eva

original: tadviśeṣāvagateḥ satyapi stotrādau chando 'ntare sarvachandasāṃ vyāsajya sādhanatvābhāvāt
analyzed: tad viśeṣa avagateḥ sati api stotra ādau chandaḥ ntare sarva chandasām vyāsajya sādhanatva abhāvāt
tasmin ca sva avāntara kārye itara nirapekṣa tayā eva tad tad chandaska ṛcām sādhana tvāt anya yoga vyāvṛttyā api
viśeṣaṇa tvam samāsaḥ ca upapadyate iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ sthite etādṛśanirapekṣasādhanatvamādāya kevalaṃ gāyatrachandaskatvasya jyotiṣṭome
analyzed: evam sthite etādṛśa nirapekṣa sādhanatvam ādāya kevalam gāyatra chandaska tvasya jyotiṣṭome

original: 'pi “idaṃ saumyaṃ madhvadhukṣannadribhaḥ niro juṣāṇaṃ indratatpibe” tyaindrapradānayājyāyā
analyzed: pi idam saumyam madhu adhukṣan adribhaḥ niras juṣāṇam indra tat pibe tya aindra pradāna yājyāyā
eva mantraḥ na tu anya chandaska yājyā aindra pradāna śeṣa bhakṣaṇe iti āpādanasya pūrvapakṣe
saṃbhavāt vikṛtau utkarṣa paryanta āpādanam tādṛśa yājya abhāve kṛtvā acintayā eva jñeyam iti
vastutas tu iti anena sūcitam
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti ekonaviṃśam mantra viśeṣa ṇām aneka chandaske viniyoga adhikaraṇam
a pā sarveṣām
sthitāt uttaram
na indra pīta pade tatpuruṣaḥ tu bahuvrīhīḥ eva

original: tatpuruṣe 'pi pūrvapade tāvadekā saṃbandhilakṣaṇā pītapade ca svīkṛtāvayavalakṣaṇā /
analyzed: tatpuruṣe pi pūrva pade tāvat ekā saṃbandhi lakṣaṇā pīta pade ca svīkṛta avayava lakṣaṇā
yadi api ca iyam tulyā
tathā api avayava svīkārasya avayavi svīkāra sāpekṣa tvena vilamba upasthitika tvāt na tulya tvam

original: tataśca pītapade arśaādyacpratyayaṃ matvarthīyaṃ pādhātunā cāvayavigatameva tatsaṃbandhisvīkāraṃ
analyzed: tatas ca pīta pade arśas ādi a c pratyayam matu arthīyam pā dhātunā ca avayavi gatam eva tad saṃbandhi svīkāram

original: lakṣayitvā indraḥ pītaḥ svīkārakarttā yasminsavana iti vyutpattyā samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhiraṅgīkriyate /
analyzed: lakṣayitvā indraḥ pītaḥ svīkāra karttā yasmin savane iti vyutpattyā samāna adhikaraṇa bahuvrīhiḥ aṅgīkriyate
prakaraṇa viśeṣāt ca nirṇayaḥ

original: ataḥ sarvasyaiva somasyoktavidhaprātaḥ savanādisaṃbandhitvādanaindrāṇāmapi samantrakamevāvikāreṇa bhakṣaṇam /
analyzed: atas sarvasya eva somasya uktavidha prātaḥsavana ādi saṃbandhi tvāt anaindrāṇām api sa mantrakam eva a vikāreṇa bhakṣaṇam
yadi tu pīta padasya pūrvanipāta āpattiḥ āśaṅkyate
tat ā astu indre pītam pānam asmin iti saptamī bahuvrīhiḥ
yadi tu atra api niṣṭhā anta tvena pūrva nipāta āpattiḥ aviśiṣṭā iti vibhāvyate
tadā pīta padasya ākṛti gaṇa tvena āhitāgni ādi gaṇa antar pātam aṅgīkṛtya vā āhitāgni ādiṣu iti sūtreṇa indra padasya pūrva nipātaḥ
atha vāstu ayam tatpuruṣaḥ eva
tadā api tu lakṣaṇayā soma saṃbandhi savana paratvam
na ca tasyām pramāṇa abhāvaḥ

original: taittirīyaśākhāyāṃ prātaḥsavanādibhedena indrapīta- narāśaṃsapīta - pitṛpītānāṃ trivāraṃ pāṭhasyaiva pramāṇatvāt /
analyzed: taittirīya śākhāyām prātaḥsavana ādi bhedena indra pīta narāśaṃsa pīta pitṛ pītānām tri vāram pāṭhasya eva pramāṇa tvāt

original: somamātraparatve hi tattatpradāneṣu liṅgādevendrapītādipadānāṃ sakṛtpaṭhitānāmeva pāṭhopapattau tatra yogyatayaiva prātaḥsavanādipadānāṃ vibhāgena  #
analyzed: soma mātra paratve hi tad tad pradāneṣu liṅgāt eva indra pīta ādi padānām sakṛt paṭhitānām eva pāṭha upapattau tatra yogyatayā eva prātaḥsavana ādi padānām vibhāgena

original: atasteṣāṃ prātaḥsavanādibhedena trivāraṃ pāṭha eva vaiyarthyabhiyā savanaparatvalakṣaṇātātparyagrāhakaḥ /
analyzed: atas teṣām prātaḥsavana ādi bhedena tri vāram pāṭhaḥ eva vaiyarthya bhiyā savana paratva lakṣaṇa a tātparya grāhakaḥ

original: ataścendrapītādiviśeṣaṇatrayayuktasya tattatsavanasya saṃbandhinaṃ somaṃ anyadevatyamapi bhakṣayāmīti mantrārthāvagateḥ sarvatraikamantryam
analyzed: atas ca indra pīta ādi viśeṣaṇa traya yuktasya tad tad savanasya saṃbandhinam somam anya devatyam api bhakṣayāmi iti mantra artha avagateḥ sarvatra aikamantryam
vibhāgaḥ u pi taittirīya śākhā āmnāta krameṇa eva bodhyaḥ
kalpasūtra kārāḥ tu ūham eva āmananti
iti viṃśam ekādaśa adhikaraṇa upasaṃhāra adhikaraṇam

original: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ // 2 //
analyzed: iti śrī khaṇḍadeva viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikāyām tṛtīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
idānīm indrapīta adhikaraṇa kṛta dvitīya ūha pūrvapakṣasya ādya pūrvapakṣa vādinā eva
nirasta tvāt avaśiṣṭa ādya pūrvapakṣa nirāsena siddhāntam upapādayitum aneka cintā vyavahita tvāt ādyam
pūrvapakṣam smārayati sthitāt iti
sthita ādi ti lyap lope pañcamī
anirāsāt sthitam pūrvapakṣam apekṣya avaśiṣṭam uttaram ucyate iti arthaḥ

original: bahuvrīhāvubhayapadārthatyāgāpekṣayā ekapadārthatyāgena lāghavāt tatpakṣamaṅgīkṛtya indrapītapadasya somaparatvaṃ yadvadet,
analyzed: bahuvrīhau ubhaya padārtha tyāga apekṣayā eka padārtha tyāgena lāghavāt tad pakṣam aṅgīkṛtya indra pīta padasya soma paratvam yat vadet
tat tatra api lakṣaṇā dvaya āpattyā ubhaya padārtha tyāgasya sama tvāt ayuktam
atas bahuvrīhim eva gāyatram prātaḥsavanam ityādi tātparya anugṛhīta savana eka viśeṣaṇa tayā artha pratipādaka gāyatra chandaḥ pada prāya pāṭhāt
prātaḥsavana ādi pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca indra pīta pade aṅgīkṛtya savana paratvam eva yuktam iti abhipretya āha
na indra pīta pade iti
tām eva lakṣaṇa āpattim darśayati pīta pade ca iti

original: pītapade svīkāralakṣaṇāyāmapi hutāhutasamudāyasyaiva tyāgena svīkārāt indrapītapadena
analyzed: pīta pade svīkāra lakṣaṇāyām api huta a huta samudāyasya eva tyāgena svīkārāt indrapīta padena

original: vivakṣitasyendrakartṛkasvīkārasya samudāya eva sattvāt tadekadeśasya homena naṣṭasya
analyzed: vivakṣitasya indra kartṛka svīkārasya samudāye eva sattvāt tad eka deśasya homena naṣṭasya

original: someti saṃbodhanārthatvāt pratyakṣavacanena te iti śabdena vyapadeṣṭumaśakyatvāt
analyzed: soma iti saṃbodhana artha tvāt pratyakṣa vacanena te iti śabdena vyapadeṣṭum aśakya tvāt

original: pītapadena pātrasthahutaśeṣarūpasvīkṛtāvayavasya pītapade lakṣaṇāntarasya tatpuruṣe āpattiḥ,
analyzed: pīta padena pātra stha huta śeṣa rūpa svīkṛta avayavasya pīta pade lakṣaṇa antarasya tatpuruṣe āpattiḥ

original: bahuvrīhautu hutāhutasamudāyasya pītapadenoktāvapi yasmin savane indreṇa samudāyarūpatayā
analyzed: bahuvrīhau tu huta a huta samudāyasya pīta padena uktau api yasmin savane indreṇa samudāya rūpatayā

original: somaḥ svīkṛtaḥ tatsavanasaṃbandhitvasya hutaśeṣāvayave 'pi sattvāt tatsaṃbandhipātrasthaśeṣasya
analyzed: somaḥ svīkṛtaḥ tad savana saṃbandhi tvasya huta śeṣa avayave pi sattvāt tad saṃbandhi pātra stha śeṣasya
saṃbodhana upapatteḥ tam yat kiñcid devatyam bhakṣayāmi iti artha upapatteḥ na doṣaḥ

original: yadyapi prātaḥsavanamabhiṣavo yasyeti bahuvrīhiṇā prātaḥsavanapadasya somaparatvamapi,
analyzed: yadi api prātaḥsavanam abhiṣavaḥ yasya iti bahuvrīhiṇā prātaḥsavana padasya soma para tvam api
na savana para tva niścayaḥ
tathā api rūḍhyā kratu bhāga vāci tvena avagata tvāt avayava vyutpatti asaṃbhavāt savana paratva upapattiḥ

original: yadyapi vāgjuṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatviti ṣaṣṭhyantasomaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyasidhyai prātaḥsavanaśabdasyāvayavavyutpattyā somavācitvaṃ bhavet;
analyzed: yadi api vāc juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu iti ṣaṣṭhī anta soma śabda sāmānādhikaraṇya sidhyai prātaḥsavana śabdasya avayava vyutpattyā soma vāci tvam bhavet

original: tathāpi ādyakratubhāgagatasya kṛtsnasya somasya prātarabhiṣavāt prātaḥsavanaśabdasya
analyzed: tathā api ādya kratu bhāga gatasya kṛtsnasya somasya prātarabhiṣavāt prātaḥsavana śabdasya
kratu bhāga gata kṛtsna soma vāci tva āpatteḥ soma śabdasya huta śeṣa mātra vāci tvāt prātar savana saṃbandhi va vācinam

original: śabdaṃ vinā sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapatteḥ prātaḥsavanaśabdasya chapratyayāntatvāpatterna somaparatvam /
analyzed: śabdam vinā sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ prātaḥsavana śabdasya chapratyaya anta tva āpatteḥ na soma paratvam

original: ato deva somayastvamindrapītasya prātaḥsavanasya saṃbandhī tasya te 'vayavaṃ bhakṣayāmītyevaṃ ṣaṣṭhī yojyā /
analyzed: atas deva somayaḥ tvam indra pītasya prātaḥsavanasya saṃbandhī tasya te vayavam bhakṣayāmi iti evam ṣaṣṭhī yojyā

original: natu yasya prātaḥsavanasya somasya saṃbandhī indrapītastasyetyevaṃ sā yojyeti ubhayapadārthatyāgāpattisāmye prātaḥsavanapadaprāyapāṭhāt bahuvrīhireva  #
analyzed: na tu yasya prātaḥsavanasya somasya saṃbandhī indra pītaḥ tasya iti evam sā yojyā iti ubhaya padārtha tyāga āpatti sāmye prātaḥsavana pada prāya pāṭhāt bahuvrīhiḥ eva
yuktaḥ iti āśayaḥ

original: nanu devatāyāḥ pātṛtvaniṣedhāt pītapade svīkāralakṣaṇā bahuvrīhipakṣe ubhayapadārthatyāgāpattidoṣāpekṣayā adhikā samastyeva,
analyzed: nanu devatāyāḥ pātṛ tva niṣedhāt pīta pade svīkāra lakṣaṇā bahuvrīhi pakṣe ubhaya padārtha tyāga āpatti doṣa apekṣayā adhikā samasti eva
pratyuta aindrāgna adhikaraṇa upapādita prakāreṇa pādhātunā eva lakṣyasya svīkārasya avayava avayavi sādhāraṇa tvāt

original: bhakṣyamāṇāvayavaniṣṭhasyaiva svīkārasya pādhātunā lakṣaṇānna tatpuruṣe svīkṛtāvayavalakṣaṇāntarāpattidoṣa
analyzed: bhakṣyamāṇa avayava niṣṭhasya eva svīkārasya pā dhātunā lakṣaṇāt na tatpuruṣe svīkṛta avayava lakṣaṇa antara āpatti doṣa
iti āśaṅkya pariharati yadi api ca iti
yadi api pā dhātunā svīkāra lakṣaṇā tulyā
tathā api atra avayava gata svīkāra bodhanam avayavi gata svīkāra upasthiti sāpekṣam iti vilamba upasthiti sāpekṣam
na evam bahuvrīhau sarvasya avayavinaḥ eva svīkārāt atas tulya tvam iti arthaḥ
vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīheḥ ananuśiṣṭa tva āśaṅkām kaṇṭhe kālaḥ ityādi vat saptamī viśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhau iti anena
vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīhi saṃbhavāt prācīnaiḥ parihṛtām api saptamī bahuvrīhi viṣaye eva
tasya jñāpaka tā aṅgīkārāt anyatra apravṛtteḥ tatra a parituṣya prakāra antareṇa samāna adhikaraṇa bahuvrīhi āśrayaṇena
pariharati atas ca iti

original: prathamataḥ pītapratibaddhavatsāmityatreva pītapadaṃ bhāve niṣṭhāntaṃ pānavācakamaṅgīkṛtya
analyzed: prathamatas pīta pratibaddha vat sām iti atra iva pīta padam bhāve niṣṭhā antam pāna vācakam aṅgīkṛtya

original: pītamasyāstītyarthe arśāādyacaṃ kṛtvā indraḥ pānavān yasmin savane ityevaṃ samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhirevetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: pītam asya asti iti arthe kṛtvā indraḥ pānavān yasmin savane iti evam samāna adhikaraṇa bahuvrīhiḥ eva iti arthaḥ
evam ca apūrva saṃyogāt abhyāsānām prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt sarvatra pradhāna bhūta bhakṣayāmi pada sāmarthyāt ca

original: sarvapradānāṅgatvena prāptasya mantrasya guṇabhūtendrapītapadāśaktyā saṃkoco na yuktastasyāpi
analyzed: sarva pradāna aṅga tvena prāptasya mantrasya guṇa bhūta indrapīta pada aśaktyā saṃkocaḥ na yuktaḥ tasya api
savana viṣaya tvena śakti upapādanāt na saṃkocaka tā yuktā iti sarva pradāna aṅgatva nirṇaya
iti āha prakaraṇa aviśeṣāt iti

original: svaraviśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhitvanirṇayaḥ prācīnairukto 'pi svarasya tatpuruṣe 'pi pūrvapakṣe upapāditatvāt upekṣitaḥ /
analyzed: svara viśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhi tva nirṇayaḥ svarasya tatpuruṣe pi pūrvapakṣe upapādita tvāt upekṣitaḥ
atas ca vasumat gaṇasya gāyatra chandasaḥ indra pītasya i tyādi trika trayam prātaḥsavana ādi viśeṣaṇam

original: tacca somasyasaca avayavadvārā bhakṣaṇasyetyevaṃ viśeṣaṇayuktasya savanasya saṃbandhī
analyzed: tat ca avayava dvārā bhakṣaṇasya iti evam viśeṣaṇa yuktasya savanasya saṃbandhī

original: yaḥ somaḥ tasyāvayavaṃ bhakṣayāmītyarthāt mantraliṅgasya sarvapradānaśeṣabhakṣaṇaprakāśane
analyzed: yaḥ somaḥ tasya avayavam bhakṣayāmi iti arthāt mantra liṅgasya sarva pradāna śeṣa bhakṣaṇa prakāśane

original: 'pyaviruddhatvāt sarvabhakṣāṅgatvamityabhipretya ūhapakṣanirāsena saha siddhāntamupasaṃharati ------- ata iti //
analyzed: pi aviruddha tvāt sarva bhakṣa aṅgatvam iti abhipretya ūha pakṣa nirāsena saha siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas iti

original: yeṣāntu tattatsavanaviśeṣaṇatayopāttānāṃ padānāṃ liṅgaṃ tattatsavane virudhyate,
analyzed: yeṣām tu tad tad savana viśeṣaṇa tayā upāttānām padānām liṅgam tad tad savane virudhyate

original: teṣāntu sāmarthyādeva sūktavākamantragatapadānāmiva vibhajya viniyoge 'pyavaśiṣṭāviruddhamantragatapadānāmavirodhe sati tattatsavanasaṃbandhisarvabhakṣāṅgatvamevetyarthaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tu sāmarthyāt eva sūktavāka mantra gata padānām iva vibhajya viniyoge pi avaśiṣṭa aviruddha mantra gata padānām avirodhe sati tad tad savana saṃbandhi sarva bhakṣa aṅga tvam eva iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhiṇopapāditasiddhāntopasaṃhāre kṛte punaḥ siṃhāvalokananyāyena tatra dūṣaṇamupanyasya tatparihāreṇa siddhāntamupapādayati  #
analyzed: evam samāna adhikaraṇa bahuvrīhiṇā upapādita siddhānta upasaṃhāre kṛte punar siṃhāvalokana nyāyena tatra dūṣaṇam upanyasya tad parihāreṇa siddhāntam upapādayati  /
yadi tu iti
pīta pratibaddha vatsām iti vat upasarjanam pūrvam iti anuśiṣṭasya pūrva nipātasya āpattau pīta indra iti prayoga āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
jñāpakasya saptamī bahuvrīhi viṣaya tvam abhipretya prācīna ukta tṛtīyā vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīhi anaṅgīkāreṇa api vyadhikaraṇa saptamī bahuvrīhi aṅgīkāreṇa
pariharati tadā astu iti
niṣṭhā anta tvena iti

original: niṣṭheti sūtreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ pītodakaḥ ityādiṣviva niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipātāpattirastyevetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: niṣṭhā iti sūtreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ pīta udakaḥ ityādiṣu iva niṣṭhā antasya pūrvanipāta āpattiḥ asti eva iti arthaḥ
agatika gatyā samādhatte tadā iti
agatika tvena eva atra a parituṣya niṣkṛṣṭa samādhānena siddhāntayati athavā iti
taittirīya śākhāyām iti

original: tasyāṃ hi mandrābhibhūtirityārabhya varcasa ityantaṃ paṭhitvā “vasumadgaṇasya somadevate
analyzed: tasyām hi mandra abhibhūtiḥ iti ārabhya varcasaḥ iti antam paṭhitvā vasumat gaṇasya soma devate

original: matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandasa indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya
analyzed: mati vidaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatra chandasaḥ indra pītasya narāśaṃsa pītasya pitṛ pītasya

original: madhumata upahatasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi rudravadgaṇasya somadevate mativido mādhyandinasya
analyzed: madhumataḥ upahatasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi rudravat gaṇasya soma devate mati vidaḥ mādhyandinasya

original: savanasya triṣṭupchandasa indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto
analyzed: savanasya triṣṭubh chandasaḥ indra pītasya narāśaṃsa pītasya pitṛ pītasya madhumataḥ upahūtasya upahūtaḥ
bhakṣayāmi ādityavat gaṇasya soma devate mati vidaḥ tṛtīyasya savanasya jagatī chandasa

original: indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpitasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi”
analyzed: indra pītasya narāśaṃsa pītasya pitṛ pitasya madhumataḥ upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi
iti mīmāṃsā bhāṣya kāra likhita śākhā antarīya mantra pāṭha vailakṣaṇyena pāṭhaḥ

original: tatrendrapītādipadānāṃ trayāṇāṃ somamātraparatve tattaddevatyapradānaśeṣabhakṣaṇe liṅgādeva tantrapadatayā tattatpadānāṃ prāptestrivāraṃ pāṭho  #
analyzed: tatra indra pīta ādi padānām trayāṇām soma mātra paratve tad tad devatya pradāna śeṣa bhakṣaṇe liṅgāt eva tantra pada tayā tad tad padānām prāpteḥ tri vāram
narthakaḥ prāpnoti
savana para tve tu savanānām bhedena tad tad rūpeṇa tad tad devatā pīta soma saṃbandhi savana saṃbandhi avayava prakāśanāya

original: sa pāṭhaḥ sārthaka iti pītapade lakṣaṇāyāḥ somasavanasaṃbandhiparatve 'syāṃ śākhāyāṃ
analyzed: sa pāṭhaḥ sārthakaḥ iti pīta pade lakṣaṇāyāḥ soma savana saṃbandhi para tve syām śākhāyām

original: nirṇīte upasaṃhāranyāyena bhāṣyodāhṛtamantre 'pi tathaiva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: nirṇīte upasaṃhāra nyāyena bhāṣya udāhṛta mantre tathā eva nirṇayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ ------- vasumadgaṇādipadānāṃ asiddhavibhāgakaraṇapūrvako vyavasthayā tattatsavane viniyogo bhāṣyodāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: etāvān tu viśeṣaḥ vasumat gaṇa ādi padānām asiddha vibhāga karaṇa pūrvakaḥ vyavasthayā tad tad savane viniyogaḥ bhāṣya udāhṛtaḥ

original: taittirīyetu yathāsavanaṃ vibhāgasya svata eva siddhatvādyathāliṅgaṃ vyavasthāmātramiti tatpuruṣeṇaivātra siddhānta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: taittirīye tu yathāsavanam vibhāgasya svatas eva siddha tvāt yathāliṅgam vyavasthā mātram iti tatpuruṣeṇa eva atra siddhāntaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: atraca “sarveṣāṃ vaikamantryamaitiśāyanasya bhaktipānatvāt savanādhikāro hī“ti siddhāntasūtre aitiśāyanagrahaṇādanyarṣeraikamantramiti mataṃ  #
analyzed: atra ca sarveṣām vaikamantryam aitiśāyanasya bhakti pāna tvāt savana adhikāraḥ hi iti siddhānta sūtre aitiśāyana grahaṇāt anya ṛṣeḥ aikamantram iti matam
na jaimineḥ

original: tasyatu yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayatītyādyapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇāyottarasūtrapratipāditohapakṣa eveti bhramaṃ nirākartumāha --------  #
analyzed: tasya tu yathādevatam vā tad prakṛti tvam hi darśayati iti ādya pūrvapakṣa nirākaraṇāya uttara sūtra pratipādita ūha pakṣaḥ eva iti bhramam nirākartum āha  /
kalpasūtra iti
yohi uttara sūtreṇa jaimininā ūha pakṣaḥ uktaḥ
sa kalpasūtrakāra mata tvena uktaḥ

original: paramatatvenokto 'pyaikamantryapakṣaḥ svasiddhānta eva yuktisiddhatvādato mīmāṃsānyāyavirodhe pūrvapakṣamūlatvāt kalpasūtrakāravacanasyānanuṣṭhānalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyamityarthaḥ
analyzed: para mata tvena uktaḥ pyaikamantrya pakṣaḥ sva siddhānte eva yukti siddha tvāt atas mīmāṃsā nyāya virodhe pūrvapakṣa mūla tvāt kalpasūtra kāra vacanasya ananuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇam aprāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ

original: ataeva --------- atrānte uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa evamaitiśāyana ācāryo manyate sma /
analyzed: ataeva atra ante uktam bhāṣyakāreṇa evam aitiśāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ manyate sma
asmākam api etat eva matam
ācārya grahaṇam tasmāt āgatam iti saṃkīrti artham iti
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti viṃśam ekādaśa adhikaraṇa upasaṃhāra adhikaraṇam
iti śrīkhaṇḍa deva antevāsi kavimaṇḍana śaṃbhu bhaṭṭa kṛtāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikā prabhāvalyām tṛtīya adhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ
